absoluly highly recommend! First, great location: expecially for family trip. very near MTR and all the best shopping area in HK. Second, check in & out are both convenient, Via is helpful and also Susanna, sweet host they are. come to pick up us with the heavy luggage. Finally, the apartment is useful as HK size is always cozy but, here, totally enough space for us (three adults and two kids). we will definely come back again for such family trip.

The space in HK is limited, but Susann's kindness and hospitality is unlimited . She's the best host and her apartment is very nice. It is a harbor for us while we stayed in HK. She always understand our difficulties and offered her help immediately. 
Thank you Susann. Just like my daughter said, we like you and your apartment.

Affordable rates. Conveniently located in front of Hysan Place. Where Times Square is also of walking distance. The apartment is nice and clean. Complete with kitchen utensils. A/C works great. The only problem is that the toilets were too small; some of the faucets were broken and the doorknobs of the bedrooms could not be locked.
房子的地理位置很好,房子很干净,三个房间装修都不错｡
房子很好很干净

This is my first experience with Airbnb and it was wonderful. Suzann is very helpful right from the beginning｡The apartment was nice and comfort as pictured , location is the best, right at the center of causeway bay.
nice apartment!great location!everything is perfect, but the washing room is small. I love the apartment!
It was a very good location for traveler. And Susan is really nice and have very good introduction of her house. Great experience.

name: Luxurious, bright, spacious Plaza Catalunya
summary: Magnificent apartment situated in the heart of Barcelona. Located in a prestigious building with concierge next to Rambla de Cataluña, this apartment is the ideal choice to accomodate up to 6 people. The apartment is composed by an entrance hall, living room, dining room and a fully equipped kitchen with all the kitchen utensils. There are 2 dormitories with 2 single beds, a big bedroom with a double bed and two bathrooms.  Tourist licence HUTB - 003179.

reviews.txt:
Lovely and very central apartment in the heart of Barcelona. It's position made exploring the city very easy either on foot or using public transport. Plenty of shopping areas and restaurants around and a lovely organic and vegetarian shop near by. 

The apartment is quite airy but unfortunately the blinds do not work in the rooms so there is no natural light. Even though the apartment is very central all the windows are on internal patios ( the living room windows are enormous and let lots of light) which makes it very quiet.

We had a lovely time and we certainly will use it again when we return to Barcelona.
Great neighbourhood, and very central.

Apartment clean, wide and cozy. Near to Casa Battlò, Placa de Catalunya and many restaurants, it's a perfect place for families. The host was kind and helpful, we didn't have any problem during our stay.

Bel appartement très bien placé et silencieux. 
Par contre pas de parking comme indiqué et pas de demodulateur pour avoir des chaînes françaises
the apartment has very central  location, near to Placa Catalunia. It is bright, beautiful and comfortable, with all the ecquipment one can need. good for 5-6 people. Thanks to Tendency!
Increíble! Súper buena la ubicación y un departamento de lujo!
Very well located and great looking place.

Very good location and flat. Everything was perfectly clean, bright and as described. We had a very nice stay. 
We use the bagages services company that the host advised us during our check in: for €5 they come to get your luggages and bring them later at the airport (because our check out was at 11am). 
I would just recommend to bring your own hairdryer (if you are coming for special occasion as us - we were in BCN for a wedding). 
I really recommend this flat
A lovely apartment in a great location. We would definitely stay there again.

très bel appartement situé à l'arrière de l'immeuble.
immeuble magnifique avec un gardien.
deux chambres sont plus sombres où il y fait plus chaud.
il manque juste un rideau opaque dans la grande chambre.
je recommande cet appartement spacieux.

The apartment is very close to Plaça de Catalunya giving very good access to all public transport. The neighborhood is very nice with cafés, restaurants and bars close-by. I stayed in the apartment for 5 days with 5 friends of mine and the apartment turned out to be very comfortable for 6 people with its 3 rooms and 2 bathrooms.
Excellent option when staying in Barcelona! I loved how close we were to a grocery store, restaurants, and major attractions. The space was comfortable for our family of 6 adults.

Everything is as described. It's central, a lot of supermarkets really close, one of them is 24/365. It's very confortable, amazing beds, amazing shower and well equiped kitchen. It's perfect for a few days to really see Barcelona.

Peaceful location steps from all the action. 

We had a wonderful time in Barcelona staying in the 3 bedroom flat we used though Tendancy. It had tons of space, good beds and was very clean. Being less than one block from Las Rambles, I was worried about noise, but once you enter the building, all the city noises go away. Check in was easy as a representative from our host met us at the door, let us in and showed us around. The location was awesome. Literally steps away were many restaurants, shops and other places to go. There is even a small food market 3 doors down on the same street. The main square was a 5 minute walk. When in Barcelona, I would definitely consider staying here again.
Fantastic location, and the apartment had everything we needed.

Great location to access all parts of the city. Just a little north of Plaza Catalunya so a nice departure from the touristy Las Ramblas area. 

Sitting area is nice and spacious. Master bedroom is quite large but very bright from the floor to ceiling windows.  The other two rooms are a bit on the small size but not too cramped to fit 2 twin beds.

Had a really great time in Barcelona! Would stay at this location again!
Great apartment in the heart of the city. Close to everything and highly recommend.
Fantastic apartment, brilliant position. Can't fault it.
Very spacious apartment in great location.  At corner is Las Ramblas.  Quiet, safe area. Coffee, bakery, market nearby. Modern, well equipped kitchen. Great for families and business travelers.
This apartment was gorgeous and in a perfect location. We had a very delightful stay and enjoyed the nearby restaurants and shopping areas. We highly recommend this listing!

name: B5.Walk to MTR 1 min/Economy room/Twin single bed
summary: Our room is conveniently located in Hong Kong’s renowned commercial and entertainment district at Jordan.Located on Nathan’s Road,near Tsim Sha Tsui. 1-5 minute walk to the MTR,Airport Bus Stop,Yue Hwa Chinese Products,Prudential Center,Park Lane Shopper’s Boulevard,SASA,Bonjour,Mannings,Watsons,Temple Street Night Market,Australia Dairy Company,Tsui Wah Restaurant,Hui Lau Shan,7-ELEVEN. Whether you’re in town for business or pleasure,we will be your best choice.

reviews.txt: Location very good, in the shopping center, and many fast food place,  traffic is very convenien !
交通确实很方便,香港住的地方都不大,好在即便如此设施也都有｡性价比高
总体来说算是便宜的,性价比还是蛮高的,地理位置也挺方便的

Well recommended place. Very close to Mtr Jordan station and many shops nearby. Place is just like how it is in the photo. Good for solo travellers. At first i got lost finding the place but on the next days i feel like i am a local in hongkong. Thankyou until next time!
很好的一次体验,香港寸土寸金这个价位住到这样的房间很不错了,地理位置也很好非常方便,离地铁站很近,周围也有巴士站,大厦楼下有保安首先安全很到位,其次能分到有窗户的房间也很好空气流通好,就是香港的汽车喜欢改装排气管,一踩油门轰轰的很吵,不过还好,其实香港给我的感觉非常好很安静很安心,除了消费高点没什么不好的,总体来说这次体验还不错,下次再去还会住这里,也会推荐给朋友

- 非常靠近佐敦地鐵站,交通十分方便
- 附近有不少美食,也開到很晚
非常便利的地段
真是太太太好了,下次还来耶,我爱｡

The pictures are quite deceiving I would say. The room we stayed in was quite dirty and there was a roach crawling about the place. Linens were riddle with stains and towels as well. The bathroom had a peculiar odour. The size was just as expected and not a problem.  The location is great. I would recommend spending the few extra dollars and getting a place much cleaner.
觉得整体性价比还不错~就是早上起来感觉身上痒痒的,发现床上有小虫子~
大体上还是可以的,但是太过于狭小拥挤,给人感觉有一丝简陋吧｡卫生间的马桶盖一直无法完全开启
地点超级方便哟,附近也好多好吃的,好玩的｡比想象中干净｡

The address in Airbnb app was just to show where the reception counter is. I’m glad I’m staying in another building. The room was refurbished although the exterior of the building was old. Saw tiny cockroaches but I was not surprised as the building was old. Space was good for me as Asian. We could hear noises from the street and other room but we are okay as we are not light sleepers. We need to share hair dryer with other guests. Thanks to the staff who helped to empty trash bin daily and I liked the firm bed very much as I could rest really well after walking all day long.

name: Nice appartement in central
summary: 1 bedroom in a 2 bedrooms cosy apartment, all furnished. Located in central midlevels really close from the escalator, calm and clear. 2 minutes walk from the Soho area with bars and restaurants. Many supermarkets and groceries around. And also bus and taxis. MTR central station is 10 minutes walk.

loc.address: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.txt: Audrey est très gentille et réactive au questions durant le séjour. L'appartement est fonctionnel bien équipé et se trouve dans un quartier calme et non loin du centre! La chambre est cosie, je recommande ce logement!
Audrey's flat very nice and exactly as on the pictures. The location is great and area is full of bars and restaurants - thanks:)

The place is my standart of staying in HK, bright, comfy, clean,  perfect size rooms, picture perfect kitchen, especially sweet scented candles in every rooms which I found rarely in HK. Convenient location and Audrey is truly amazing host!

I warmly recommend Audrey's place ! The location couldn't be better : on top of Cain   Road, in a pedestrian super quiet street, it is very Central but extremely quiet around the neighborhood. 
The apartment is charming, spacious, light, very clean and well decorated. 
And Audrey s roommate is as lovely as the place! 
The price is very okay for the place !

A neat and stylish abode right within Central - a great base from which to explore HK. Take the famous Central-Midlevels Escalator on the way home and experience the hustle and bustle of Soho.  Or take the ferries from Central to other parts of HK. Plenty of artisan coffee, local cheap eats, restaurants, and bars just a few steps outside the apartment. The place was very clean, had great storage and all the amenities required for a comfortable stay. Audrey was very responsive and even suggested some amazing eats. Her roommate, Stella, was just as friendly and welcoming. I had an amazing time in HK thanks to Audrey and Stella. Will definitely revisit when I'm back in HK.

Stella is  a great roommate! I was very happy with that.
I felt very welcome and the communication was perfect. Thank you for the hospitality.

Audrey's appartment is great and very close to Soho. Getting there is kind of a workout since the build is on a hill but you can take the Mid-level escalators which makes it easier. Checking in and out was very easy. I didn't get the chance to meet Audrey in person, but communication with her was very reliable. Can definitely recommend her place!

name: Best location 1BR Apt in HK - Shops & Sights
summary: Welcome to my apartment, 1BR newly renovated and furnished. Located in the heart of Hong Kong's shopping, food and culture center.  1 minute walk to TST MTR station, airport transfer and all major transport.

reviews.txt: The unit is as it appears on the description, small and cozy, located in the heart of Kowloon. I find it good for young travellers that want to discover the city (our case). Not recommended for copuples seeking a romantic trip since is quite busy and noisy. Big dissapointed was that Water heater didnt work and had to take a cold water shower. Regarding owner response, it took a while for him/her to answer but afterwards everything was fine.

It was my first Airbnb experience and we like its brand new and great location of this apartment. Jenkin is a fabulous host that has answered all needs in a quick manner. We will definitely stay again at his place in the future (Website hidden by Airbnb)
Really nice!The apartment is new and comfortable.The bed is soft.And there are a lot of restaurants and shopping malls near by.House keeper is so warm because she help us a lot.

Great little place in a very convenient part of Hong Kong.  We are a family of three who have been to Hong Kong a number of times.  Although we usually stay in a hotel on Hong Kong Island, we decided to stay in Jenkin's place due to the price, apparent cleanliness, and in order to better experience life in Kowloon.  We were definitely not disappointed.  The unit is quite small but they make efficient use of the space and the reality is that it was more spacious than any hotel room, aside from the most deluxe suites. Location wise it doesn't get any better.  Just steps from Tsim Sha Tsui (TST), and then everything that TST has to offer readily at hand.  Shopping and eating for all price ranges and tastes.  We won't hesitate to stay there again on future visits to the city.

Hey the apartment is centrally located , 2 mins walk from the TST MTR and the apartment has been beautifully decorated. Also the Host Jenkins and lilo are welcoming and very helpful , they do everything possible to make sure you are comfortable. I would highly recommend this apartment for smaller groups. 

It was a wonderful experience and I really enjoyed my stay. I am sure the hosts will make your stay comfortable and do everything possible to make sure you face no problems.

We had a great time! Hosts were very easy to get in touch with, promptly helped us out with a water issue at the building (that was not their fault), and the space was very clean and comfortable.

It's a small space, definitely best for folks like us who just need a comfortable place to sleep after a day of exploring the city. Thanks for a great experience!

Our stay was wonderful and hassle free.  The apartment is what we expected it to be, warm and homey. The location of the place is convenient as public transportation, convenient stores, local restaurants and malls are nearby.

Suggestion/Feedback 
Toilet - at the shower area, to do a sliding door instead of using curtain  as water will spill to the floor near the toilet bowl area.
No place to hang socks after washing. 
Sofa bed - material catch dust easily. To extend it to become a bed and making sure that it is fixed correctly, must be extra careful as  my son hurt his hand. 
Living room aircon - thought aircon was spoilt as we couldnt on it. We didnt know that the switch, which is hidden in the cupboard, is not switch on until when we met Helen when we are checking out.
Overall, we still can accept and hope that there will be improvement. Thanks to both Jenkin and Helen.

Wonderful location, seconds from MTR and so much to do and eat in the area. The apartment is small but comfortable. Glad there's an elevator too! The check in process was flawless. Easy to communicate with owner and check in person. Will definitely stay here again in the future.
Great location in the heart of TST.  Newly renovated unit perfect for a short trip.  Jenkins is very responsive to messages and accommodating.  Great stay.  Highly recommended.

I didn't personally meet Jenkin/Ricky. However, communication was a breeze. He connect me with Helen and she was nice! Jenkin allowed me to put my luggages first in the apartment which make things easier for me and family before actual check in. He also allowed me to keep those luggages while I kill some times before leaving. Thank you for that! Room was very nice, clean, cozy (looks exactly from the pictures). Amenities are there, TV, kitchen, iron, etc. Wifi is good! Location is perfect! Going to places were easy via MTR. The area around the apartment was always busy but very safe, I must say. Happy with the whole trip to HK. Stay with Jenkin, highly recommended! Thank you for everything, Jenkin and Ricky! And thank you to Helen too!
Fast, easy and good service :)
位置很不错,靠近地铁｡我这次是替妈妈定的apt,联系上有点困难｡这也没办法,不过当时特别挑了会中文的房东,可是妈妈说到了香港后是另外一位女士来给钥匙的....语言上交流比较困难,鸡同鸭讲｡还有被子感觉上没有更换新的....房子是新装修的!
Due to the personal reason, I cancel the booking of the second day. Thanks for the understanding and support.
A kind host greeted and directed us over the phone to make sure we were alright. Highly appreciated! The place was very clean and comfortable.

Location is almost everything in Hong Kong.  Host service is a close second. Jenkin is an accessible and attentive host, and that's something you may need in a complicated city like Hong Kong. This is an efficiently designed very small space which makes it seem larger than it is. The layout is (1) a bed-sized sleeping area with a curtain and sliding door for privacy; (2) a comfortably sized and appointed bathroom with a nicely tiled shower with plenty of hot water and strong water pressure; and (3) a living room with comfortable sofa, reliable wifi, and clothes hanging rack. There is a fridge and microwave and hotplate, with enough cookware for two people. You wash your dishes in the bathroom.  All three rooms are recently remodeled and tiled.  The bed is very comfortable. Both the bedroom and living room have air conditioners.

The little apartment is on the 6th floor of an old and dingy (but clean) Kowloon apartment building one block from the stunning fountains of Kowloon Park and the subway, and a million places right there in your face.  It is a 10 minute exciting walk (as in every single time its exciting) to the picturesque  harbor ferry to Hong Kong Island (or you can take the subway there).  Like many Asian buildings, the elevators are very slow and often crowded with friendly people, but remarkably, each floor has an elevator on either end of the hallway. You walk out of Jenkin's apartment, look left and look right to see which elevator will arrive first, a fun little game for us. 

The very safe neighborhood is extremely trendy, filled with excited locals and tourists, and many places open until late. (My favorite bar and restaurant were open until 3am, both very funky). 

I might stay in one of Jenkin's larger units next time but, you know, I'm not sure since this little place just grows on you after two days.  He is a master host, his cleaning lady is so nice and right nearby, and he takes a lot of pride in making your stay high quality.  He even guided our taxi driver to the front door by cell phone, and he is always, always accessible.  It's remarkable.
我们去玩迪士尼很晚回来害怕要找一段时间,地理交通条件好出地铁口走几步就到了,很容易就能找到｡去维多利亚港看完夜景回来到楼下有便利店茶餐厅吃点东西非常方便,房子感觉卫生,有电视和无线网络整体感觉不错!

The apartment is in a great location for exploring the Tsim Sha Sui area. The MTR station is right outside the building entrance, and the harbor area is just a few blocks away to the south and west. The living space is small but well organized, with a separate bedroom (just big enough for the bed) with its own air-con, and the bathroom is a very usable size. The main drawback to the apartment is that it is on the 6th floor of a 15 floor building and the queues can get long for the elevator. There is one elevator at each end of the long hall on the 6th floor but on the ground level they are completely separated.  A few times I waited on the ground floor in a queue for 15-20 minutes and the elevator fills up before being able to get in, so plan your trips, don't expect to go in and out a lot, and avoid mid-day and evening hours when people are coming home.  Of course this is not an issue the host can resolve, but I think any guests should anticipate.
地理位置很棒 (Hidden by Airbnb) 都比较方便

位置十分方便 近地鐵站 商場 晚上吃東西都方便
房間有點小  浴室更小  有許多雜物堆放在櫃子裡  打掃也不乾淨  沙發上有需多頭髮  垃圾桶只有一個  因為不知去哪倒  對旅行的的人來說 不夠使用   
浴室一沖水 浴簾就會亂飄 常會黏到身上  老實說以房間的價格還是打過折的  不如住飯店  既沒有價格優勢  環境也不太ok

name: Mongkok Luxury Studio, New Reno *4A
summary: Lovely walkup studio apartment on the fourth floor with kitchenette in the heart of Mongkok. Minutes away from numerous tourist attractions such as the Ladies Market and shopping malls, this is the perfect unit for any solo traveler. The unit is newly renovated as well!

reviews.txt: The room is clean and modern looking. Great stay. The foldable bed makes more space during the day.

name: Cute Attic room Beyoğlu, Istanbul
summary: This is a room in an Ottoman liberty style townhouse in Beyoglu. The location is very central, walking distance to istiklal street, one of the main centers in Istanbul. There are many cafes, restaurants, bars, and shopping, night life.

reviews.txt: Comment raconter en quelques mots les trois semaines magnifiques passées chez Fatma ! Impossible. La pension est charmante et possède une terrasse très chaleureuse. Fatma est une personne extrèmement intéressante avec qui il faut absolument prendre un café dès quelle le propose (ce qui arrive très souvent !). Elle cuisine merveilleusement. Elle connait Istanbul comme sa poche. La chambre est au dernier étage, elle est calme et douce. Elle a un accès direct sur la terrasse ce qui permet de bouquiner avant d'aller dormir ou de faire un peu de yoga le matin. Le quartier est au coeur de Beyoglu avec une foultitude de restaurants et de bonnes adresses à découvrir. Si vous hésitez encore à réserver, n'hésitez plus ! Quant à moi, je reviendrais le plus vite possible !

Ich bin unheimlich glücklich bei Fatma Abla gestrandet zu sein. Es ist immer was los und selbst wenn mankein türkisch kann,Fatma Abla versucht mit English und Händen und Füßen zu reden. Eine unglaublich sympathische und unterhaltsame Dame, die ich sehr schnell ins Herz geschlossen habe. Sonntags sind wir zusammen zum Bio Bazar gelaufen und an einigen Tagen kochen wir sogar was zusammen.  Mein Zimmer befindet sich im obersten Stock, wo ich komplett meine Ruhe habe. gegenüber von meinem Zimmer ist eine wunderschöne Terasse, die zum Yoga machen oder ein Buch lesen einlädt. Gäste sind auch immer willkommen. Fatma hat ihre eigenen Stil, welches dem ganzen Haus, bis auf den Eingangsbereich, einen unglaublichen charm gibt. Jedes Zimmer ist individuell und man muss sagen, dass bis her die Leute, die ich im Haus kennengelernt habe, echt toll sind. Wenn man sich für Fatma entscheidet, sollte man auf alle Fälle kulturoffen sein und sich diesem schönen antiken Stil und der Nostalgie einfach fallen lassen. Ich bin durch Fatma und durch die Wohnung in einem alten Istanbul angekommen und fühle mich super wohl. Zu meiner Arbeit in Cihangir laufe ich täglich zu Fuß. Die Lage ist sehr perfekt. Ich brauche kaum Bus oder Bahn zu benutzen, da ich alles in Beyoglu und Taksim finde, was ich brauche. Nur für meine Touristentour habe ich lediglich die Bahn benutzt. Obwohl man zum Eminönu auch zu Fuß laufen kann, wenn man spazieren gehen mag. Ich danke Dir, Fatma abla, so wie ich dich gerne zu nennen pflege, für Deine Offenheit und Deine Wärme. Ich werde Dich sehr bald wieder besuchen kommen und hoffentlich sogar mein altes Zimmer beziehen im obersten Stock.

Fatma's home is a perfect place to enjoy Istanbul : peacefull place, independence, located close to main places ... Fatma is nice, and other people staying in Fatma's house so you can meet new people etc
So I recommend it !

I stayed with Fatma for many weeks in December 2013, in the attic room on my own, and then with my boyfriend in the larger double room, and had an amazing time. 
The neighbourhood, Tarlabaşı, is different and more down to earth than the posher neighbourhoods around. The location is wonderful: it's easy to get anywhere by foot, taxi, bus, dolmus, metro or boat.
Fatma, who lives there, and her daughter Elvan, who lives in Italy but is quick to communicate by email, are extremely friendly and helpful. 
Fatma also cooks wonderfully and even offers cooking classes. 
I would definitely recommend staying there, for three nights or three months, and hope to stay there again myself.
Be aware though that if you have respiratory issues, this might not be a good choice as there is a fair amount of smoking happening inside, and even the neighbourhood is quite smoky because of the coal heating.

Sono stata 5 giorni ospite da Fatma. Purtroppo non l'ho conosciuta perchè era in Italia dalla figlia, con cui sono riuscita a comunicare molto bene in italiano (dato che il mio inglese è molto scarso..), è stata gentilissima! come anche gli ospiti che mi hanno accolto lì a Istanbul! Si è creato un bel clima e anche se spesso ero fuori per visitare la città, ho passato due bellissime serate in un clima multiculturale!

The perfect visit. 

For me, this attic room in Beyoglu was perfect for my time in Istanbul. My hosts were wonderful, the room is great, the terrace is greater, and the location is fantastic. I was in Istanbul for a intensive summer school at their Technology University, and got the privacy, space and support I needed to get everything done, and to a high standard. I was sad to leave and am looking forward to returning again in a few months. 

Thank you thank you thank you, and will miss you guys!

Beau x

Fatma, Elvan, her daughter, Hasan, her husband, and all of the other guests with whom I shared the house made this one of my best travel experiences. Fatma really tries to make everyone at home in her home and in her city. We shared dinner on the terrace several times with her past guests / friends, and they made me feel so welcome and quickly become knowledgable about Istanbul and the broader society. 

The room, itself, and the neighborhood have been correctly detailed in the room information, guest feedback, and the feedback for Fatma's other rooms' feedback. I encourage you to read them all to get a clear idea. 

All said, the room is good value for money, and the people will make it a fond, memorable experience.

I stayed for one month in the attic room and was very pleased with how everything turned out. Fatma and Hasan are very welcoming, and I have many good memories of my stay (like drinking raki and talking about Turkish music with Hasan at the dinner table). If you stay here you will meet many interesting people from Turkey and around the world passing through the house. The area will not be to every ones tastes, but I highly recommend it for the more adventurous among you.

Thank you Fatima and family for a wonderful time in Istanbul!
I love your house, my attic room which is very central and from where I was able to walk to all sites in Istanbul. You, your husband and daughter, all were very welcoming and helpful. I definitely want to come back.

Fatma and Hasan, the hosts, are truly some of the nicest people I've had the chance to come across. I stayed for 3 months and loved every second of it, only regretting that I could not stay for another three. The landlords are fantastic and experienced Airbnb hosts, which makes the experienced that much better. Fatma is an outstanding cook, and one should not miss a chance to dine with her and Hasan! The house is great, very typical and nice - as a bonus, the bathrooms were all renovated and they look fantastic. The terrace made for many evenings relaxing away from the hustle and bustle of Istiklal St. In terms of location, the house is in a great spot: seconds away from Istiklal, minutes from Taksim and the cool Cihangir area, and a short train ride or longer walk to Sultanahmet, Topkapi and all the tourist sites. Would recommend without any hesitation, as I already did to two friends of mine who also stayed at Fatma and Hasan's house.

I spent a really nice month at Fatma's house. The room is lovely and fits the description. I also really enjoyed the beautiful terrasse from where you can watch the neighborhood. I thought the house was in an ideal location to explore the city. The street where the house is on is pretty calm. 
This room is on the same floor with the terrasse and the kitchen, so you have ideal access to both of them. The kitchen is ideal if you just want to cook something small from time to time as there's only one cooking plate.
This room is perfect for people that wish to be in contact with the host and exchange with them from time to time as you walk by their living room and kitchen as well as share the bathroom with them. If you rather be a little more to your own and mind cigarette smoke, I recommend one of the other rooms.
Fatma and Hasan are both very very nice, always asked about my day and they were very patient when I tried to say something in turkish. I hope that my turkish will be better one day so that we can have longer and deeper conversations!  They made me feel very welcomed and I also really enjoyed meeting Fatma's daughter and grandson!They are very generous, sometimes invited me for tea or something to eat. I also got lucky to taste some of Fatma's amazing food!

It was fantastic to stay at the house of Fatma and Hasan! The room is very nice, like you can see on the pictures. Next to the room is the kitchen and the terasse, which is great. The bathroom of which you can´t see picture was aesthtic too.
Particularly if you are in Istanbul because of learning Turkish Fatma and Hasan´s house will be the best choice as both are very communicative and patiant with beginners. Above all Fatma and Hasan are such nice people, I am really looking forward to stay in contact with them. 
I highly recommend the room. But you should have no problem with shareing the bathroom with the hosts as well as shareing the kitchen and the terasse with a lot of other guests who stay in the house. But that´s why the attic room is the best one for people who want interact with the hosts and get to know other guests.
I also loved the neighbourhood.

Fatma and Hasan are wonderful hosts, warm, welcoming and very hospitable.  The room is just as describe.  Central location, easy to get around by foot or public transportation, grocery stores and lots of dining options at your finger tips, can't be beat.

I really enjoyed staying at Fatma and Hasan's. They were incredibly sweet and welcoming, it almost felt like staying with my aunt and uncle. I was alone with Hasan for the most part as Fatma was out of town. During that time he always made sure I'd get home safe at night. I thought that was very endearing. The room itself is super cute, with its own kitchen and terrace access, which I tremendously enjoyed as it gave me the sense of having an entire apartment. The neighbourhood is a bit off the tourist track but for that reason very charming. And it still is very close to Istiqlal, essentially just across the street. So you are strategically located.

파트마는 친절하고 가족처럼 대해줘서 편안하게 잘 쉬다갈수있었네요^^ 가격에 비해 좋았습니다. 오래동안 머물면서 특별히 블편한점은 없었구요. 샤워 요리 빨래 등등 마음껏 눈치안보고 할수있어서 좋았네요.
추천합니다 :)
Amazing and warm place that I fully recommend. Hassan does delicious Turkish breakfast...
A lovely place to stay! The house has character, there's a gorgeous terrace and it's well located for bars, cafés and museums. Hasan was the perfect host!

A wonderful journey at Fatma and Hasan's house !! So pleasant place, clean, very very well located, lot of plants on the terrace... But above all, amazing and great people live here ! Fatma and Hasan are so welcoming and warm, it was a real pleasure for me to spend time with them. I definitely recommend this place, and hope to come back as soon as possible !

Fatma and Hassan are wonderful and caring hosts. I accompanied Hassan to work and he showed me his favourite breakfast stops; I also had a lovely few hours drinking tea with both of them chatting Turkish recipes.
The room was just what I had hoped for with a lovely terrace just outside it.
I will be back!
Great little room on the top floor. Perfect for solo traveler. Lots of other people staying there also. Both Hasan & Fatma were warm and friendly. Lots of stairs

name: Sunny Room (for One) Minutes from Coogee Beach!
summary: Close to Coogee Beach, Ritz Cinema, University of New South Wales (UNSW), Prince of Wales Hospital, Randwick Racecourse, bars, restaurants, shops, public transport... Yet, in a very quite suburb.

reviews.txt: This is a great place to stay! Very clean and fresh apartment, close to beautiful coogee beach and easy to travel around in Sydney. The hosts are great, made you feel welcome and had good communication. I strongly recommend this place!

Cindy is lovely, easy going and very pleasant to talk to. The house was very cozy and clean. Slightly away from the city but has bus right outside that goes directly to the city which is very good. There are many buses slightly longer opposite which takes about 5-10min walk. In the same area, it has restaurants and other shops so it pretty good and near all you need. Close to beautiful Coogee beach as well. Nice to stay at Cindy place.

The location of Cindy's house is great, quite accessible from the city. You can walk to the Coogee beach easily. The neighbourhood looked safe and is very quiet. Due to my busy schedule I couldn't spend much time at Cindy's house and chat with her. But the evening we met and sat down for a chat was great. She's kind, funny and very helpful. I wish her all the best and hope her place will be available when I visit Sydney next time.

Cindy is kind, lovely and easy going. Her house is nice,clean and also  quite at night. There are many buses  around there and restaurants just in walkable distance.  I stayed there during my final exam period, and I felt like at home. Nice to stay at Cindy's place !

Ich habe der Aufenthalt bei Cindy und Miki total genossen. Obwohl wir uns in den 3 Tagen kaum gesehen und gesprochen haben, hatte ich immer das Gefühl willkommen zu sein und habe mich total wohlgefühlt. Ein schöner Aufenthalt. Die Stadt ist schnell mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln zu erreichen und trotzdem liegt die Unterkunft ruhig. Alles in allem ein sehr schönes wenn auch einfach eingerichtetes Zimmer. Alles sauber und gemütlich. Vielen Dank nochmals.
This was a lovely home for a short stay. Cindy and Miki were welcoming, nice and informative. Cindy is punctual with her responses to messages.
I loved that the place was in a quiet area and close to Coogee Beach. From there you can do the Coast Walk to Bondi Beach which is amazing.
A nice place to stay. well equipped:)

This place is great!
Cindy & Miki are lovely hosts and make their guests welcome.
The room is very nice & the location of the apartment is good because Coogee beach is approx 20 mins walk away & bus stops outside lead to the City & Coogee beach.
I recommend this place for your stay in Randwick :-)

The room was exactly as described, small but cozy and comfortable. Ideal for a short stay! It was very clean, and Cindy and Miki absolutely lovely hosts.
Located close to shops, restaurants and the beach it was only a short bus ride into central Sydney.
Highly recommend it!
Ambiente agradável, limpo e bem localizado. Recomendo!

Lovely stay at Cindy and Micky's place, the location is quite convenient, although space of the room is a bit small. But it is so nice that Cindy provide me with fans in this hot weather! Rooms are also clean and elegant.
Great place to stay! Cindy was a great host. Check in and out was easy. Good advice on where to eat out.
The room is really cosy and the bathroom is nice and clean. It was a good place to stay in Sydney eventhough it's not in the inner city, because the bus stop is right in front of the door. :)
Fantastic! Very comfortable, clean and neat. Road noise started early but wasn't too bad.

I didn't really want to leave! This is a great place. The location is fantastic, 10 mins to beach, 5 mins to shops and bus stops directly outside the building. Couldn't ask for better. There is only one negative I can think of and even this is minor, no offer of teas or coffees for the morning. But that really doesn't take away from how much I enjoyed my stay! The bedroom was pretty much perfect, very comfortable. Bed was amazing! The apartment itself is very clean and tidy. And Cindy the host was great too! So friendly and welcoming. There is no doubt that I would definitely go back to this AirBnB room. Big thanks to Cindy for having me.
Cindy is a wonderful host, I had an awesome time during my stay in Sydney! The place is close to Randwick and public transport and not far from the city by bus.

No need to transfer to the city. This place is a good location and nice host:)
Just wifi connection is not so good. 
I had a good sleep at there.
I didn't see too much of Cindy or Miki, but they were both lovely! Great apartment, super comfy bed and spotlessly clean. Thanks guys!

I havent met Cindy but her communication prior the checkin was perfect. I met Miki and her bf and they were really friendly and welcoming. I really enjoyed my chats with them and my stay was perfect. Highly recommend! I had a great time, 20 min walking distance only from Coogee beach and the start of the coastal walk.

name: Mike's House- Hina Room
summary: Our home is a 4bd older rustic style home that has been in the family since 1935. Private room, with queen size bed and own bathroom.  We are 7-10 walking distance to Paia town with lots to see and eat.  There is off street parking and WIFI.

reviews.txt: This house was AWESOME!! Rina, the owner is very cool. She is very laid back, friendly, and helpful!! Any question I had or if I needed anything, text her and she was there!! The house is very clean and comfortable. The kitchen was well stocked with anything you would need. The water pressure in the shower was AMAZING!! We had a wonderful visit and my experience  at Mikes House exceeded all expectations!! Thank you Rina!! I guess in Hawaiian language that is.. Mahalo!! ;)

It was a wonderful time. Rina makes you feel right at home and the house has all the amenities you'll want. Paia is a great little town, with a super organic food store, restaurants, and coffee shops.
The town is kinda surfer central for the north shore area, with none of the condo sprawl one might find on the west side of the island.
It's also doable to stay there without renting a vehicle, but some excursions are better with a rental..
All in all, it was a very positive experience staying at "Mikes House".

Rina is a very welcoming and helpful hostess.  The house is a five-minute walk from downtown Paia but is much bustling with lots of space inside and plenty of parking.  The rooms are spacious and well appointed.

Light sleepers should know that the house is located on Baldwin Avenue, which is a busy road in the early morning, and there are chickens in the area, so you won't need an alarm clock.

Rina's place is a nicest one, situated in a most beautiful place, it is very so cozy, that it feels just like home. Rina is absolutely nice, too, and it is mostly due to her friendliness that you start feeling so at home there the moment you enter the house. Thank you so much, it was a pleasure for us to stay at you place, Rina, hope to see you again!

Aloha, Mike's place was exactly what we expected: friendly, helpful, clean! Once, before our arrival, I mentioned that I like Lilikoi (Passionfruit). When we arrived, Rina had Lilikoi Tea and Jam for us. After couple of days I asked if we could borrow 2 beach chairs, she didn't have any, but guess what? Next day she knocked and had 2 beach chairs on her shoulder, not the flimsy ones, the good ones....we thought that was incredible. The place is not the Hyatt, but comfy and clean. Our room was big enough for us,shower and toilet in the room, all was perfect. We could use the kitchen, which we did every morning. Well, what else is there to say? I told her, whenever we visit Maui, we will stay with her. She gave me/us a bye-bye present: Lilikoi candle, soap and body wash....a Hyatt would not do that !!
Mahalo Rina, you are a wonderful Host, Franz and Renate
Rina is a wonderful hostess and her place was very clean and welcoming!

rina is a very nice host. the house is great, close to the shops in piha. the kitchen is very big and well equipped: i had a very good time there and rina always checked whether everything is alright or if we were needing something .

This is a great place to stay! Starting with Rina and her helpful, relaxed and kind ways. The house is perfectly located half way between Hana and Haleakala. It is a 15 minutes drive from the airport, less than 10 minutes walk to Paia-Center with all its shops, restaurants and galleries. Beaches are also nearby. 
You can keep yourself for yourself or meet other guests from all over the world in the full equiped, handy kitchen or in the spacious TV-room. My room was comfortably large and very clean. Wifi worked well. I was provided with a parkingspace on the property. 
I can`t wait to come back again.

I exteneded my stay on Maui for a few days and wanted a simple, clean, comfortable place to stay in Paia and Mike's House suited my needs very well. Rina is very nice; very kind and helpful. I was able to leave my stuff in room on last day and picked it up early evening before catching flight home. Hana room is clean and comfortable with closed-in porch area with nice view of beach and mountains. Secure locks on doors with personalized codes. Well equipped, shared kitchen and living room. Opportunities to meet other nice travellers. Location is central and active with traffic on Baldwin Ave, roosters crowing and neighbours watching TV at night. Felt like every day, Hawaiian life and a nice way to end my visit.

We had a great stay at the Hina Room. It's very very clean and comfortable. You meet other people in the kitchen and can have a small talk. Rina is a lovely host who really care about her guests. Especially the very useful things like beachtowels and beachchairs makes it diffrent to other rooms. Highly recommend this place

The Hina Room was comfortable, spacious, and had a great breeze. The in-room bathroom is sufficient, but there is limited privacy because there is no door. I appreciated the vanity in the room. 

The shared areas where clean and in good shape. The kitchen was well stocked with supplies.

The host took care to provide the kinds of things you might want on your trip, but not might not have packed -- hair dryer, iron, beach chairs, towels, cooler, etc. That was very thoughtful and I appreciated that touch.

It was awesome, Rina and all the other people where stayed there were so friendly that we felt like it is our home.
Comfortable flat, gives you all you need for a pleasant stay during your holiday on maui.

Mahalo Rina

Rina was a delightful host and gave us all the information we needed. The kitchen was well supplied with cooking oil and condiments available. We enjoyed being within walking distance of the funky little shops of Paia which had good coffee and good restaurants. The house is also only 7 mile from the airport which helped with our early morning flight. The house was quite hot during the day but cooled quickly at night. Baldwin road traffic noise can be heard from the room but is less frequent during the night.

Rina was a fantastic host and was super accommodating! Her place is perfectly situated just down the street from town. Her place is a 5 min walk to the grocery store and the rest of all of the nice little shops and restaurants and 2 mins past there is a beautiful beach :)
We loved our private room and we felt secure and cozy in our nook :) and the kitchen is awesome! We definitely recommend putting your hat up at Rina's place if you're looking for the sweet spot in Paia ;)
Cheers!

We stayed one night in this room and it was everything we needed. Just a few blocks from great coffee and restaurants, and a clean comfortable room. Rina was very friendly and helpful. 

We appreciated having our own bathroom in the room, though it doesn't have a door. Overall we had a great stay in Paia and would recommend Rina's place!

Rina was an amazing hostess, sweet and extremely accommodating. We stayed here with our 7 month old and it was the perfect location in the beautiful town of Paia which was just a walk away. We stocked up on groceries at Mana foods which is a local version of Whole Goods - great selection. Great restaurants just a walk away. Nothing but good things to say about our 3 night stay here! Thanks Rina for all your insight and tips to make our stay so memorable!!

I had a great stay in Paia at Hoku's bed and breakfast. This location is wonderful because it's central to the Road to Hana, Mt Haleakela, and beaches on the West and Southern shores. Not to mention that the town of Paia has a very old school vibe that was fun to hang out in and be away from the touristy resort scene. Our stay with Hoku was convenient and our needs were immediately addressed. I would stay again when I come back to Maui. Mahalo!
Hoku was very informative and responsive with our communication. The room was just as we expected, nice, clean, and located a few steps from the town. Great place!
We have had a enjoyable time staying Hoku's house. The room was bright, clean and comfortable. The location is the best one in Maui. It is very convenient to main visiting points and shopping mall.
Lady who welcomed us was super nice -- room was clean, and other guests were quiet and respectful :)

name: Park Guell apartment with terrace
summary: Apartment with terrace in a quiet street of Barcelona, 5 minutes walk from Park Güell and 20 minutes by public transport to the city center. Renovated and fully equipped. HUTB-000929

reviews.txt:
The apartment is in a nice spot high up in the town with a great view (from til street). 
It is a 15-20 minutte uphill walk from the nearests Metro - but the area is quiet.
The outside terasse is wounderful - we enjoyed to have breakfast here. There is a nice little shop just next door.
The apartment and the bed clothes+towels was clean - so even it is a full time/only guest apartment we can recommend it.

La casa esta muy bien equipada y es realmente muy linda (solo funciona muy mal la conectividad de wife) y queda un poco alejada de los centros turísticos.  El único inconveniente fue que nuestro vuelo se demoro dos horas y al llegar 2 horas mas tarde del horario acordado, pasada las 20.00 se nos cobro 30 euro en el chec kin

Our host's friend was outside the property when we arrived, which was a bonus as travelled with our two children. We were shown around the apartment, and shown all guides personally put together by Regina. The apartment was as pictured and the children loved the apartment, we were within 5 mins walk from a local supermarket be warned parents there are a few steep hills slightly difficult with the stroller buggy but a good workout all the same. We were 10-12 mins walk from the subway Alfonso X only 4 stops from the Ramblas which was "thumbs up".

We loved our stay our two children were very comfortable in the apartment and loved the patio, there were ample playgrounds in close proximity. The neighbourhood was quiet and locals were very helpful.

SUCIO Y MUY POCO RECOMENDABLE.
Bajo con difícil accesibilidad, absoluta falta de limpieza y con fuerte olor a humedad provocada por guardar las sábanas mojadas dentro del único armario de la casa, recubierto de moho por dentro. Falta de limpieza absoluta en toda la casa que hacía muy incómoda su estancia y más con niños pequeños. El sofá donde supuestamente se podía dormir, tenía una gran mancha que ni se habían molestado en intentar limpiarla. Solo había un único armario recubierto de moho para guardar la ropa, que evidentemente no pudimos utilizar. La ducha estaba negra, picada y oxidada, lo que nos tocó limpiar a nosotros y desinfectarla un poco para poderla utilizar. La cocina llena cubierta por una capa de grasa que la hacía inútil para cocinar cualquier cosa. Escaleras hacia abajo completamente empinadas y estrechas.  Nada más llegar ni rastro de Regina o Juan, nos atendió una persona que ni siquiera sabía hablar bien castellano, por lo que dudo mucho de la existencia de Juan y Regina. Es absolutamente indignante que cuando pagas el apartamento te cobran unos gastos de limpieza que no han efectuado. Para colmo nos cobraron 30 € en concepto de checking. La zona es tranquila aunque bastante alejada del metro, dado que tienes unas cuestas muy empinadas desde la parada más cernada de metro y luego toca subir cuesta arriba unos 15 minutos. De cara a los esfuerzos por parte del anfitrión, absolutamente ninguno. La persona que nos recibió ni siquiera sabía indicarnos donde estaba la tienda más cercana, un parking donde poder dejar el coche e incluso la parada de metro más cernada. Soy usuario de esta web desde hace tiempo, he visitado otros países de Europa usándola y ha sido con creces la peor experiencia que he tenido. Me siento completamente estafado.
Authentic experience of Barcelona neighbourhood life. Friendly locals, a number of convenience and fruit/veg stores, and an incredible city view from atop the hill.
The neighbourhood was very timid and relaxing, a good contrast with the city centre and the beaches, so it provided a great haven for relaxation.

L'appartement est sympa et bien équipé, dans un quartier charmant. Il correspond assez bien à l'annonce Airbnb. Il a malheureusement une odeur d'humidité constante et il est tout de même un peu loin du métro ainsi que du parking public. L'hôte nous a donné beaucoup d'informations avant notre arrivée mais nous l'avons pas vu du tout pendant le séjour. J'ai également fait une demande de modification pour la quelle je n'ai jamais reçu un retour. Dans l'ensemble c'était une bonne expérience.

This apartment is perfect for a large family. The rooms are large, clean and cool. The kitchen is basic but serviceable and the outside space is lovely. Maks let us in and showed us around and he was quick to respond to questions throughout the stay.

L'appartement est conforme aux descriptions. C'est sympa on s'y sent presque chez soi. Une légère odeur d'humidité qui est un peu désagréable. Cependant avec les fenêtres grandes ouvertes l'odeur s'en va rapidement.

Au départ le concierge était sensé nous recevoir. Une fois arrivées, ni l'hôte, ni le concierge n'ont répondu à nos appels. Heureusement une jeune fille attendait devant le logement qui nous a expliqué que c'était elle qui était sensée nous recevoir mais nous n'étions pas au courant.
Heureusement elle était très gentille, nous a très bien reçu et nous a expliqué le déroulement du séjour.
Une fois dans le logement nous nous sommes aperçus que celui-ci était très poussiéreux et nous avons donc dû faire le ménage car une des personnes était allergique aux acariens. Nous avons également dû acheter des produits pour faire le ménage, car les produits ménagers sur place étaient très limités.
Au niveau des équipements, beaucoup de choses étaient fournies (lave-vaisselle, lave-linge, fer à repasser, sèche cheveux, etc) mais la vaisselle était très limitée pour 3 personnes (manque de verres et de couverts).
Attention il n'y a pas de volets ni de rideaux opaques sur 2 chambres sur 3. Cependant draps de lit et serviettes de toilette sont fournies. Il manque cependant un tapis de douche pour la baignoire.
Les matelas étaient confortables et le quartier très calme mis à part un voisin qui mettait parfois de la musique à fond.
Au niveau de l'emplacement, le logement est très bien situé car à 10 minutes à pied d'une ligne de métro qui dessert tous les endroits importants de la ville (plage, centre ville, quartier gothique, etc).
Par contre, attention pour les personnes qui ont des difficultés à se déplacer car le logement est tout en haut d'une côte très raide.
Malgré tout, nous avons passé un agréable séjour dans ce logement et avons apprécié la terrasse ombragée.
Muy chulo el apartamento y muy limpio todo bien
Een heel mooi en groot appartement: ideaal om met kinderen naar toe te komen! Alles heel proper en verzorgd.

Das informations Material könnte mal wieder sortiert werden ,da alles mehrfach vorhanden ist und man somit nicht mehr weis was aktuell ist .Im hinteren Schlafzimmer neben dem Bad sollte ein blickdichter Vorhang angebracht werden ,da man vom Treppenhausflur Direkt reinschauen kann ,es ist nur ein dünner durchsichtiger Vorhang dran. Leider keine Kaffeemaschine in einer Größe für 6 Personen vorhanden und die andere hat keine Kanne, Auch fehlen Weingläser für mehr als eine Person. aber am schlimmsten war der Gestank ,Moderich ,muffelig kaum zum aushalten ,wir hatten schon überlegt abzubrechen fanden aber in der Größe keine für uns bezahlbare Unterkunft .zudem konnte eine Person von uns nicht mit da sie einen Unfall hatte und Frankreich nicht verlassen durfte aber es gab keine Reduktion ,sehr schade aber was will man erwarten wenn es kommerziell ist .

5 girls living in the apartment. It is a big place and the distance between the apartment and the city center is ok (you can walk, use metro and bus). When we arrived, all of us noticed a smell all over the apartment - like kind of moldy. This sadly affected our stay in the apartment. The bedding had the smell to, and this was bad! The sink was broken among other thinks. 
Otherwise a big apartment with a little outside teresse. 
- Camilla, Andrea, Cecilie, Kia and Heidi

Une expérience mitigée.
 il est vrai que la rue est calme et que l'on peut profiter de la jolie vue sur Barcelone mais il faudra pour cela monter des pentes raides pour atteindre l'appartement. De plus, dans l'immeuble l'escalier est très étroit et il n'y pas pas d'ascenseur. L'accès peut donc être difficile pour les familles avec enfants en bas age, les personnes agées et les personnes a mobilité reduites surtout qu' il est situé dans l'étages du bas de l'immeuble, sous le rez de chaussé. 
Les photos ne sont pas très fidèle a la réalité car l'apparetement manque de luminosité, effet, a part la terrasse, il y a un manque de fenêtres et aucunes de donne sur l’extérieur. La seule autre fenêtre présente dans une des chambres donne sur l'escalier de l'immeuble.  
Du fait de ce manque de fenêtre, l'appartement n'est pas très lumineux et sens le renfermé.
Il y a de plus une mauvaise insonorisation de l'appartement mais cela n'a pas été très gênant car l'immeuble était dans l'ensemble plutôt calme. 
Point positif : hôte sympathique et disponible, proximité du parc Guell et des transports en commun 
Etant donné le rapport qualité prix, je pense qu'il convient surtout a un groupe d'amis

Regina was communicative before we stayed in the apartment and although she couldn't meet us during our stay, had arranged for someone to do so with keys and information. It's a really nice apartment in a quiet neighbourhood.
The place is spacious located in a nice area of the city

My group of four friends and I had a great stay in Regina's Airbnb. The apartment looked just as it did in the listing and was very clean. Regina was easy to communicate with before our stay and she coordinated for her friend Maks to meet us when we arrived. There was plenty of room for the group of five one the apartment. We thoroughly enjoyed the outdoor terrace and spent our mornings out there to eat the breakfast we had prepared in the well equipped kitchen. We did, however, wish there had been some basic kitchen ingredients like salt, spices, or oil there for us to use. The location was a quick walk to Park Güell and it was nice being in a non touristy area. That did however, mean that it was not as easy to reach the city center.

Regina é stata sempre molto disponibile a soddisfare le nostre richieste e qualunque problema ci fosse é stata pronta a consigliarci nel migliore dei modi.
La descrizione dell'annuncio rispecchia verosimilmente l'appartamento che è in sé molto accogliente è provvisto di tutto cioè che serve.
Il quartiere é un po' lontano dal centro, ma percorrendo un tratto a piedi e poi con la metro basta poco per raggiungere il centro città; il servizio taxi é abbastanza economico e comodo da utilizzare dopo l'orario di chiusura della metro.
Detto ciò risulta ovvio che é stata una bellissima esperienza!

The communication with Regina was perfect. The flat is not really close to the city center, but with metro was it without problem and we had great opportunity to see the sun rise in park guel. I am sure, we would not have this experience without staying here. Thanks.

name: Bright room in Spacious house close to Airport
summary: My home is close to the Airport (5.2km - no Airport noise) and St George Hospital (2.5km), it is half a block from the beach, 15 min walk to the Novotel Hotel in  Brighton Le sands where you can also find an abundance of restaurants, cafes and shops. You’ll love my place because of the light, airy room in our spacious house and your own  bathroom. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers and business travellers. We are on the 3rd floor with no lift.

reviews.txt: Angela was very friendly and welcoming, I had a wonderful stay in her warm house, couldn't have asked for more. Thanks Angela

Angela's place was very close to the beach, and whisper quiet from road and airport noise.

Angela keeps a beautifully kept place. It is extremely well set up for guests and very comfortable.

Coby is a real sweetie, was well behaved, and good fun.

Thanks guys for being good hosts. I would love to come back.

Angela is a great and friendly host! Had a wonderful, comfortable stay at her place. Its very clean, bed is comfortable, and the room is spacious. The room is quite with fast internet access. Very powerful hot shower, good street parking. I would definitely stay here again and caanot recommend it enough! Thank you Angela!
Very happy with my stay. Very clean and quiet. Would recommend.
Angela's house was very good. The room is clean and nice better than the pictures. And angela and her son were very kind! Nearby here, there is the brighton le sands beach. That was great also.

Angela's apartment is a great place to stay, very close to the beach, super clean, with all the convenient appliances on cooking and cleaning. Angela has good tastes on apartment decoration, such as the sweet fragrant candles and the tiny lights spread on flowers and comfortable sofa.... Angela is also a very considerate host and would like share everything with me. It's so lucky of me to meet her  when I try airbnb for the first time. Thank you, Angela
Angela is very nice. The room is very clean and the bed is very soft. Thanks for ur warm welcome. Strong recommend. I had a very nice trip in Sydney.
房东非常热情,房间非常非常干净,舒服,离海边很近,非常好,Very gool.

Was awesome! Couldn't have asked fora better stay! The room was neat and tidy with everything you could want available!! Plenty of parking and the bus stop that takes you to Sydney center is right on the corner! Thoroughly enjoyed my stay!
Everything is fantastic, more than worth!
Great communication, great location, clean and very well laid out. Angela and Cody were great hosts.

Angela was very accommodating. Place was very clean exactly as shown in the pictures. Neighborhood is nice and near to some restaurants. She even had some listings of take-away menu on the table.

Will definitely recommend to my friends who will visit Sydney.

It was great to meet Angela and be welcomed into her lovely home.  While it's not close to the city center (about 45 mins away via public transit), it's definitely close to the Airport (15 mins away) and the beach (5-10 min walk).  Uber or taxi is definitely the best way to reach this place from the airport though public transit can be an option if you have a lot of time.

Bring your strong arms as you have to take your luggage up to the third floor as they don't have a lift.  But, once you reach to her unit, you'll be rewarded with a great retreat.  The house is very clean and the room was spacious.  There's a big window besides the bed that brings in lots of natural light and there's even a TV in the room! Angela wasn't home the evening we stayed so we weren't able to converse more.  But all in all, my family and I had a very comfortable and enjoyable stay.

I am grateful to Angela for her help- I was in a rush to find a place to stay, and I am glad I found her home. She very swiftly communicated with me in regards to how to reach her home. What's more, she has a lovely, tidy, and clean home. Thank you so much for accommodating me at basically a moment's notice! Her home is not too far from the airport, which is best reached by car (I used Uber).
Very nice, clean and confortable, Angela was very nice. I did like the place.

The place is clean and cosy, I liked the  neighborhood and the bed is comfortable. You will have everything you need. Angela is a a very good host, she received us on the night quite late and was always easy to communicate with her, responsive to all my questions and give us some options to go around. You will enjoy your stay.

It was a very good stay at Angela's place. Angela was responsive and very kind to guide me the way to get to location. Place is at a good peaceful location yet with some very good views across the road. Overall a good stay!
I really enjoyed my stay at Angela's. Would strongly recommend.
Fantastic place! Location is excellent, and Angela is a great hostess. I really enjoyed staying there and would recommend it to anyone.
Angela and Coby were very accommodating and friendly. Thanks again.

name: Deniz, orman ve şehir manzaralı.
summary: 70 M2, verandalı, bahçeli müstakil konut. 1 yatak odası+salon+mutfak+banyo+teras

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Ein wunderbar magischer Ort mit einer grandiosen Aussicht, sehr ruhig und erholsam auf einer tollen Insel. Celal ist ein wunderbarer Gastgeber, der sich rührend um unser Wohlbefinden gekümmert hat und uns seine Lieblingsorte und Einkaufsgelegenheiten nahebrachte. Der beste Ort, indem wir auf den Prinzeninseln bis jetzt sein konnten.

name: Stylish, spacious, central, shared rooftop terrace
summary: Stylish, spacious two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment, located in the central Eixample neighbourhood, just a short walk from the Old City and from the gorgeous Art Nouveau district. Elegant contemporary design, high ceilings and parquet flooring are combined with modern comforts: Wi-Fi, satellite TV, and a fully-equipped kitchen. The apartment is decorated with bright colours and is full of natural light. A shared rooftop terrace is open to all guests and offers great views over Barcelona.

reviews.txt: 喜欢来巴塞罗那的朋友可以考虑去他们家哦,干净､ 设施物品齐全､可以自己做简餐特别方便,附近有地铁站,或者步行到市区都很方便

시설도 위치도 모두 만족스러웠어요 
다음에 가면 또 갈꺼같아요
Great cozy apartment in a great location.  Easy access to Metro, restaurants, supermarkets and parking lot.

Great centrally located two bedroom apartment with lots of light. The second bedroom is quite tight, but for a weekend is no problem. The little enclosed balcony space is also very nice to sit in. We were also able to store our bags on site after checkout which was very useful. I'd stay again without hesitation.
Es un sitio perfecto para alojarse en Barcelona. Limpio, espacioso y bien conectado. El trato fantástico. Recomendable 100%
Great location. Modern interior, comfortable beds. This seems to be a property owned by a management company and not an individual. I could be mistaken, but I don't think so.
Convenient and centrally located appartment! can certainly recommended.
카탈루냐 광장에서 걸어서 10분 걸립니다 위치가 매우 좋았습니다 깨끗하고 안전합니다
Mas alla del alijamiento impecable y de la zona del departamento, queremos destacar la ayuda 24hs del anfitrion y su buena atencion en todo momento. Muy contentos de la eleccion
We loved this place. Great location, updated appliances, very clean. It's a beautiful apartment, but we hardly spent any time in it. Would stay here again in a heartbeat.

A beautiful, clean, well equipped apartment in a fantastic location.  Exactly as described in the listing.  Check in was swift and efficient.  We were given plenty of tips and information by our host. Within 5-10 minutes walk of Plaza Catalunya. Plenty of shops and restaurants within a minutes walk of the apartment.  You must try the restaurant below the apartment if you stay - we had two excellent meals there.  Bring ear plugs if you are a light sleeper as there is a fair bit of road noise, as is typical for well appointed apartments in Barcelona centre.

Excellent location, very clean, modern amenities, and plenty of space. This is a perfect apartment for four people. We loved staying here. The apartment management was very helpful and allowed us to check in early. We loved exploring Barcelona from here. Almost everything is just a short walk away. It's also very close to a Metro station. We could not have been happier with this apartment

This beautiful apartment was the perfect home base for our family of four. In a very quiet neighborhood situated near wonderful restaurants and shops. Grocery store was also nearby. We had a perfect visit. Other reviews have mentioned corporate apartment. This may be the case but it did not take away from our experience. They responded quickly to all of our requests and arrange a taxi to the airport.

Location is perfect, you can reach a lot of sightseeings, shops, restaurants within 10 minutes. Host was very friendly, ready to help 24 hours a day. Apartments itself really clean and cozy, you can find everything you need. Hardly recommend!

This apartment is beautiful, with old-world detailing and modern amenities. The Metro is literally a block away and there are supermarkets, restaurants and bakeries on the same block. We were glad to have a dishwasher and washing machine as well! Highly recommend this convenient and beautiful location. As others have said, it is corporate-owned so does not have the personal feel at checkin-in but the people that helped us were are very friendly and helpful.

We were only able to stay in Barcelona for a quick 2 night, one day stay, and this Airbnb worked out perfect. It was in great location to get to where we needed to go, and most of it we could do by walking. They were very professional at check in and communication and the place was clean and had everything we needed for our quick stay.  Thanks again for everything!!
A great place to stay. Highly recommended.
Great flat, good communication. Helpful for parking too. I recommend this place.
Yaiza's place was beautiful and great for our group of girls. Towels and amenities were provided and the house was very comfortable. I'd love to stay here again!
Прекрасные апартаменты. Отличное место положение. Рекомендую для краткого пребывания в Барселоне.

name: Private Cozy Bedroom in Brooklyn
summary: Your private room is located in our family's lovely 3-bedroom condo, a welcoming space for you to call home while enjoying all that New York's five boroughs have to offer. We are artists and students of culture and will be happy to help with recommendations during your stay. We also have another bedroom listing with more space: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/135393?s=8&user_id=663764&ref_device_id=834476da76042c7d3d85486a5eaac86e8cc4de3b

reviews.txt: The reservation was canceled 27 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This was our second time staying with Karen and her family.  As was our previous experience, Karen was a great host, the room was clean and set up for us.  Karen is super helpful, always offering great advice and her place is very close to the subway. 

We returned specifically because of our great experience last time and we would definitely do it again!
Karen & Joshua are great hosts! Very helpful, easy going, open minded and respectful. The apartment is nice and near the subway. So lovely family! Thank you!!!

We enjoyed our stay at Karen and Joshua's. They had lots of tips and advices about what to do and see.
Placed closed to the subway and Prospect Park, made it a perfect location for us.
The family was talkative, but respectfully to the need of privacy.

Karen and Joshua were great hosts. Eventhough we only booked the room a couple of hours before our check-in, everything was arranged perfectly. Everything is exactly as described. The house was clean, neat and close to the subway.

We were happy we could stay with this lovely family. When we go back to New York we would definitely stay here again! Thank you Karen and Joshua.

L'ambiance du quartier nous a au début un peu surpris mais finalement aucun problème. Nos hôtes on été très accueillant même en arrivant a 1h du matin! 2 charmants bambins et un couple disponible mais pas dans nos pattes ce qui nous a permis d'aller et venir à notre guise !
Merci à eux

Karen and Joshua were fantastic hosts! I staid a short three nights. They were flexible, kind, respectful and reliable. No problem for checking in, even if I was delayed because of the bus. No rush for the check out. The room and the bed were comfortable, clean, quite perfect for what I was looking for. And for sure, having groceries, a train station and restaurants near their place was great. Nothing to complain, I appreciated my stay.

Karen and Joshua were very welcoming, and helpful when it came to information about travel, what to do and our arrival and departure times. Despite being not that close to Manhattan, and being quite small for 2 people, it was perfect for our stay. Having WiFi also made our stay very easy.

I enjoyed my stay with Karen and Joshua. They were both very kind and helped me with directions for getting around the city when I needed it. It was my second time being in New York City and my first time using Airbnb and I'm glad everything worked out smoothly.
Everything was completely fine. Hosts were very hospitable.

Karen and Joshua could not have been more gracious hosts. As advertised, they offered a private and very cozy room and gave full access to their kitchen and facilities.  They were friendly and seemed always ready to be of help if I needed it.  Moreover, they had it worked out almost to the last detail:  when I arrived they already had neat packages, clearly labelled, of take-out menus for area restaurants, they had directions to local shops and businesses - all of which were in walking distance, and they had clear directions to the nearby subways, and there was a list of house rules - none of which were unacceptable. Overall, it was like spending a weekend at a friend's place.  The neighborhood was quite busy with people and shops until late into the night, but the room was quiet, clean and comfortable.  I slept like a baby.  I would only suggest that you confirm your check in and check out times with them in advance so as to avoid any confusion. I would stay here again if I needed to take another trip to NYC in the future - for sure.

Me and my friend had a very pleasant stay with Karen and Joshua and their two lovely children. It was very special to mingle with this beautiful American family and household. The bed we slept in was more than comfortable and we experienced a lot of space in sharing the kitchen and bathroom. Highly recommended! Great neighborhood too!

My Mom and I had a stop over in NY and stayed at Karen's for one night and it was very nice. I already stayed at Karens place last year and so it was my first choice. The room is clean and the bed is very comfortable. The neighborhood has some nice places to eat and the subway is just around the corner. Karen and Joshua are super nice and Belle and Crockett are really adorable. We enjoyed our short stay and I would definitely stay there again.

Karen and her husband are very nice people and it was a pleasure to stay with them. They were very friendly, helpful and easy-going.

Everything was the way they had depicted it in the description. No bad surprises. The room and the apartment were clean and cosy.

If I should come back to NY, I would try to stay with them again.

Karen had a very quick reaction time when we needed a place to stay last-minute. The room, while small for two people, is inexpensive for the New York area. We were up and about every day we were there though, so it was not a problem. If you are not planning on staying indoors for too long, we would definitely recommend this place!

When we first exited the subway, we found the neighborhood to be somewhat intimidating, though it was later at night. Nothing happened to us, even though we came home late every night. Could be that we just needed to get used to it a little at first.

Karen and Josh were great hosts, talking to us at length on the 
subject of New York and other destinations. Very friendly people.

The room was exactly as described. A nice cozy, comfortable bed to rest my head in between venturing out into Brooklyn and beyond. Karen and Josh were very hospitable and gracious and their kids were awesome too! 
Thanks so much!!!
Appartement très proche du métro et donc très pratique ,hôtes sympatiques et accueillants .Grand lit confortable mais qui occupe presque toute la chambre ...

I stayed 3 nights at Karen and was really happy with my stay. The bedroom was tiny but nice and clean and the apartment very close to the subway and grocery / drugstore / etc. Karen and her husband are kind, respectful and helpful. I would definitely go back and recommend staying with them! 

Je suis restée 3 nuits et j'ai beaucoup apprécié mon séjour. La chambre était petite mais propre et charmante et l'appartement vraiment près du métro et des services. Karen et son maris sont gentils, respectueux et très serviables. J'y retournerais et recommanderais de rester avec eux!

I had a great stay at Karen place and her family. She is very kind and available. She makes you really confortable. Her family is really lovely!
It's easy to go to Manhattan from her place.
I recommend this place to everyone who want to visit New-York.
Thanks

Our stay at Karen´s place was totally with no problems. She was very helpfull, the room was clean and the whole family is friendly. Have no negative feedback, it is also good reachable with the subway. We also come to Newark and left from JFK airport and went to two NHL games in NJ and Nassau, all with no need of cab, everything can be done with cheap and quick transport ;)

name: cozy house and garden in the heart of Montréal
summary: House at the heart of Montréal. Cosy apartment, 2 bedrooms, one living room, calme street, close to Downtown, the Plateau-Mt Royal and Hochelaga. Métro, café and stores 10m away. A HUGE garden. Cat present! :)

reviews.txt:
Teodora was a great host! She contacted me before we arrived to prepare us for the checking in process. She was very accommodating our rushed arrival (we had dinner res.!) and had a great printout regarding any questions we might have about her home. 

We really enjoyed her cat Tsitsou. I have a cat allergy but she was so friendly and hospitable that I even managed to give her a few good pats. Teodora's place is very clean, so my allergic reaction was minimal. 

The location is great. It's less than a 10 min walk to the Metro and very easy to find street parking. We enjoyed the garden space very much. We sat out there one late afternoon and felt as though we were truly Montreal residents!

One suggestion I make (which is NOT a deal breaker) is perhaps a small fan in the guest room. The windows are not very big, and we kept the door closed, to keep Tsitsou out, and it got stuffy pretty quickly. 

I will be giving Teodora a 10/10 and we hope to come back to visit soon!
On a eu un excellent séjour chez (Website hidden by Airbnb) maison est jolie et accueillante et elle a tout ce qu'on a besoin...en plus elle est proche de tout!

Teodora was very friendly and showed us around her home and garden. Her home was in the perfect spot and it was very easy to get around in her neighborhood. Her home was very clean and exceeded our expectations. It was the perfect place to stay for a few nights!
The host canceled this reservation 15 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Fantastic place and host, Teodora was very helpful listing some great places for us to checkout. Would certainly come back again! Tsi-Tsu was also adorable and great company

name: Large railroad style 3 bedroom apt in Manhattan!
summary: Spacious 3 bedroom apartment. 2 are railroad style (must go through one to get to the next) and the additional bedroom is at opposite end of the apartment for extra privacy. Well equipped open kitchen. Large living room with additional fold out couch. Great apt for a weekend in NYC.  10 min walk to Central Park.

reviews.txt: Spectacular, the host was so kind and his apartment is beautiful, I enjoyed be there, the bed is so comfortable and the apartment is really clean...

Vict's apartment is very nice and the supermarket just next to it! It is very convenient for us to buy anything that we need. The only problem is the apartment is little far from midtown, so if we take Uber to go home, it usually costs a lot.

L.appartement de Vick est très (Website hidden by Airbnb) décoration symphonie et très bien entretenu. Il ne manquait rien pour nous 4 et nous avons passé un agréable séjour et appartement bien situé pour visiter New York.
Vick was very friendly, flexible and welcoming. The apartment has very good connection to the city center (bus, subway) and a shopping mall is in close neighborhood. We enjoyed our stay in NY!

Vick was a great host very understanding and helpful. The place certainly took some getting used as it is quite narrow but the space was big enough for 9 of us. The place had a fully stocked kitchen, bathroom with shower and bath, a mac and a tv with apple tv. The neighborhood was good it was a 10 minute walk to the nearest subway station and a short walk to central park.
The apartment was very nice, clean and near to the metro. It was really great to stay at this place.

Vick was an excellent host. he was very flexible with my last minute changes and made sure I had everything I needed. he's pretty laid back so everything went smoothly. 
The appartment was nice, very close to grocery stores and transportation.  
I spent an excellent time in NYC and loved Vick's place. 
Thank you man. 
Joad
Overall great location and experience for what we were looking for. Surrounding area is slightly questionable late at night. No complaints about the space.

Vick was easy to contact.  We aligned on a time to arrive and leave and there was a lot of flexibility.  Great host, apartment was described well and really quiet inside despite being in a city.  Thanks

Vick was very easy to communicate and has been honest from the first contact to the last. His house was clean and had enough space for 7 people. He was also very flexible with our last minute changes. He was kind to check-in with us throughout our visit. His house is great for large groups with good service and affordable price in NYC. Overall, he made our first Airbnb experience great. I'd love to stay again.

Our stay at Vicks apartment was amazing. Vick always responded quickly to any questions I had and was very helpful with everything. His apartment looks exactly how it does in pictures but even nicer in person. He was also very flexible with check-in and check-out times. I would definitely stay here again.
Vick's place is really nice and spacious. Vick is really a nice person and he has a flexible check in and out time.
Was a great host. Got everything we needed!

Vick's place was just as described in the pictures. We were so happy that the space was clean and in a decent neighborhood.
