I traveled with three other guest and we all had plenty of room to sretch out. The two living areas were used as additional sleeping place which we ended up using. Rooms in the house were on separate ends making for more privacy. 
My flight had been delayed multiple times, Vick was nice enough to allow my guest to check in without me. He and his sister, Maria were very fast in responding to our needs and even checking on us to make sure we were okay. 
Due to late flight departure, both Vick and Maria allowed later check out times to accommodate us. I would recommend this spot for small groups and I would love to stay here again! 
Thanks so much! Trip successful!

Great Location with supermarkets close by and only 5-10 minutes walk to the subway station. Two bedrooms with comfy beds and towels. Good shower and a living room. Old building with little light but that was no problem for us. We enjoyed our stay very much.
A great apartment for groups and wonderful communication from the hosts.
Vick was a great host.  Extremely easy to get a hold of and immediately responded to any questions.

We loved this place! Very clean and slept 3 very comfortably. There’s a shopping center across the street with a Costco, Marshall’s, Old Navy which was great. Will definitely try to stay again next time I’m in the area.
整体来说一般,地段位置还算不错,距离市中心和景点二十多分钟车程｡房子本身感觉不好,房屋格局就像走廊一样的,长条形,只有两端两个房间有门,私密性一般｡只有一个很小的浴室,非常不方便,不适合大家庭入住｡床单和毛巾显得老旧,而且房屋没有洗衣机,对于多日入住的旅客,毛巾不能换洗很麻烦｡我们住的房间床单有黄色痕迹｡房东还算不错吧｡价格并不便宜,性价比很低,个人觉得酒店会好很多｡要求不高的可以尝试｡

Vick was an AMAZING host. He checked in frequently, quickly responded to any questions, and was super nice. The air bnb is very cozy & has plenty of bed space. I would definitely stay at this air bnb again.

name: Sydney Olympic Park High Level Stunning View Apt
summary: This brand new two-bedroom apartment with 2 bathroom at high level of the iconic Australia Tower in the heart of Sydney Olympic Park. Our place is welcoming. It contains 2 urban design bedrooms with buitl-in wardrobes. It could accommodate up to six adults, the ensuite room and the second room are both with band new Queen size bed can fit two people comfortably, the sofa bed in the living room can convert to Queen size bed, if necessary.

reviews.txt: Our crew stayed here for a business trip for Supanova Popculture event. It was great, spacious and walking distance to everything. Parking was a breeze, restaurants around the area and a convenience store. You even get 10% off at the restaurants when you mention your a resident.

Nicole was an amazing host. The apartment was perfect and even better than the pictures. Excellent location to see a show at Sydney Olympic Park. 
Highly recommended

From the first email to Nicole, it felt like I was talking to a friend. She was so welcoming and helpful, and responded quickly to every request. On arrival I was met at the elevator with a big smile and the key. My surprise when I walked in the door was immense! The apartment is beautifully appointed, fresh spotless linen, a bowl of fruit, chocolates, and even an array of teabags and biscuits to have with my coffee. Such a lovely surprise. It's a spacious apartment with two beautiful bathrooms and amazing views. Even a large balcony with deck chairs. This apartment truly had everything we needed. There was a chemist near the ground floor doors, and a convenience store as well; coffee shops and cafes are nearby, and an excellent DFO shopping centre nearby (within walking distance; 1.3km I think).  I recommend this apartment to you without hesitation. Thanks Nicole! We'll be back!

For a family of 5 the apartment was excellent with a fantastic view.   Everything you need is supplied and Nicole is a perfect host.  It is close to restaurants, public transport and sporting events. Highly recommend.
Really nice apartment - everything was clean & comfortable!

A great place to stay. Close to everything in Olympic Park (including being around the corner from the train station), and a phenomenal view. From the lounge room as well as both bedrooms and balcony you can clearly see every major sporting venue. And what's better is it's only roughly a 10 min walk to any one of them, making it incredibly easy to access any one of them with ease. 

The apartment itself was very clean, with a modern look and feel, and had everything we needed. And whilst we didn't actually meet Nicole, her communication was excellent and she was very accommodating when we had a couple of extra guests show up at late notice wanting to stay, and she allowed us to have a late checkout.

All of this for a great price.

Thanks Nicole. I would definitely stay there again.

We stayed in the apartment for an even held at Qudods Bank Arena. It was the perfect location, we were able to duck out for a quick shop to the DFOs and a quick easy walk to our event. 
The apartment was excellent the beds were really comfy and having 2x bathrooms suited us well.

Nice touches with fresh fruit, porridge and sweets.  Not set up with cooking ingredients or milk etc.  Lovely modern unit, far better than staying at one of the nearby expensive hotels.  Lots of restaurants in walking distance.  Host was easily contactable and understanding when we left the key in the wrong mailbox.
Was really good staying with Nicole, whe was very easy to conect with and her housr was very clear and organized with everything I needed and well located, super happy, thanks Nicole x

Good location but no supermarkets nearby - only expensive convenience stores. There was a fire alarm on one of the days which shut down the elevator all day requiring us to climb 18 flights of stairs. Other than that we had a good stay.
This is a lovely 2 bedroom apartment on the 11th floor overlooking Sydney's Olympic Park. Plenty of room and nice amenities.
Definitely a great place to stay, such a beautiful apartment. Thank you so much for ur kindly host Nicole :)

Really enjoyed our stay.  The apartment was clean and comfortable with great facilities and had everything we needed.  Very convenient location.  Host was easy to contact and deal with.  Will definitely be staying again when next in the area.
Great communication! Great location with great price! Thank you Nicole and Vicky!
Everything good^^

Nicole had fantastic communication leading up to and during our stay. The apartment was much bigger than represented in the photos and was in a perfect location accessing event venues around Olympic Park. Would easily recommend and stay again... Thanks for making our trip so easy Nicole !!

On entering the apartment we knew straight away we would have a great stay. There was fruit and chocolates in a little bowl, a large and after our journey from Adelaide and working out the train system to get to the apartment we were exhausted and instantly felt welcomed, exactly what we needed. We were there for the Australia Dance Festival which was exactly what Nicole had said just a short 10min walk, so fantastic for our needs. Perfect location with a couple of great places to eat a pharmacy and a convenience store just at the bottom of the apartment building.
We would definitely stay again when visiting Olympic Park.
Thanks Nicole!!

Loved arriving to a wonderful view, top notch apartment with everything you could need on hand. It was very well kept, immaculate and well stocked with tea, coffee, basic pantry items, bathroom and laundry products.  We were 2 families staying together and needed to co-ordinate our outings as there is only one car parking key, that is the only downside.

Apartment was really well positioned and nicely appointed. Could not fault anything during our stay and the nice touches like fresh fruit on arrival was appreciated. 
Thanks Nicole we will be back.
I would highly recommend this apartment. Clean, modern, comfortable and better than expected. Friendly host who spoilt us with biscuits and great communication at all time. We will be back!

name: Hibiscus Hideaway in Kihei
summary: This beautiful one bedroom one bathroom cottage is completely brand new and is kept immaculate. Tile floors throughout, granite counter tops in the progressive yet traditional fully appointed kitchen and state of the art appliances.

reviews.txt: Loved staying here! My first time to Hawaii and Maui Island so I really didn't have much of an idea where everything was apart from approximations using a map. The location is perfect! Right near the ocean/ beach, key spot to get to the airport or other parts of the island. Additionally, Samantha thought of everything right down to ensuring there is a hookup for a hose off the driveway so you can wash the sand off your feet. I will definitely stay here again!
Hibiscus Hideaway is a great place to stay. It's very well located and it has everything you need for a pleasant stay in Maui. Aloha.

In a few words perfect, in a great location and reasonably priced.  The pictures do not do it justice.   It is truly an oasis. Before you enter at the cottage, there is a beautiful stamped concrete patio complete with outdoor dining area and separate sitting area for relaxing with your morning coffee or afternoon cocktail.    There is a very nice feeling of privacy provided by a privacy wall and a line of small palm trees that separates the property from the property next-door. There is a full kitchen, a beautiful bathroom, separate bedroom, and living room with flatscreen television and pull out couch.    They provided boogie boards, a cooler, two beach chairs, a Sunbrella,. Everything was clean, even the barbecue.   I would certainly stay there again if I had the opportunity to return.
We had a very pleasant stay in this apartment. Very comfortable. Convenient location. We loved it!

Samantha's little hideaway is fantastic!  Very cozy!  The place has been updated with all of the amenities you need.  Plus, all of the little touches make it a great say.  From the island magazines to help find good recommendations to the island map sitting out to help you find your way, Samantha put a lot of effort to make the stay very welcoming.  The place is on a small side street in north Kihei which is out little outside of the main town area, perfect for what we were looking for.  A short walk from the beach where you can see the sunset, but also very central on the island to get around.  Definitely would stay here again.

Mahalo!

This place was absolutely perfect! Everything was just as shown in the pictures. The cottage is very clean and comfortable. All that you could need was provided (towels, beach chairs, washer/dryer, kitchen items, etc.) The neighborhood is very peaceful and I enjoyed having breakfast on the private patio. On my last day I went to the big beach in Makena that was recommended by Samantha and it was wonderful. I would definitely stay here again!
Good place to stay.
Perfect location. Beautiful place, excellent host.
Great place in a beautiful location

It was our first visit to Maui, Hibiscus hideaway is an excellent place as pictured, with everything thought of as mentioned in other reviews and conveniently located to all places in Maui. Despite last minute booking the place was ready and Samantha responded within few minutes to all clarifications.

name: Mike's House- Uilani Room
summary: Our home is a 4bd older style home that has been in the family since 1935. Private room, with full size bed and partial bathroom. We are 7-10 walking distance to Paia town with lots to see and eat. There is off street parking and WIFI.

reviews.txt: Mike's house is a great and budget friendly place to stay, very close to the cool and relaxed downtown of Paia, away from any resort and big tourism area. Best of all Rina is a very nice person who helps you with any question and makes you really feel at home! She helped a lot for our children with many toys and stroller. Now as we are gone our daughter wants to go back to the lanai with the toys. Thanks Rina for everything!

We stayed one week in Mike's House and really enjoyed every second of it. Our room was spacious and nice and the balcony was perfect to have breakfast in the Hawaiian sun. 
The location is great for all kind of trips, and Paia downtown is in walking distance.
Rina provided us with everything we needed, including towels, guides and even a barbecue :)

Thanks again, Rina!!
Rina is wonderful. it is a beautiful place in Paia. It`s the best house to make holiday. Price and service is top!

Our 3-night stay at Mike's House to end our trip in Maui was perfect. Rina is very kind and helping, and the location is great, especially if you want to see the big waves of the north shore or drive the road to Hana. The restaurants and shops of Paia are a short walk away. Our room was well equipped and clean. Thanks Rina!

My husband and I enjoyed 3 nights at Mike's House.  We highly recommend staying there as it was clean, affordable, and walking distance to the beach, shops and restaurants.  Most importantly, however, was the Aloha Spirit that we felt from Rina.  Thanks for a great stay.  We'll be back!

Rina was simply a great host. Like supplying some of the little items that make a big difference when traveling. In our case beach towels, beach chairs, back pack, and bag cooler.

The house was clean and well looked after. The friendly atmosphere was also a plus.

Paia is centrally located and close to the airport. It is a young vibrant area.

The only con I can think of was the bed was a double bed and we are used to something bigger.

Bruce and Shelley

Rina was an excellent host and provided everything I needed, and so was the place, great location, plenty of space and all the amenities I needed. Will definitely come to Rina again when back in Paia.

It was very nice to stay at Mike`s House. Rina is very friendly and she does so much that the people feel well at her place. 
I would definitely come back to this place… 
Thank you so much for everything Rina

Der 6 tägige Aufenthalt in Mike's House war sehr angenehm. Wir würden jederzeit wieder dort wohnen. Das Zimmer war sauber und kann jedem weiter empfohlen werden, sofern einem kleinere Lärmbelastungen nicht stören (z.B. krähender Hahn).

Rina war eine sehr nette und hilfsbereite Gastgeberin. Bei unserem Trip auf den Haleakala stellte sie uns sogar Fliesdecken zur Verfügung.

Unser Zimmer verfügte über eine eigene Toilette, Lavabo, Kühlschrank und Mikrowelle. Die Dusche befand sich in einem Gemeinschaftsbad. 

Nebst Badetüchern und Strandstühlen waren auch Shampoo und Douche bereitgestellt.

Für Dollar 1.50 konnte man die Maschmaschine inkl. Maschmittel benützen. Gedeckter Parkplatz vorhanden. 5-minütiger Fussmarsch bis ins Zentrum von Paia.

It was nice.  It would have been nice to have an air conditioner in the room though.  It gets very hot in Maui, even at night, starting in early May and on.  The rooster in the neighbors yard woke us up in the morning.  If we had an AC we could have shut the door instead of leave it open for the breeze.

But Rina was great and super helpful.  They had a big fridge in the common kitchen we could use, tons of cookware and stuff.  They also left us some beach towels and picnic bags we used for our trips.  That was super helpful!

Staying at Rina's place was very nice. We loved Paia with the little shops, supermarket and restaurants. Especially that you can walk to these places from home is very good.
The double bed we had was a little too small for two adults so we shared the bed with our daughter. 
Rina was very helpfull with tips and every day we saw her in case we had any questions.
Ho'okipa was our favorite beach were green sea turtles coma ashore almost every day to rest.
Mike's House is a really great place to stay. Rina was very friendly and helpful. The  location of the house is really good to travel around the island. I recommend it :)

We really much enjoyed staying at Rinas place! The room was clean and Rina provided us with everthing we needed. They helped us with everything we needed help with and even when our car broke down Rina and her husband were more than helpful! Paia is a cute little town, everything is within walking distance (grocery, restaurants, beach, yoga...) Thank you very much for the late check out end everything, we would definetely stay here again!

très bonne adresse, pas loin à pieds du centre de paia et de sa jolie plage.
chambres propres et fonctionnelles, cuisine bien équipé, internet efficace.
rina est extrêmement gentille et hospitalière.
encore une fois, une très bonne adresse.
Hoku is a very thoughtful and kind host. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at his/her place.

Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Rina, qui est aux petits soins avec ses visiteurs. La chambre est agréable et l'emplacement idéal pour accéder  Paia à pied, tout en étant à l'écart de la circulation.

Rina is a great host and we enjoyed our stay there. The location is very easy to find and has everything we need. The house itself is an old one but the rooms are relatively clean, great value for the money.
매우 깨끗하고 모든게 잘 갖춰져있는 집이였어요~ 호스트도 매우 친절하고 기쁘게 맞이해주었습니다!

Rina was an amazing host, she did everything to help me with clear indications to find the bnb. The house was very very clean, she work's hard! I had such a great time there and talking with her.
The house is very well located, close from the boutiques, Mana grocery which is great, beaches, restaurants. 
Felt very safe in the place too and it was calm and cozy :-)
Wish I will be able to go back!

Everything you need to feel at home. Our room had a half bathroom (toilet) and sink. Big room and a private patio to boot. Hoku had everything ready and the communication was excellent. 

The house is located in the small town of Paia, a small little place with food a quick walk down the street. Paia is in the middle of the island so equally convenient to get to Lahaina or Hana.

Amenities for everything you can need. Full kitchen, clean towels, coolers, etc 

Great value and comfy living. Thanks Hoku!

name: Sunny appartment on the Plateau
summary: Great apartment located in the heart the Plateau/Mile-end neighbourhood.  The perfect place to relax AND enjoy all of what Montreal has to offer :) !!  I look forward sharing with you my favorite spots and perspectives about this town and province!

reviews.txt: Staying at Sabrina's place in the Plateau neigborhood was the best experience I've ever had as my second time visiting Montreal because she was resourceful and helpful in suggesting to my mother and I for us to go to such as trendy restaurants and places to see in Montreal but most of all her apartment was clean and had everything I needed. I would strongly recommend others to stay at her place. Thank you Sabrina for everything.

Sabrina was a very nice woman who was extremely helpful. Her apartment is in a very safe neighborhood and was close to shops restaurants. I was told I could choose a room. When we arrived she had placed us in the less apealing room, which was the guest room.  I was more then happy to be there as we were right next to the bathroom and I would have felt very odd taking over her bedroom.  She let us use her condiments which was greatly appreciated. We cooked a lot and she was very respectful of giving us space that we were seeking.  Overall the price was awesome the area was great Sabrina was very cool and so is her decor in her home!  Ten times better than a hotel. Home away from home!

This is a tidy and nice place in the Montreal downtown. The apartment is in a calm and quiet street. However by 5 minutes walking you can experience the French essence of Montreal, cafe bistros, restaurants, bars, etc. Sabrina is a great host, very friendly with a nice personality. I recommend staying in her place.

Sabrina is an AMAZING host! The apartment is clean and in a great neighborhood (it is very close to downtown, old montreal, etc.) She was very helpful in providing us with information about the city, places we can go, etc. Overall staying with Sabrina was hassle free and super easy which allowed us to enjoy the beautiful city of Montreal!

Sabrina was such an excellent and warm host! She was very helpful in giving us details of places to go, to eat, etc., and she even left a map for us to use. Her place is really clean and beautiful. It is near Park LaFointaine and the colorful and interesting stretch of Mont Royal. We really enjoyed our stay at her place and more than that, we really enjoyed meeting her! Merci beacoup Sabrina! : )

The apt is very comfortable. I have everything I need even the condiments. Sabrina is a passionate, inspiring host. With a art history degree and humain system invention degree, she has extend knowledge of cuture difference which is very helpful for a new immigrant to Quebec. Thank a lot Sabrina.

Foi excelente a minha hospedagem no apartamento de Sabrina, ela é bastante acolhedora e foi muito gentil, me apresentou um pouco da cidade e do bairro. Eu não conhecia Montreal e Sabrina me ajudou muito, passeando comigo em algumas ruas e me dando atenção e informações importantes!  
Recomendo a todos (as) hospedarem-se em seu apartamento, o qual é muito limpo e fica em uma rua tranquila.

Isabel Lima - BRASIL

Sabrina is an incredible hostess! Her apt is so lovely, really comfortable, super clean, and perfectly located in the best part of Montreal. Sabrina was incredibly friendly and helpful with suggesting wonderful things to do and places to go during our stay. She gave us a map with lots of highlighted spots of places to visit. We really enjoyed visiting with her and would love to come stay with her again! Thank you Sabrina for a wonderful Montreal experience!

Sabrina has a very pretty apartment. She takes good care of it, and the apartment was clean. She was very accommodating to us, giving us a big well-thought out list of everything we need to know and do. She sent out emails and reminder or how to get to the apartment, and gave us some helpful tips on places to eat and whatnot. She even provided us with a second clean pair of bed sheets and allowed us to use pans and spices to cook (as eating out can get quite expensive!) Everything was excellent, and I would definitely recommend anyone who stays in Montreal to stay with Sabrina!
The reservation was canceled 36 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Super endroit Sabrina est une hôte sympa et très gentille et l'appartement est très bien calme et bien situé
Stylish apartment in a good location! Perhaps the only downside was the smell of cigarette smoke that filtered into the apartment. Sabrina was friendly and made check in/out easy.
Accueil super sympa! Très belle appart!

Bonjour,

Pendant ces 4 nuits chez Sabrina, on se sentait vraiment chez nous. Quand elle était là, on avait possibilité de discuter et de nous informer sur plein de choses à Montréal. 
Elle nous a bien aidé à préparer notre année ici et nous a même convié à aller faire du sport avec elle!

Merci Sabrina,

Lauriane et Julien

Sabrina et sa colocataire sont vraiment sympathique.
La chambre est super confortable et l'appartement a tout le nécessaire.
Très bon séjour pour nous.

Super séjour chez Sabrina !

L'appartement est fantastique, la chambre est assez grande, confortable.
Sabrina a été une hôte très prévenante et grâce à ces indications j'ai trouvé l'appartement vraiment très facilement.
Il est très bien situé, et très accessible, à 15 min du métro en marchant et 5 min avec le bus 97 qui passe toutes les 10 minutes.
Tous commerces à proximité.

Je recommande !
This place is great! Perfect place to stay in Montreal. Thank you Sabrina!
Wonderful apartment - even better host!! Absolutely recommend!
My experience Sabrina Mc Fadden was awesome I really enjoy it. She is a great Host.

I have spent an all week at Sabrina's home. It was a wonderful time in Montreal for me. The flat is really looks like as at the photos, it is well connected to the city centre. The zone is amazing with all the beautiful stairs which you find at almost every building.
Sabrina was very kind and helpful, she answered all my "important" questions when she returned home at the evening, gave me some very valuable tips. A rainy day, she left me an umbrella, too!! :)I am sure if I have the opportunity to return to Montreal, I will choose this appartment again :-) Thank you very much again, Sabrina! Cheers ;)

name: Stunning Oceanfront. Amazing Views. 2 Bed 2 Baths
summary: Experience Stunning Views in a large 2 bedroom private Oceanfront condo in Maui.  Property amenities include:  Beautiful Beach, 2 Pools, Hot Tub, Restaurant, Board Rentals, Tennis Courts, Mini Golf, BBQs, Washer and Dryer, 2 Gyms, and Concierge.

reviews.txt:
Raj was the perfect host from "start-to-finish!" During our stay there was never a need to contact him as his Lahaina condo was perfect. Prior to our stay, I sent Raj a couple logistical questions and he responded to each immediately plus he called twice offering assistance. 

We felt very welcome and comfortable due to Raj's warm hospitality. He sent us a detailed "Welcome Packet" which included very useful tips for our Maui adventure. The condo was 100% clean and included everything one may need to prepare meals and have an enjoyable and relaxing stay. Prior to our arrival, he actually replaced most all the kitchen items such as silverware, dishes, cooking utensils, pots and pans, etc. The furnishings (including the beds) were extremely comfortable and the panoramic view, condo grounds and beach were SPECTACULAR!!! It was especially nice having a casual open-air restaurant on the property. Served breakfast, lunch and dinner.

We're already looking forward to returning :-)

Nancy, Rich, Jeff & Robbie

Excellent views and very comfortable. Rajeev is extremely welcoming and provides excellent recommendations for dining and activities. Great communication and smooth Check-in/out process. Highly recommended!

We totally loved our stay here. Perfect spot for lots of activities and sights around Lahaina. 
The view was sensational and Raj made everything easy before and during our stay with his comprehensive guide and responsiveness. We can't wait to come back!!!
Place was awesome! Had everything posted and more

This condo was fantastic.  I love how the master has huge sliding doors that you can open up for more space or close for privacy.

Rajeev was a excellent and very personable host.  He gave us super recommendations.  I only wish we could have done them all.

We had a glitch with my name on checkin and he called me directly a short time after to check and make sure everything was taken care of.

He always responded very quickly after any email, text or phone call.  Such a great host.

The grounds were also fantastic, great pool and hot tub.  The cafe on the grounds was a great place to eat dinner or breakfast if you didn't want to drive anywhere and the beach is beautiful.

Because it's not part of the huge resorts it feels much more private, but only minutes away from great shops, restaurants and water fun.

If we ever get back to Maui, we will definitely be looking this one up again.
Rajeev's place was beautiful and he was very responsive to questions.

Rajeev's place was as depicted in the pictures and even better. The view from the private lanai was AMAZING! The unit was nicely decorated and very clean. The kitchen was fully stocked with every appliance/utensil you could imagine and more.  You had full use of beach chairs, towels,  laundry, etc. We would definitely stay here again.

The condo was the perfect location for our vacation in Maui. We thoroughly enjoyed staying here and Raj was very helpful with information before we arrived. We will most definitely stay here again, which hopefully won't be too long from now.

We really enjoyed our stay at Rajeev's airbnb. The beach was very private and filled with many opportunities to see turtles. The location was walking distance to a delicious sushi place and Maui's Brewery (highly recommend both). We were able to check in earlier than expected and the place was very clean. Rajeev was a great host and we really enjoyed our stay.

What a beautiful experience!  Raj and family were fantastic hosts to our family and we are grateful to them for sharing their beautiful home in this gorgeous resort. It's the perfect setting for a fun yet peaceful vacation. 
Raj is very responsive and thoughtful as he provided a valuable welcome packet before we arrived. It was put to good use in creating our family's itinerary! 
We were giddy from the moment we arrived to the family home and found it was exactly as illustrated in the description and more! The views are absolutely AMAZING!!! We spent many hours on the patio simply taking in the spectacular views... The family home is truly lovely and very clean.  We appreciated the notes regarding the access to wifi, the use of the laundry machines in the home, storage of beach supplies, and even check out process. A fabulous host that provided my family with everything we needed to make our stay comfortable and enjoyable!  The check-in process was so easy and convenient, the staff so warm & friendly, wonderful resort amenities. This was our first trip to Maui, and we know we will be back! This is largely due to our memorable experience staying here! 
Raj-- a huge MAHALO for sharing your beautiful home with us. Can't wait to come back!
This place was everything the pictures "describe"!! Raj was great with communication and everything was perfect! We will definitely be back!!!

Great location , great communication , great tips on where to eat and things to do.   Rajeev Went above and beyond.    Would highly recommend to anyone for a great value we felt.     Only compliant was tight parking under building but u can park out side where we had no issues.
What a beautiful place! We really enjoyed our stay in Raj's apartment!

Rajeev's place is exactly as depicted in the pictures. Clean, accessible, beautiful and calm environment. He makes it very convenient for his guests by providing coolers, beach chairs, etc. We had a great time and will definitely be back.
Raj made us feel welcome from the moment we arrived in Maui. Our family loved the room at Sands of Kahana. Beautiful room and great location. We will be back. Mahalo!

This is an EXCELLENT condo to rent. Perfect location, beautiful grounds, right on the beach, on site RESTAURANT (which serves excellent food) and that is a HUGE plus especially in the AM. Fabulous views and a beach with VERY few people. Quiet and peaceful. 8th floor provides spectacular views and a wonderful breeze and the sounds of the waves at night. Would DEFINITLY rent again!

The condo was a PERFECT place to spend a week on Maui.  The property has great amenities complete with hot tub/ pool, daily cleaned  grills for BBQing, a full serve restaurant/bar  and paddle board/Kayak/snorkel gear rentals.  

The condo's oceanfront bedroom was heavenly for hearing the waves through the screen doors and evenings on the lanai at sunset were magical.  Our 8th floor view had to be the best on the island.  Rajeev was a grest host....very attentive in his communications and recommendations.  We are excited to return again next year!!

Rajeev's condo was absolutely wonderful. It has everything you need for a comfortable stay, and the space itself is huge and very well looked after. It was spotless and we felt right at home. There are plenty of beach towels supplied which was very useful and Raj gave us great tips about local places to check out. 

The condo has THE MOST spectacular views of the beach and ocean and we spent a huge portion of our holiday soaking in the sunsets from the balcony. Just incredible. 

We also loved swimming at the beach and happy hour at the restaurant/bar downstairs. 

Can't recommend this place enough, please visit and see for yourself! Thanks Raj!

The condo is spacious and well appointed. The view is amazing! It was great having access to the pools, hot tub, tennis courts and bar/grill. We would love to go back. The owner’s communication was excellent and he provided a lot of useful info. Loved Maui!!

Everything about our stay went above and beyond our expectations.  The condo is lovely and in such a wonderful location.  We were able to whale watch, paddle board, snorkel, and hang with turtles all at the condo.  It was our favorite place to be.  Thanks for helping to make our dream vacation come true!

name: Mouzinho 244 Ap4 by RUA Apartments
summary: Ap4 is  located at Mouzinho da Silveira Street, in downtown, and in the heart of the UNESCO World Heritage Center. This apartment is on the 2th floor  and it's an apartment full of light. For privacy windows don't allow outside visibility. It has 1 bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, a dining area and a cozy living room. whith TV cable and free wi-fi. São Bento's Train Station and the Subway are just a 2 minute walk away You can see and choose  other apartments "cliking" on myprofile page.

reviews.txt: Fantastische plek, super centraal, compleet nieuw en fris appartement.  En niet te vergeten hele lieve verhuurders!
Todo perfecto

Manuela and Pedro were very welcoming! We arrived late but there was no problem, they offered us a glass of Porto and gave us a lot of tips to discover the city. The appartment is all renovated so it is very clean, functional and above all, very well located in the historical center. I recommend this place without any doubt!
Thanks again!

This appartment was perfect : clean, very well located (very centered in porto) and spacious. For sure if I come back to Porto, I'll take the same.
The host was very nice and found a solution for all of our requests.
Super appartment.

The apartment is great, excellent location and everything is brand new !
Pedro checked us in, he was very kind, told us everything we needed to know, and we even had some Porto wine at our arrival. 
The only downside was the occasional noise outside (people shouting).
Would definitely recommend !
This is a really good place to stay in Porto. Manuela's flat is very nice, well cleaned and close to the main city attractions. I'd strongly recommend it the ones visiting Porto.

Apartamento bonito y acogedor en el centro de Oporto, muy bien situado cerca de todas las atracciones de la ciudad: monumentos, barrio de la Ribera, metro, etc. Muy nuevo y limpio. Las únicas pegas: no hay ascensor ni climatización (aire acondicionado ni calefacción). Pero seguro que Manuela se encargará de acondicionarlo pronto. Es una estupenda anfitriona.

En el apartamento de Manuela y Pedro nos sentimos genial.
Una ubicación perfecta para poder llegar a todos los puntos de la ciudad de Oporto.
Manuela fue encantadora y nos esperó y nos enseñó el apartamento. Muy simpática y agradable. Las fotos corresponden con la realidad, está todo muy nuevo y limpio. 100% recomendable!

Un apartamento céntrico, limpísimo y decorado con buen gusto. Una botella de Porto te está esperando, nada más entrar. Manuela nos atendió muy amablemente en todo momento. Lo recomiendo a todo el mundo

Très bon séjour dans cet appartement parfaitement situé au centre ville. Manuela a gentillement ajouté un lit bébé pour nous et les voyageurs suivants. Pas de clim et quelques bruits dans la rue piétonne le soir, mais rien de grave. Très bon appartement.

Nous avons passé un super séjour à Porto, l'appartement est bien aménagé et est situé au cœur du quartier historique il y a donc pas besoin de voiture.
Notre hôte travail dans un magasin en bas de l'immeuble ce qui a facilité notre arrivée.

Great apartment! Ideal location in the centre of Porto: a few steps from Sao Bento station, and a few minutes' walk from Ribeira on one side, and all other main attractions on the other (Sé, Torre dos Clérigos...).
The apartment is stylish and comfortable, Manuela is a very kind host. I would definitely recommend this to anyone visiting Porto!

Our apartment was located in a renovated building that only contains airbnb properties. Its location is central, it is perfect to visit Porto, everything can be done on foot. 

Manuela was waiting for us on the tin store located on the ground floor. She was quite nice and offered us helpful advise on parking and local restaurants.

The apartment itself looks exactly like the pictures and it is big enough for a couple and a kid. It is modern and nicely decorated. The kitchen is basically equipped, don't expect to cook there but you have everything for breakfast (do buy/bring tea and coffee). The 
bedroom is comfortable. Though it doesn't overlook Muzinho da Silveira street, which is quite a busy, you can still hear some noise at night and in the morning evening but nothing too bothering.

We though it was a good price for money, especially as we booked it shortly before our arrival.
Very nice place, great location and kind host!

El apartamento es tal como muestra las fotos, esta muy limpio y muy céntrico. Manuela estuvo pendiente de nuestra llegada y al alojarnos nos recomendo sitios a los que ir y donde comer. Repetiriamos seguro.

Excelente localização, próxima do metro e pontos de interesse, confortável. Corresponde às fotos publicadas. Anfitriã nos ofereceu vinho do Porto na chegada, muito gentil, nos deu dicas e informações úteis.

L'appartement est très agréable : immeuble refait à neuf, appartement très fonctionnel, très propre, et super bien placé dans Porto. Manuela est très gentille et prend le temps de nous accueillir. Son magasin - situé en bas de l'immeuble - permet de laisser ses affaires le jour de l'arrivée ou du départ. Le seul bémol concerne la cour intérieure sur laquelle donnent les appartements 2 et 4 : elle est squattée par quelques marginaux un peu bruyants certains soirs. Nous sommes tout de même ravis par notre séjour et retournerons chez Manuela !

Everything was as described, very clean and close to the city center. 
Manuela was very kind.

Everything was excellent from the very beginning. We found the place very easily. It really is centrally located and has everything in it. We got the place polished. Manuela was very flexible with the checkin&out. The shower is fantastic, and the bed is perfect. Great place !!!

name: Wander to the Beach from a Cozy Wailea Condo
summary: Mix a cocktail in the kitchenette at this studio-style apartment, decorated in warm, earthy tones. Sip it on the private deck as geckos scuttle around banana palms, or amid lush greenery at the complex’s shared poolside dining area with BBQ grills.

reviews.txt: DO NOT TRUST THESE HOSTS. TERRIBLE RACISTS. We loved the location but the room was so small and smelt so bad. Room got no sunlight. The shower only ran cold water. The pools were all dirty and had lots of kids. Originally the post said "flexible checkout" but then it was changed randomly to 10am when the racist couple Steve and Tamara kicked us out on our last day in Maui. We had no where to go with our luggage and our flight back home was at 3pm
Great host

We absolutely LOVED this location and space. It was WAY better than we expected and the location is walking distance to the prettiest beaches, restaurants and yoga! We stayed in 4 airbnb's on Maui and this was our fave! Please drive to Makena and hang out at the gorgeous beach or take the boardwalk walks in front of the fancy hotels walking distance from Tamara and Steve's place:)
This Airbnb was absolutely perfect for us. Steve is very responsive and the flat is convenient and has everything needed for an amazing stay in Maui!
Loved the place! Amazing location! Short walk to the shops and some really nice beaches.
Great location and great home!  Highly recommend

Everything was great while staying at this cozy studio.  The condo was very clean and well kept.  There was also nice touches such as allowing us to borrow beach chairs, boogie board, etc.  And there is a washer/dryer in the condo which was great!  The complex is minutes away from the beach and a grocery store.  Pretty much everything you would need.

Our room was clean and very roomy. I greatly appreciated all the little extras that were available: beach chairs, blankets, umbrella, lunch box, ice packs, little packets of mustard for sandwiches, tupperwear, snacks, etc. We loved watching the little geckos scuttle around on the banana tree outside and listening to the birds in the morning/evening. Such a great little space, I would go back and stay there in a heart beat! (:

Amazing place to stay.  The "studio" is HUGE.  The lanai is in the back which makes it extremely private.  It was truly like having another room.  The front door also has a screen door which allows for a cross draft with the tradewinds.  The pool and grills are essentially across the driveway.   The grounds are beautifully landscaped.  The complex is extremely quiet.  The location was perfect for walking to Ulua Beach, the shops at Wailea, Wailea Center and Monkey Pod. Tamara and Steve are lightning fast to respond.  Loved staying here.

name: Monte dos Burgos - Cosy Room
summary: The neighbourhood is a quiet, family residential area, 20 minutes by bus from the historic center of Porto and 20 minutes from the beach (Matosinhos - where you may eat very GOOD fish!). You will love to stay in a very spacious, familiar and bright room, where you can enjoy a large and flowery garden, comfortable kitchen and laundry with washer and dryer machine. My space is good for couples, solo adventures, and business travelers!

reviews.txt: We had a very nice stay in the house and felt at home. The room is big and light, we had a private bathroom, could use the kitchen and the nice garden. Patricia picked us up at the station of the metro, the bus is near. Patricia and Chris are very open and welcoming people, we talked about Portugal, Fado, Porto ... Also, they gave us several tips to see in Porto. When we are in Porto again we will come back!! We really recommand to stay here. Thanks Patricia and Casimiro!
Patricia and Chris has been wonderful hosts. They help us very much with all questions we had. We enjoyed our stay very much.

Une chambre très spacieuse et une salle de bain privée : au top ! 
Christian et Patricia ont été très accueillants et nous nous sommes tout de suite sentis comme chez nous !

Des hôtes très accueillant et à l'écoute de leurs invités! De supers adresses à conseiller. 
Une maison décorée avec goût et avec une sublime salle de bain privée.
Le centre est très facile d'accès en bus car inaccessible en voiture. 
Très facile de se garer dans la rue de nos hôtes.
Un excellent rapport qualité prix!

Patricia et Casimir ont été très accueillants et nous ont donné toutes les informations pratiques pour se rendre au centre de Porto en bus. La chambre est spacieuse et la salle de bain privée est juste à coté. Le quartier est très calme et le séjour était très agréable.

name: PORTO DOWNTOWN FLATS-RIBEIRA STUDIO
summary: Porto Downtown Flats RIBEIRA STUDIO is a newly remodelled apartment, located in the most beautiful area of Porto. It is situated in Rua São Joao, in the old Ribeira of Porto, an area classified as World´s heritage. Fully equiped kitchen and wi-fi.

reviews.txt: Teresa was very welcoming and took time to explain whatever was necessary and answer questions about Porto.  The apartment was very nice - just like the photos.  When I mentioned that the apartment hadn't warmed up as much as I'd hoped, she had an additional heater brought by within hours.  The location was so easy, a block and a half from the waterfront restaurant scene, and almost as close to one of the train stations.  We were really happy with our stay!

Apartamento conforme descrito, muito bom.
Fomos bem recebidos e aconselha-se a quem queira conhecer o Porto

This is a very good location for exploring Porto. The studio is excellent - close to all the important city attractions as well to good restaurants and bars. Teresa is a great host. Although we did not meet her personally she made sure that we have everything we need plus we got excellent advice for what to do and see in Porto.
Very functional studio, great location, warm welcoming from the host.
Très bon accueil, logement agréable et très bien situé dans le centre de porto, à quelques mètres du Douro ! Super appartement pour passer un we prolongé, voir une semaine à deux !

We have had an excellent stay in this apartment. 

It is situated just a few steps from the lively historic heart of the beautiful city of Porto. Most of the things you'd like to do are within walking distance: a lot of cultural highlights, shopping, bus/metro/train and of course many Port-houses.

The apartment sits in a somewhat old building which is a contrast to the apartment itself. It has been nicely renovated and has the comfort you would want. It's spacious for a stay with two people. Most of the interior is new and functions properly. This is complemented by nice (and some antique) decorative details.
A pleasant surprise was the smell of freshly baked bread every morning in the staircase. The downstairs neighbour is a bakery where you can get good and cheap bread and your morning espresso.

We have had contact with Teresa through AirBNB, she has been helpful and kind. Tim welcomed us with a gastronomic surprise and even a list of suggestions for our stay in Porto. They are a very hospitable and helpful couple!

Thank you Teresa and Tim!

Teresa and her friend were very kind and welcomed us with a delicate surprise. They were helpful with telling us the best places to visit. The flat is very nice furnished, well equipped an next to a lively street direct in the city centre. We enjoyed our stay and would like to comeback somewhen.
Great place, so clean, great host, easy to reach and happy to please us !

This place is awesome!!
The location is great. Just a couple of mins walk downhill to Cai da Riberia on the river and all the great restaurants and bars there.
The flat itself was spotless and spacious. Perfect for the 2 of us.
Teresa's partner was there to meet us it 12.30am. Let us in, showed us around and offered us a small glass of port and a pastille de nada as a welcome. Very nice.
The bed is extremely comfortable too. Always a bonus. 
Loved this place!
One small drawback was the noise of passing partygoers in the small hours as the flat is on the a bit of a thoroughfare but seriously not a real problem as the bed was so comfortable we just dozed straight off again.
The owners checked in with us via test several times over our 3 day stay to make sure we had everything we needed and were all ok.
Can't fault it. We had a great time here. Hope to come back and stay here again sometime very soon

El departamento es hermoso, la ubicacion privilegiada y el trato de los anfitriones excelente. No se puede pedir mas cuando alguien contrata este servicio. Si alguien piensa viajar a Oporto no dude en que el departamento de Teresa sea una de las mejores opciones para contratar.

Nous avons été très bien accueilli par Tim, l'ami de Teresa, qui nous avait préparé du Porto et des pasteis de nata! L'appartement est exactement conforme aux photos, très agréable, spacieux et bien décoré (le lit est vraiment très confortable, bravo! ).  L'appartement est idéalement situé à côté de Ribeira et des quais pour les balades nocturnes...Nous reviendrons avec plaisir à Porto, cette ville est magnifique. Merci encore pour tout, Tim et Teresa.

We absolutely loved our stay in Porto. The appartement is very well located and beautifully furnished. Also, it was very (!) clean and tidy and the kitchenette is well equipped. Teresa's friend waited for us in front of the house and it was a warm welcome - they even had prepared a small surprise!
Thank you so much - we would love to visit again!

Receção impecável por parte do anfitrião. Extremamente simpático e prestável, fez-nos sentir em casa! A casa está muito bem localizada, perfeita para quem quer passar um fim-de-semana a passear no Porto

Tim's apartment has everything needed for a comfortable stay. The location is great just a few steps to the river over which life goes on:) Tim  was still available for us. He provided every essentials - for example feeding chair for my lilltle one:) We were greeted with a glass of Porto and delicious sweets which was very nice suprise;)
I can certainly recommend Tim as a hoster!
Kind Regards
Anna

Tim was so kind host.
He showed everything what we need, and he asked our feeling during our trip.
Flat was so close to river, which is so main area in Porto.
Flat was clean and neat. Shortly, perfect flat!

Tim was so kind when he showed us around the apartment.  We loved talking with him about Porto.  The location was perfect, and the views out the windows are spectacular.  We loved our time here.  The apartment had everything we needed, and we hope to be lucky enough to come back one day.

very nice place, in the heart of the old Porto. Tim is really reactive if you have any problem and really nice.
It was sometimes difficult at night because of the noise of nightlife outside especially because we had a baby, but then you are in the center so that's normal.
Appartement parfait, proche des centres d'Interets, confortable et propre. Tim nous laisse un mémo de ce qu'il faut voir et faire à Porto.

A localização é excelente, o apartamento muito aconchegante e agradável, tem todos os utensílios para você preparar sua refeição.
Da janela você tem vista para rio Douro, por lá pode desfrutar
de muitos restaurantes, bares
um lindo por do sol ...
Por fim estamos agradecidos pela recepção e todo o suporte 
oferecidos pelo anfitrião Tim.
Abs.
Sergio

El apartamento era tal cual le esperábamos. Amplio, luminoso y limpio. Tim ha sido un anfitrión genial, nos facilitó todo lo que necesitamos, y eso que viajamos con dos bebés, y tuvimos que solicitarle dos cunas. La zona es totalmente céntrica, a unos pocos metros del Duero y una gran variedad de restauración. Hay supermercado cercano. Si tuviéramos que ponerle una pega, es que al estar en pleno centro, el barrio es un poco ruidoso, pero bastante llevadero.

name: Vacances de reve à Espinho (Porto)
summary: Amoureux du nord du Portugal, nous avons acheté cet appartement à Espinho, station balnéaire à 15 kms au sud de Porto (20 minutes en train). Idéalement situé, dans le quartier des Pêcheurs, à 250 m de l'océan (vue mer depuis le séjour) et à 5 minutes du coeur d'Espinho et des commerces.  La plage d'Espinho est un des 10 meilleurs spots de surf du Portugal.

reviews.txt: Logement situé dans un quartier typique à proximité des activités de pêche. L'appartement est spacieux, fonctionnel, proche de toutes les commodités et dispose de tout l'équipement nécessaire pour passer de très bonnes vacances. Marie est une excellente hôte, attentive au bien-être des locataires. Nous avons passé un superbe séjour à Espinho, d'où nous avons rayonné sur tout le centre et le nord du pays. La proximité de la plage à moins de 5 minutes à pied permet également de très belles soirées estivales. Hôte que je te recommande pleinement!

Logement très propre, Maria nous a super bien accueillis avec des boissons fraîches dans le frigo comme cadeau de bienvenue. Marie est très facilement joignable.


Superbe expérience AirBnb, je recommande vivement ce logement. Très bon quartier pour découvrir la pêche portugaise.

Un appartement plus que parfait, une hôte   très å l écoute disponible, un accueil chaleureux de la part de Maria nous a fait nous sentir en très å l aise.nous recommandons fortement cet appartement pour son emplacement idéal, son calme, sa propreté et son prix plus que correct. Il est très bien équipé de la table à repasser å la machine à laver et sèche linge enfin liste trop (Website hidden by Airbnb) terminerai en remerciant les propriétaires pour ces vacances formidables.
Muy buen sitio

The apartment is really nice. All you need is there.
Maria is very beautiful. Thanks
Peter
Marie and Maria were very helpful. The apartment was clean and we found everything we needed. Just as described.
Una casa muy amplia con un trato muy bueno. Estancia muy amplia y limpia, tal cual se muestra en las fotos. La playa está a dos minutos andando, pueblo muy tranquilo. Hemos estado muy agusto.

Une semaine très agréable ! Un appartement très bien situez ! Avec une hôte très a l'écoute ! Un petit hic mais tout petit minuscule il manquais les première nécessité gel douche papier toilette etc ! C'est toujours mieux pour se sentir vraiment à l'aise ! A part sa rien à redire et propriétaire très gentille aussi au passage !
El alojamiento está bien, suficientemente equipado pero lejos del centro de la ciudad.

Agréable appartement spacieux pour 5 personnes.  Très bien situé près de la plage. Nous recommandons vivement.
Et sans oublier le très chameureux acceuil de Maria

Nous avons passé un agréable séjour dans cet appartement spacieux qui correspond tout à fait à l accueil d' une famille (nous étions 5 dont 1 (Website hidden by Airbnb) proximité de l'océan 5min à  pieds et des commerces nous ont simplifié les (Website hidden by Airbnb) gare (10min à pieds)nous a permis de ne pas utiliser notre voiture (rester au garage clos)de la semaine .Enfin l accueil De Maria à notre arrivée à été très chaleureux et le fait qu'elle parle Français nous a de suite mis à l aise.
Petit resto pas cher (6 euros le menu avec boisson)en bas de l appartement ou la cuisine est familiale et traditionnelle nous a beaucoup plu!!!!
Nous recommandons cet appartement
Excellent séjour, appartement très agréable !

Apartament czysty, zadbany i dobrze wyposażony. Bardzo wygodne łóżka. Idealny na pobyt wypoczynkowy w wakacje. Pani Marie szybko odpisywała na wiadomości, a wskazówki zostawione dla nas były bardzo pomocne - polecone super restauracje z pysznym i tanim jedzeniem. Gorąco polecam :)
I was happy to stay here. Apartment was big and clean. Location was also good, near cafes, beach, train station. Host helped with any questions.

Logement impeccable, Pres de toutes commodités . 
Situé à 200m du superb spot de surf d'espinho. 
Marie vous met à disposition un petit guide ou tout est bien expliquer , ainsi que conseil des bonnes adresses , resto, visite à effectuer. 
Bref je conseil vivement.
Nice treatment and attention, high recommendable!!
Nous avons passé un tres bon sejour. Accueil super et appartement tres bien equipé

A 15 min. a pé do centro de Espinho e da estação de comboios. Casa boa para grupos, fomos 7 e coubemos perfeitamente. A cozinha está bem equipada. Ambas a Maria e a Marie foram muito simpáticas e muito acessíveis. Uma ótima estadia!

Nous avons apprécié:
- les informations précises des lieux, commodités, guide touristique, ...
- Proximité de la plage.
- proximité des axes Porto, Aveiro, Braga, ...

name: The Porto Concierge - Beach Manor
summary: Totally renovated and fully furnished apartment with sea view in vibrant Porto beach area. Lots of bars, restaurants and shops are just around the corner.

reviews.txt:
A estadia no Beach Manor excedeu as expectativas. O apartamento tem condições ótimas de habitabilidade, é espaçoso e apresenta bons acabamentos de reconstrução. Os equipamentos de cozinha são de boa qualidade, o mobiliário e a decoração de bom gosto.
A localização do apartamento na Foz do Douro, o passeio marítimo, os seus jardins, as esplanadas e as praias, tornam este lugar privilegiado.
Voltaremos por todas estas razões e pela simpatia da assistente que nos recebeu, o diligente apoio telefónico do Jorge e o profissionalismo da Concierge.

We enjoyed our stay here very much!  The place was very clean and comfortable.  It was right by the ocean, shops, grocery store, restaurants and bars.  The flat was modern and new.  Highly recommended.  Transportation (bus) nearby.   Wonderful!

We stayed at the appartment for 5 days and had a nice stay. It's nearby the sea in a quiet area of porto. You find everthing you need, even for a longer stay. There's a washing maschine, dish washer, mirco wave etc. 
We enjoyed our time there and would go book again! The only negative point: we had to wait a long time in front of the appartment to get our keys, because of an organisational missunderstanding - annoying but I guess it isn't usual.

The apartment is exactly like on the photos: clean, modern, right next to the beach and spacious enough for a family of four. The bathroom and bedrooms are very nice and big. Super market is two minutes walking from the apartment. Porto city center is a 15 minute bus ride away. Communication with the host was always fast and clear. We were even provided with a welcoming gift! 
There are, however, two downsides: the apartment is not equipped with an airconditioner or fan (which is not disastrous, but it can get pretty hot if you're not used to Portugese summers), and sounds from upstairs neighbours and the busy road it lies on can be heard at night. If you're a light sleeper, I suggest taking soundproof earplugs with you. 
Otherwise, it's a beautiful apartment if you want to enjoy both the city center of Porto and the beach!

Beautiful appartement on a great spot very close to the beach. Just a 1 minute walk. Unfortunately the noise of the traffic near the house was load. Take the historical tram to the old city of Porto,  it is very convenient. Many good restaurants in the neighborhood. The interior of the apartment is very new.  Good beds, bathroom nice and clean. Great. We loved our stay in this great place.

Très bel appartement, propre, spacieux, bien situé et très bien équipé.  Stationnement pour la voiture toujours disponible à proximité. Nous sommes enchantés et le recommandons vivement à tous. Merci à Jorge. Si nous séjournons une nouvelle fois à Porto, nous y reviendrons avec beaucoup de plaisir. Merci  à Jorge pour tout.

The apartment is really spacious and new with a dishwasher and a washing machine. It is although quite noisy mainly because of the road. As we were staying already in Porto we asked if it was possible to drop off our luggage before 14 o clock which wasn't possible and check in wasn't complety easy but overall it was good.

I stayed only 2 days but the way I was welcomed was perfect with on top of it a big bottle of wine, of water and a map of Porto... What more can you ask for?
The apartment was very nice and as described on the pictures :
with 2 rooms with double beds. 
A nice bathroom with a big shower and a toilet 
+ an additional separate toilet .
The kitchen was well equipped with everything needed .
The neighborhood was very nice and really close to the beach ( 1 minute walk true a little tunnel) 
Perfect for running or biking along the coast 
At least 2 supermarkets in the same street and bakeries+
Less than 15' minutes drive to the airport and 15' to city center .
Many different buses + the old tramway and double decks hop on hop off buses .
The perfect place to stay if you want to combine beach holidays and visits .
Le quartier est très sympa, à 100m de la plage. L'appartement est grand et lumineux, avec vue sur l'océan. Nous avons vraiment beaucoup apprécié cette expérience !

We met Renato at exactly the time that we had planned. He was very helpful and explained all the necessary information to us, supermarket, bakery,cafés, transport into the Centre of Porto etc. The place is in a great location just one minute from a very pretty beach and the local people nearby were very friendly and helpful.
Jorge and his team were great. Thank you for a lovely relaxing time.

It was my third time in Porto and I wanted a place around the Foz area cause I really like it there. Lots of parking available and quite a lively area with spectacular bars/restaurants right on the beach (the beach is not the best though)

Jorge's place is, quite frankly, spectacular. A 2 bedroom appartment with absolutely everything you may need. We even cooked there and it felt like home.

The style of the place is very modern, comfy leather couch and all. The host was very punctual and we had no problems at all

As a summary, I certainly recommend both the place and the host. It was a pleasure and I am already looking forward to being back there again

Très bel appartement très bien situé. 
Spacieux, propre, confortable, je le recommande.

The apartment is absolutely fantastic! It is only steps from the beautiful beach area of Foz do Douro and was very spacious and clean. Jorge was great with communication and always available if needed. If you are looking for a nice place to stay in Foz, then I would recommend this place.

O apartamento é fantástico, muito bem equipado e confortável. Localizado na melhor zona do Porto com estacionamento fácil e gratuito  nas proximidades o que nos permitiu quase sempre andar a pé. 
Fomos com o nosso bebé e tivemos apenas um problema com o aquecimento que só pode ser regulado centralmente e por isso a casa estava sempre feia, e só ficou resolvido no ultimo dia de 4. Tirando isso uma estadia foi perfeita. Recomendamos.
O apartamento é muito confortável, com uma vista ótima e muito bem equipado. As camas sao muito confortáveis.
A equipa do Porto Concierge ofereceu-nos à chegada uma garrafa de água e de vinho para melhorar o ótimo serviço de acolhimento.
Vamos repetir!

Our stay here was really great. From the moment we checked in they were very attentive and had very open communication. The property looked exactly as it did in the pictures, I would even say it was better. There was a lot of space, the kitchen was very well stocked and clean. There was an extra half bathroom, which we weren't expecting but was very nice to have. And the bedrooms were big, very nicely decorated, and the beds were fantastic. My group and I really enjoyed our stay here and would not think twice before staying here again!

This condo is just as described. It's in a great location near public transit and if you prefer to just hang about the neighborhood it's a few steps out the front door. The condo is modern, clean and quiet. And the beds are super comfy!
zona agradavel do Porto
Lovely,clean apartment. Very modern. Very comfortable beds.

We had a very enjoyable stay at Beach Manor. The flat was as bright as advertised and very convenient for two couples. The location was perfect, with restaurants and shops within walking distance and handy public transport to the centre of Porto. We had no issue finding parking spots on the street for our car. On the (minor) negative side, we thought a second set of keys should have been provided when the place is for two couples and you require the key to get out of the building. The washing machine did not tumble dry clothes so a dryer would have been handy. Last I had to fix the TV myself as it was not working, but in the end we never watched it anyway :-)

It is a very nice and comfortable appartment very well located if you like beach and walking. No metro station around but there is a good bus connection with the city centre and Matosinhos area if one wants to visit more than Foz quarter. 
I can recommend this offer.

name: Peaceful Apartment near Casa da Música
summary: Our apartment is in the city center and one of the noblest areas of Porto. It is next door (about 50m) to Casa da Música of architect Rem Koolhaas authorship where you can see building uniqueness as well as benefit from quality, diverse and constant programming . It is very close to public transport, shopping and access to and from the city. Despite being very well located and central it is extremely quiet and peaceful, ideal for vacation for two or for a some family days.

reviews.txt: It was great to stay at this place, it looks like the pictures show, works well for one or 2 people, very comfortable and in a good location. I was able to easily get to where I needed to go, and was also easy to just walk around. The apartment itself was clean and cozy, Rita was very friendly upon arrival and always responsive when I had any questions, before, during and after my stay. Definitely recommend staying here!
very nice and available

Rita no pudo recibirnos en casa, pero envío a una compañera muy amable que nos ayudó en todo lo posible.
La casa es muy acogedora y llena de detalles que la hacen especial (como la fruta o el café)
El barrio es tranquilo y queda a una media hora andando de las zonas más turísticas.
La recomiendo!

Rita fue muy amable y comprensiva ante nuestras necesidades en todo momento ! El apartamento es muy acogedor, está todo muy limpio y en perfecto estado. Se sitúa en una zona muy buena con todos los servicios necesarios próximos.Totalmente recomendable.
The apartment was so well-located and cosy, we loved it! Rita was very nice and attentive. Would definitely repeat!
干净利落的小房子,面积不大,但很温馨,用具用品齐全,房主热情,出行方便,红色大巴站离得很近,音乐厅广场很适合孩子玩,如果有洗衣机就更好了｡

Nos alojamos mi familia y yo, en total tres personas, en el apartamento de Rita durante tres noches.
Rita no pudo recibirnos, pero vino Cristina, que fue muy amable y nos explicó todo con claridad.
El apartamento estaba limpio y provisto de todo lo necesario para el día a día teniendo de todo para cocinar:vajilla, aceite, sal...
A su vez tenía productos de limpieza y de higiene personal.
Está ubicado a menos de cinco minutos andando de la parada de metro de Casa de Música.
Si volviéramos a Porto, repetiremos.

Vérifier s'il n'y a pas de travaux en cours dans l'édifice
Si les lumières de passages fonctionnent bien ?
Ótimo lugar para passar as férias.
Petit appartement, propre, endroit calme pas très loin du métro, mais à une bonne distance des principaux attraits touristiques de Porto.
Rita foi uma excelente anfitriã. Nossa estadia foi maravilhosa. O apartamento é aconchegante, perfeito para nossos 15 dias no Porto. Recomendamos muito. Obrigado Rita!

Bem localizado, espaçoso.
Boa relação custo - beneficio.

Appartement propre et très bien situé pour visiter Porto en quelques jours ! Communication excellente de la part de l'hôte (réactivité). Le logement est conforme au descriptif, vous pouvez réserver en toute confiance. 

L'appartement est proche de tout : commerces, station de métro, bus, casa de musica (je vous y recommande un concert !), aéroport. 
Très pratique pour pouvoir rayonner dans les différents endroits à visiter sur Porto .

I enjoyed my stay at Rita's apartment. It was clean, cosy and the location was great, just 50 or so metres from the nearest metro station. Rita was a good host, easy to communicate with. I would definitely recommend this apartment to everyone who comes to beautiful Porto.

Logement parfaitement propre bien situé près de tous transports (bus,métro) qui permettent de se rendre facilement dans le centre historique comme au bord de plage...bons conseils de rita et plan de la ville fourni je recommande

name: Mouzinho 244 Ap4 by RUA Apartments
summary: Ap4 is  located at Mouzinho da Silveira Street, in downtown, and in the heart of the UNESCO World Heritage Center. This apartment is on the 2th floor  and it's an apartment full of light. For privacy windows don't allow outside visibility. It has 1 bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, a dining area and a cozy living room. whith TV cable and free wi-fi. São Bento's Train Station and the Subway are just a 2 minute walk away You can see and choose  other apartments "cliking" on myprofile page.

reviews.txt: Fantastische plek, super centraal, compleet nieuw en fris appartement.  En niet te vergeten hele lieve verhuurders!
Todo perfecto

Manuela and Pedro were very welcoming! We arrived late but there was no problem, they offered us a glass of Porto and gave us a lot of tips to discover the city. The appartment is all renovated so it is very clean, functional and above all, very well located in the historical center. I recommend this place without any doubt!
Thanks again!

This appartment was perfect : clean, very well located (very centered in porto) and spacious. For sure if I come back to Porto, I'll take the same.
The host was very nice and found a solution for all of our requests.
Super appartment.

The apartment is great, excellent location and everything is brand new !
Pedro checked us in, he was very kind, told us everything we needed to know, and we even had some Porto wine at our arrival. 
The only downside was the occasional noise outside (people shouting).
Would definitely recommend !
This is a really good place to stay in Porto. Manuela's flat is very nice, well cleaned and close to the main city attractions. I'd strongly recommend it the ones visiting Porto.

Apartamento bonito y acogedor en el centro de Oporto, muy bien situado cerca de todas las atracciones de la ciudad: monumentos, barrio de la Ribera, metro, etc. Muy nuevo y limpio. Las únicas pegas: no hay ascensor ni climatización (aire acondicionado ni calefacción). Pero seguro que Manuela se encargará de acondicionarlo pronto. Es una estupenda anfitriona.

En el apartamento de Manuela y Pedro nos sentimos genial.
Una ubicación perfecta para poder llegar a todos los puntos de la ciudad de Oporto.
Manuela fue encantadora y nos esperó y nos enseñó el apartamento. Muy simpática y agradable. Las fotos corresponden con la realidad, está todo muy nuevo y limpio. 100% recomendable!

Un apartamento céntrico, limpísimo y decorado con buen gusto. Una botella de Porto te está esperando, nada más entrar. Manuela nos atendió muy amablemente en todo momento. Lo recomiendo a todo el mundo

Très bon séjour dans cet appartement parfaitement situé au centre ville. Manuela a gentillement ajouté un lit bébé pour nous et les voyageurs suivants. Pas de clim et quelques bruits dans la rue piétonne le soir, mais rien de grave. Très bon appartement.

Nous avons passé un super séjour à Porto, l'appartement est bien aménagé et est situé au cœur du quartier historique il y a donc pas besoin de voiture.
Notre hôte travail dans un magasin en bas de l'immeuble ce qui a facilité notre arrivée.

Great apartment! Ideal location in the centre of Porto: a few steps from Sao Bento station, and a few minutes' walk from Ribeira on one side, and all other main attractions on the other (Sé, Torre dos Clérigos...).
The apartment is stylish and comfortable, Manuela is a very kind host. I would definitely recommend this to anyone visiting Porto!

Our apartment was located in a renovated building that only contains airbnb properties. Its location is central, it is perfect to visit Porto, everything can be done on foot. 

Manuela was waiting for us on the tin store located on the ground floor. She was quite nice and offered us helpful advise on parking and local restaurants.

The apartment itself looks exactly like the pictures and it is big enough for a couple and a kid. It is modern and nicely decorated. The kitchen is basically equipped, don't expect to cook there but you have everything for breakfast (do buy/bring tea and coffee). The 
bedroom is comfortable. Though it doesn't overlook Muzinho da Silveira street, which is quite a busy, you can still hear some noise at night and in the morning evening but nothing too bothering.

We though it was a good price for money, especially as we booked it shortly before our arrival.
Very nice place, great location and kind host!

El apartamento es tal como muestra las fotos, esta muy limpio y muy céntrico. Manuela estuvo pendiente de nuestra llegada y al alojarnos nos recomendo sitios a los que ir y donde comer. Repetiriamos seguro.

Excelente localização, próxima do metro e pontos de interesse, confortável. Corresponde às fotos publicadas. Anfitriã nos ofereceu vinho do Porto na chegada, muito gentil, nos deu dicas e informações úteis.

L'appartement est très agréable : immeuble refait à neuf, appartement très fonctionnel, très propre, et super bien placé dans Porto. Manuela est très gentille et prend le temps de nous accueillir. Son magasin - situé en bas de l'immeuble - permet de laisser ses affaires le jour de l'arrivée ou du départ. Le seul bémol concerne la cour intérieure sur laquelle donnent les appartements 2 et 4 : elle est squattée par quelques marginaux un peu bruyants certains soirs. Nous sommes tout de même ravis par notre séjour et retournerons chez Manuela !

Everything was as described, very clean and close to the city center. 
Manuela was very kind.

Everything was excellent from the very beginning. We found the place very easily. It really is centrally located and has everything in it. We got the place polished. Manuela was very flexible with the checkin&out. The shower is fantastic, and the bed is perfect. Great place !!!

name: 26/3 rd Casa da Música
summary: Apartamento situado em Cedofeita, à Boavista. Casa com as comodidades essenciais e  traços minimalistas, é um espaço de cidade.  Situa-se numa área habitacional, fora da zona turística.  Verifiquem por favor a localização antes de reservar. Caminhar até à baixa demora 25 min, como alternativas metro "Casa da Música" a 7 min do alojamento são 3 paragens até ao centro ou 10min há também o bus nº 602 a 1 min do alojamento para a Cordoaria (15m)

reviews.txt: Margarida was a great host, she met us from the station and made sure we had settled in, saying we could contact her for advice about the area. She made us feel welcome in her apartment.

Margarida nos acogió fenomenal en nuestra llegada, estuvo siempre atenta a nuestras necesidades y nos informó de la oferta cultural y gastronómica alrededor del apartamento. 
Este se encuentra en una zona residencial muy tranquila, donde no encontramos problemas de aparcamiento. Estaba muy limpio y todo acorde a lo descrito por Margarida, lo que nos gustó fue sobre todo la luz y el aire fresquito (han sido días calurosos) que entraban.
En cuanto a limpieza y comodidad, muy bien también! 

Muy cerca de la casa probamos dos cafeterías que nos encantaron para desayunar (rico y barato): Porto Rico, ubicada en Rua de Oliveira Monteiro, 491-497; y Regata, enRua de Nossa Senhora de Fátima, 421.

(Podéis encontrar info sobre restaurantes en esta página (Website hidden by Airbnb) 

Ubicado a 10min de la Casa de la Música, donde la oferta cultural es amplia, y del Mercado del Bom Sucesso (opción ideal para picar algo cerca del apartamento aunque no la única). 
Al centro normalmente íbamos andando (alrededor de 20min) pero otra opción es coger el metro desde el centro y andar los últimos minutos; el trayecto que realizamos fue: De Sao Bento>Trindade> Casa da Musica (Carolina Michaelis también está cerca).

La opción más corta para ir andando (o eso nos parece) es Dr Carlos Cal Brandao (e ir callejeando) aunque también se puede ir hacia la Rotonda de Boavista y bajar hacia Jardins do Palacio de Cristal (buena opción para ver atardecer).

La verdad que ha sido una estancia perfecta y repetiríamos encantados :)

Margarida was very helpful and she made us feel welcome. She explained everything about the apartment very well. She even gave us loads of tips on where we can go for good restaurants, bars etc. We could always ask her anything during our stay about anything in Porto, it was really helpful. I would defenitely recommend this place to others.
Margarida is a very nice person and has a nice apartment!

Margarida was very nice when we arrived and gave us good advice of what to do. The appartment was in a good neighbourhood. Easy to walk to the center of the city. Everything was clean. We really loved our stay at her appartment!

Margarida es una persona atenta y siempre dispuesta a ayudar; Oporto una ciudad hermosa llena de rincones en los que perderse. Lamentablemente, es difícil llevarse una imagen positiva después de que te roben. El día antes de nuestra partida encontramos la luna del coche rota, y todo lo que había de valor, sustraído. Es una práctica habitual, no fue una excepción. La consiguiente desesperación, al estar "abandonados" en otro país, sólo la conoce quien la padece. Además, no habíamos aparcado en una zona  conflictiva, sino en un barrio residencial, muy cerca del apartamento. 
Lo verdaderamente problemático no es el robo en sí, sino el hecho, ante la perspectiva de un largo viaje para volver a casa, de no tener ayuda posible: que el seguro no responda, no tener internet en el teléfono, etcétera, hecho que probablemente constituya un incentivo para los ladrones, pues es obvio que actúan desde el rencor.
Si Margarida dispone el aparcamiento trasero a la casa todo será más seguro. No le recomiendo a nadie dejar el coche en la calle.
Es recomendable también, controlar los precios de las tarifas de datos, ya que la Wi-Fi que nos fue brindada solo funcionó el primer día, y se hace muy necesaria estando de viaje. 
Por otro lado, es difícil llegar a entender para un español (que tenemos fama de fiesteros y gritones) como es posible que en una zona residencial todas las noches se reúna gente en una plaza a beber y hablar hasta las cuatro o cinco de la mañana. El caso es que como la visita ha sido en agosto y el calor era insoportable, teníamos que tener las ventanas abiertas y era muy difícil dormir, pues la gente no tenía ninguna consideración ni civismo en este aspecto.
Esto no pretende ser una crítica destructiva; quizá tuvimos mala suerte, y aunque creo que hay aspectos a mejorar, el apartamento es una  buena oportunidad para conocer la ciudad, sobre todo por su relación calidad-precio y porque Margarida responde siempre con una sonrisa. Aun teniendo en cuenta los aspectos señalados, estoy seguro de que con el tiempo el recuerdo será bueno.
Un très bon accueil de la part de Margarida. L'appartement est propre et bien placé par rapport au centre ville. C'est une adresse que je recommande !
A Margarida foi muito simpatica e o apartamento estava impecável. obrigado :)

Margarida est une personne adorable! elle nous a laissé un guide de porto avec ses annotations pour que notre voyage soit le plus agréable possible, l'appartement correspond parfaitement aux photos. l'appartement est entre 2 stations de metro très facile d'accès, et proche de la rotunda.

Un espacio austero pero cómodo, bien comunicado con el centro aunque a un buen paseo. Tiendas en la zona. No hemos tenido problemas de aparcamiento ni de seguridad, la zona es tranquila. Los chavales y chavalas charlando hasta tarde ha sido un poco molesto, pero llevadero. Margarida encantandora y atenta. ¡Buena experiencia!
ottimo, Margarita simpatica e accogliente. l'appartamento pulito. la posizione abbastanza comoda per il centro. ottima esperienza. lo consiglio

Wir waren vier Tage in Porto und hatten eine tolle Zeit. Die Wohnung ist zwar basic, aber sie hat alles was man braucht. Sie ist einfach zu erreichen und gut gelegen - wir waren immer zu Fuß unterwegs. Margarida ist super sympathisch und sehr zuvorkommend. Sie hat uns warm empfangen.

Accueil très chaleureux de la part de Margarida, très réactive aux messages. L'appartement est très bien situé, proche du métro, de tous commerces et de l'entrée ou de la sortie de la ville , mais l'environnement est malheureusement bruyant (ce qui est indépendant de Margarida!) L'équipement est (trop) basique pour plusieurs jours mais Margarida saura rapidement améliorer tout ça. Nous sommes en tout cas ravies de l'avoir rencontrée.
Très accueillante et chaleureuse, une fille simple et disponible !! Très heureuse de ces deux jours

Margarida is really friendly and gave us good tips when we arrived. The accommodation was clean and cozy. Only issues were with the wifi, that sometimes didn't work. Overall, we've had a great experience!

Miranda is a very nice host, always good in communication and gave us a lot of tips and recommendations to make the best out of our time in Porto. The apartment is located 15-20 minutes walk from the city center. Since the building was build in the 70 there are quite a few things that indicated that it is not the newest apartment.
