L'appartement de Margarida a été idéal pour notre séjour à Porto, meme si un peu excentré. Grand, très propre et bien équipé (même si le wifi bug pas mal), nous avons passé un excellent séjour!
Margarida a été super, disponible et arrangeante. Merci pour tout!

I had a nice time in the apartment. As others also mentioned, it's a very basic 70s apartment (which in Portugal means - no central heating, and it can get a little chilly in there in winter even though there are electrical heaters), but the neighbourhood is calm and safe, shops are near, as well as the metro station, for me the WiFi was working all the time (sometimes a little slow, but it worked). Also the wooden floor is nice, and the kitchen is small but modern and has all you need to prepare small meals.
Communication and check-in was very professional. The flat was super clean. I'd come back when I'm coming to Porto again!

Margarida is a great host. She waited for us in the apartement when we arrived even though we were really late. She was always available on the phone when we had any questions and we felt very welcome and well looked after.

I really enjoyed staying in Margaridas apartment. She is a wonderful host and her English is really good so it was easy to communicate. She gave excellent tips about Porto based on my interests.  Next visit I will definately book her place again.

name: Renovated Classic Design Studio with Sun Room
summary: Take in the regal elegance of this classic design studio set in a renovated former piano academy and factory. Discover a downtown getaway featuring original ornate finishes, custom made furniture, colorful decor, and a sun room.

reviews.txt: Very warm welcome from Hector. Took the time to tell us about things to do and about the city. The appartment has recently been beautifully renovated, absolutely stunning! We even pondered staying there an additionnal day just for the wonderful appartment. High end towels and ameneties. Close to a metro station, quiet neighborhood, simply perfect. Hector even took the time to order us a taxi for our early departure. Would ABSOLUTELY RETURN OR RECOMMEND!!
Genial la estancia. Todo perfecto.
I would highly recommend this flat for a long or short stay in Porto. It is well located and it is really tastefully decorated! Hugo was also really helpful and gave us loads of info on the city.

Todo era perfecto.  El apartamento es precioso, coincide con las fotos.  Hugo, quién nos recibió, nos ofreció todo tipo de información y su predisposición para que en nuestra estancia no nos faltara de nada fue total.
Amazing decorated apartment! Well situated. The owner gave us incredible and tasty addresses to enjoy our trip in Porto! I would highly recommend this apartment without any hesitations

Very nice & clean flat , with available and helpful hosts. 
I highly recommend this apartment for a citytrip in Porto !
We absolutely loved our stay in Porto. Our host Hugo was very welcoming and helpful . The apartment was very clean and comfortable and felt like home. Thank you so much for a fantastic stay.
Very pleasant stay. Close parking nearby, modern comfortable place, easy walk to the tourist center but far enough away to be separate from the crowds. Thank you!

O apartamento é muito confortável e acolhedor: 5*
Está muito bem localizado, junto a restaurantes, supermercados e transportes públicos.
Apesar de estar numa zona calma e agradável, fica a poucos minutos, a pé, do centro histórico.
Beautiful apartment in a great location. Quiet safe neighborhood yet still very close to most of the major sites.
Great location and easy to park nearby. The apartment is just as you see in the pictures. Highly recommended.

La propreté  agencement avec goût idéal pour un couple
Géographique  proche des 2 gares et du métro proche de la veille ville  le soir si fatigue
Un restaurant sur la place a 150 mètres super

El apartamento es muy bonito en un edificio antiguo manteniendo su esencia, pero perfectamente reformado y muy acogedor. Tiene muchos detalles (amenities de baño, cafetera y cápsulas nescafe, barra de sonido para poner tu música con el móvil y Netflix) y está en muy buena zona. Aunque en el anuncio ponga que tiene aparcamiento, no es así, pero por la zona se aparca muy bien, eso sí, de lunes a viernes es zona de pago.

Beautifully designed flat in a quiet residential area but so easy to walk to the main attractions. Paid parking is easy to find just right outside the building and free on the weekend which is a plus. I didn't get to meet Maribel but she was extremely responsive with her communication. On the day of check in, Boris was so kind and he ensured we were able to find the flat and even waited outside the building for us (as the Airbnb direction was incorrect- please be sure to use the address provided by your host). Boris provided suggestions on where to go and places to eat. While there is no washer in the unit, overall a wonderful stay in magical Porto. Btw, there is a really delicious sandwich shop around the neighborhood that serves up cheap but yummy pork sandwiches right by the park. You won't miss it as there's always a long line.
Very nice and quiet place to stay in Porto. Very convenient location to visit the center and also move further with the metro 4 mm walk from the flat! I recommend.

Great place with lots of room - felt so luxurious. Wonderful bed, plenty of hangers & closet space & outstanding bathroom really added to comfort. Great value & host very responsive.
I recommend Casa de Tortas a few blocks away as a really great breakfast spot, with yummy food & wifi.

The host was very nice and helpful. The apartment was nice and clean. But I think it's to expensive for what it offers. The size is not as big as it looks on the pics and the real location of the apartment is about 4 blocks more far away form the city center. The apartment doesn't have a laundry (I could see it on the pictures of the listing). You have to use and external laundry which costs 7.- Euro each time. Long story short: It's nice but too expensive for what it really offers.

O apartamento é de muito bom gosto nos mínimos detalhes, roupas de cama e banho impecáveis . É muito confortável e tem todos os itens necessários e até o que não pensei, 2 guarda chuvas para o caso de frio. Maribel foi muito atenciosa durante a nossa estadia.  O local é bem silencioso para uma boa noite de sono. Tem transporte público e todas as comodidades necessárias.  Super Recomendo.
Importante q os faciliten la dirección por correo con anterioridad. Yo tarde un ratito en encontrarlo

El alojamiento tiene muy buen nivel. Muy bien equipado, con detalles y con gusto. La acogida es muy cálida. La disponibilidad de los anfitriones es máxima, se esfuerzan en ayudarte, lo pudimos comprobar. La zona es tranquila pero es que además dentro de la casa no se oye nada del exterior. Muy recomendable.

name: B. Arts IV
summary: Located where lived the bourgeoisie in the 19th century.  A rehabilitation project made by young architects from Porto, in a historic building.  A Queen size bed and all the amenities to enjoy the city with pleasure. We expect you to enjoy your stay with us to the fullest, making sure that you'll be provided with all of the modern amenities and supplies necessary for a wonderful stay. If you need any more information please let me know, I will be glad to help you.

reviews.txt: Klein aber sehr fein! Sehr gut gelegen mitten in der alten "Oberstadt" von Porto. Pedro wie Laura waren sehr hilfsbereit bei kleinen Fragen und waren sehr nett und hilfreich mit kleinen Tipps wo es gute Restaurants und Sehenswürdigkeiten gibt. Sehr zu empfehlen diese Unterkunft!! Reto

El sitio es perfecto para pasar unos días en Porto!! Es un apartamento muy bien posicionado, desde el que puedes llegar andando a cualquier punto de interés de Porto. El apartamento es precioso, con lo básico para cocinar y comer allí y con cama muy cómoda, muy tranquilo para descansar por la noche... 
Y la terraza comunitaria es preciosa y perfecta para desayunar en los días con primaverales con sol.
La única pega es el pequeño ruido que hace la calefacción por la noche que, por otro lado, se arregla apagándola.
Hemos disfrutado de nuestra estancia al máximo, sin duda volveríamos al mismo apartamento!!

We loved this place, very central to everything, but also so very quite, especially the garden, felt like a paradise. The apartment itself is very clean, modern, tasteful, with all high qualities amenities. Pedro and Laura are the perfect hosts and we would love to come back some time in the near future.
Thank you both again for everything.
Kind Regards
Elen & Darwin

name: Casa da Porta Amarela
summary: Pequeno apartamento, alegre e encantador, situado num genuíno bairro portuense, muito perto de restaurantes típicos e comércio tradicional. Tem um pequeno pátio privado. A 20 minutos do centro é um excelente espaço para férias.

reviews.txt:
A quem estiver indeciso em relação à estadia na casa. 
Decidam bem, decidam pela Casa da Porta Amarela (ou vermelha ou azul). Uma decoração personalizada, pensada e acolhedora. 4 pessoas ficam aqui à vontade. Tem tudo o que é preciso e mais. Lençóis e quartos muito cheirosos. Tranquilo.
Localizada a alguns minutos do centro mas para nós não foi problema andar. Vale a pena aqui ficar, pela casa, pelos anfitriões. 
Obrigada por tudo! Hei-de voltar.

Don't look anywhere else. Just stay here, you'll have everything to make your stay even better. A house where you wish you could live. Very quiet, just like the pictures with an  amazing decor. I love Porto and I want to stay here when I visit again.

le logement étant à 10 min de centre, nous étions loin de touriste et nous avons pu plus profiter d'échange avec des portugais. beaucoup de commerce à proximité, restaurants...ligne de bus (305 )qui nous amène au centre donc pas de souci si on ne veux pas marcher. quartier calme. logement confortable , bien équipé même si nous n'avons pas profité de la cuisine ( nous avons déjeuner qu'à l'extérieur) . idéal pour découvrir porto. il y a des azuleros sur certaines façades de maison dans le quartier.

Le logement correspondait exactement aux photos.
Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Sissa qui avait mis à notre disposition de la documentation touristique (plan ville, brochures, livres) l'appartement est décoré avec gout et très fonctionnel. Propre et calme nous nous sommes très vite sentis comme chez nous. Très proche de ligne de bus ou mètro, pour visiter Porto c'est l'idéal

l appartement est situé dans une rue résidentielle très calme en restant très proche du centre.
Nombreux petits commerce autour donc très pratique pour vivre comme un habitant de porto

Très joli appartement bien décoré,très propre et très bien équipé (cuisine avec tout le nécessaire ,machine a laver, wifi y compris une cafetière nespresso)
Le gros plus de cet appartement est une magnifique terrasse fleurie en cours intérieure et sans vis à vis qui permet de se relaxer en extérieur.

l accueil par la propriétaire est excellent,elle a été très disponible .Nous avons reçu plein d information sur les choses à visiter,les bonnes adresses.

Dans le futur je choisirais a nouveau cet appartement

Our experience at this apartment was superb. Sissa, the host, was very nice and incredibly helpful at giving us advice on how to enjoy Porto. The apartment is spatious, very well decorated and provides just about everything you might need to feel at home. The kitchen in especially convenient. The rooms are really charming, featuring dim lights and traditional furniture. While not at the city centre, it is located a 15 minute walk from it and you have bus and subway stops down the road. Highly recommendable.

Sissa, thank you so much for letting us stay in your appartement. We enjoyed it so much. It was clean, tidy and cozy!! After a whole Day walking aroud Porto, The best was sitting in the patio with a glass of port.
Totally recomendable, also for families with children.

L'appartement de Sissa est très confortable et très propre, nous en avons été très contentes. Parfait pour passer quelques jours à Porto. De plus, Sissa a été disponible tout le long de notre séjour pour d'éventuelles questions. Je recommande!

Everything about this stay was perfect! Sissa is an amazing host; she welcomed us in person to hand the keys over, took the time to tell us about where to go and what to see in Porto and even offered us a great snack (delicious bread, cheese, homemade jelly and wine– more like a lunch) when we arrived. Staying there really felt like home. The green and flowery terrace is very intimate. If you wish to cook, the kitchen is very well-equipped. We were only two, but the apartment could perfectly host a family. I would not hesitate recommending this place to even the most picky of travellers!

Sissa est formidable, un accueil,une écoute digne d'un hôtel 3 étoiles.
Un appartement situé à l'écart de l'hyper centre , ( 10 min en bus) mais dans un quartier typique de porto avec des vrais petits commerces ou l'on y trouve de tout pour pas cher, très pratique quand on est en voiture ( il faut 5 min pour sortir de porto et avoir accès aux autoroutes).
Appartement très propre et confortable .

Sissa es una anfitriona extraordinaria. Desde el primer momento estuvo pendiente de nuestro viaje. Cuando llegamos tenía preparado un listado de lugares y restaurantes sin gluten porque nuestro hijo es celíaco y un pan casero de maíz. La casa es tan acogedora y bonita como en las fotos. Un lugar estupendo para visitar Oporto. Repetiremos seguro.

Uvítání bzlo velmi vřelé a přátelské a po celou dobu naší dovolené nám byla majitelka k dispozici. Popis bytu na airbnb.com odpovídá skutečnosti. Byt není velký, je však velmi útulný. Okolí bytu je širší centrum. V dosahu jsou dobré a levné restaurace, supermarket a hromadná doprava. Jediné  mínus spatřuji v hlavní rušné ulici, která je nedaleko.

Sissa a été très réactive quand nous l'avons sollicitée. La description et les photos de l'appartement sont fidèles à la réalité. Le patio est un vrai plus! Etre accueilli par une collation avec des produits de qualité fut bien agréable aussi. L'appartement est bien situé: il y a un petit supermarché pas loin, il est facile de trouver un endroit pour manger à proximité etc.
Nous avons reçu un très bon accueil, Sissa est toujours prête à répondre à nos questions et à proposer des sorties. L'appartement est parfait et correspond totalement à l'annonce. Un séjour idéal !

Accueil avenant et tres agréable.
Grand merci pour nous avoir attendu à une heure tardive.
Appartement fonctionnel.
Parfait pour 2 adultes et 2 ados.
Le patio ajoute un "plus".

Accueil agréable par Constance.Appartement confortable,  bien équipé etu très bien décoré 
Sissa gère son immeuble de façon très professionnelle.

Die Unterkunft war perfekt für uns als kleine Familie, das Zentrum ist mit dem Bus in 15 min zu erreichen. Sissas Tipps bzgl Restaurants und Spielplaetze waren super, die Wohnung war sauber und ordentlich, uns hat es an nichts gefehlt. Danke!

L'appartement est nickel et agréable, aucune mauvaise surprise par rapport aux photos. L'accueil de Sissa est fantastique, elle prend le temps de nous conseiller sur les visites à faire à Porto. 
C'est largement suffisant pour 4 personnes, on ne se marchait pas sur les pieds ! 
Petit bémol, pour les non marcheurs, c'est un peu loin du centre ville à pied.

Gostamos bastante. O apartamento é muito aconchegante e muito bem equipado.
A anfitriã, Sissa, foi extremamente gentil acolhedora.

We stayed in Sissa's apartment for nearly one week and we had a really great time there.
Sissa warmly welcomed us with typical delicious pasteis des nata and grapes and she did give us lots of good tips for our stay in Porto. She was very kind and helpful and if we had any questions she always responded very fast. As well the communication before our trip has been very good and she did pass lots of information to me before so it was very easy to find the apartment.
The apartment is very tastefully decorated  and very clean and we found everything we needed and felt very comfortable.
I would totally recommend Sissa as a great host :) Thanks again for everything!

L'appartement de Sissa est vraiment très agréable à vivre : joliment décoré, bien agencé, très propre et refait à neuf (salle de bain et cuisine top). Le petit patio permet de se relaxer loin des agitations de la ville, et les chambres donnent sur une rue très calme. On y a très bien dormi (la literie étant particulièrement confortable !).
Sissa est très accueillante, gentille, et parle bien français ! :)
L'emplacement n'est pas central, mais permet de découvrir un quartier plus authentique que le centre historique et touristique, avec des boutiques et des restaurants typiques. En deux mots, plaira à ceux qui aiment sortir des sentiers battus ! 
Nous conseillons vivement cet appartement !!

name: The Porto Concierge - White Martin
summary: Totally renewed and fully equipped apartment two minutes ahead the Metro Station (Estação S. Bento) entrance. Excellent location to visit Porto by any means! Free Wifi is available on all areas of the apartment. Towels and bed Linen are provided for your stay. Free luggage storage at The Porto Concierge - Welcome Center.

reviews.txt: We've been lucky to be the first ones to use the apartment!! All is new, great quality as per photos. Excellent location, really in city heart. We loved it and hope to come back soon. Thanks!

Cet appartement était vraiment superbe, très propre et très bien équipé! Beaucoup de lumière également! L'emplacement est vraiment idéal pour visiter. Il est très central donc tout se fait à pieds.
Merci pour tout!

Hi. The apartment is very nice as in the pics and situated in the perfect area - close to everything. It does not have heating as it states however as soon as we asked we were told they would bring us a heater asap. We were greeted nicely and introduced to the house and area. All in all very recommendable
Great communication with clean and neat apartment right in a great location. Thank you for everything!

We had a great time in Oporto. The apartment is in the centre and very easy to walk to all sites as well as just explore the streets. It is well furnished, comfortable bed, very clean and everything you need for a comfortable stay. A relaxing space to recoup after a big day and a nice perspective of the city from the small balcony. We will come again. Thanks.

The apartment is beautiful, immaculate and well located, a short walk from Sao Bento station and walking distance from most sights in Porto and the riverfront.  The welcome gift was appreciated, the kitchen was well equipped (although we ate out and didn't need to use it) and the apartment was exactly as described.  Isabel was a gracious host who kept in good communication.  There was a small issue with check-in (the concierge was late to drop off our keys) and if you are a light sleeper you may want to bring earplugs as noise from the upstairs neighbours tended to reverberate through the floorboards.  Overall, it was an excellent base for our short stay in Porto (far more authentic and beautiful than a hotel room) and we would be happy to return. Thank you.

The apartment is absolutely awesome, as you can see on the pics. It is in a great location to visit Porto. It was clean, the bed very comfortable and there is everything you need for a perfect stay. I would be definitely happy to return! 
Thanks Vania for being so kind and welcoming!
So far the place was great. It's well located, renovated decor, spacious and comfortable. It's also pretty well equipped. I'd definitely recommend that place for those looking for a cozy home.

Nice apartment with good location, we had a great stay there.
Be aware that there is no parking with the apartment, and we ended up spending  a lot of money on a parking garage. We recommend comparing prices for parking.

Tout à fait conforme à a description!Isabel a répondu à toutes mes questions avant notre voyage.
Séjour super.
Emplacement très pratique pour visiter Porto.
Très bel appartement, lumineux, bien décoré, propre, confortable.
Nous avons apprécier qu'Isabel mette à notre disposition un lit parapluie pour notre fils.
Petit bémol: le bruit de la rue! mais je crois que tous les appartements de Porto ne sont pas équipés du double vitrage.
Si je devais revenir à Porto, je retournerai sans hésitation dans cet appartement.

The apartment is just like the photos show. Very clean, confortable and bright. The location is perfect for visiting porto. The concierge who did the checkin was very nice and flexible for the meeting time. I recommend this apartment.

Our trip to Porto was great. The flat was in an amazing location that was very central. It was beautiful and very clean and the concierge service was wonderful at checkin. We very much appreciated the restaurant tips!

It was really nice! The apartament is in the city center and it's beautiful. It has everything you need and it's really new.
We stayed a weekend at Porto and we enjoyed it a lot. Such a beautiful city whith a big culture offer.
Although, it was really helpful the información about the city that fue agent told us.
Logement neuf. Nickel. Petit cadeau d'arrivée. Rue au coeur de la ville, animée, donc un peu bruyant parfois la nuit mais ça fait partie de cette vie de quartier. Très lumineux.
Apartamento muy bien situado, amplio, muy luminoso, limpio, bien equipado y perfecto para disfrutar Oporto. Tanto el recibimiento como la estancia fueron perfectas. 100% recomendable.

Our stay was very pleasant. The apartment was spacious and well equipped with fridge freezer, washing machine, hair dryer and kettle. The apartment was clean and located 3-5 minute walk from Sao Bento Railway station and 10 minute walk to the bus station. It is near all the major sites and a 15 minute walk to The Riberia with restaurants, boat trips and Port caves. 
The only suggestion would be for the concierge management, in that we were booked for a 15:30 check- in and were left waiting outside until 16:20 on the footpath/sidewalk until Louisa from the management company arrived, I understand traffic can be a problem, but would have appreciated a text or phone call as to the delay. I had to message the management service to find out any information and was only told someone was on the way - but no time indication.
We asked where would we find a grocery store and again Louisa did not have this information, nor recommendations. 
The door to the apartment jammed and she could not get it opened, luckily my husband was able to 'pound' on the door to help us get in. When we tested the door to get out of the apartment again, she was unable to open the door. If my husband had not been with me, I or any women would not be able to get in or out of the apartment. Louisa said she would report this problem and hopefully, it will be resolved before the next people arrive. 
I would recommend this apartment when visiting Porto for location, and general facilities in the apartment.

Isabella and her team are very professional and provided us any support and help.
The apartment is very nice and located in in center of Porto .

We had a pleasant stay and warm welcoming t the city by a nice reception, a city map and gifts. 
The street is a little bit noisy, you should make a compromise between quietness and distance to the city center trade off!

There are only two points that you should notice before choosing this apartment: check-in is flexible, but after 14:00. 
2. Under the house rules, the host requests to empty out the trash. It has been indicated that there is always a garbage deposit in the street nearby. We could not find it, on your check-in do not forget to ask the reception to show it to you!
We had a very nice stay. The apartment is very spacious, clean and comfortabel. We were friendly welcomed and the apartment is in a very central location.

Great location really close to the station and in the middle of town. Based on previous reviews i was expecting a noisy street outside but after 10pm or so it's pretty quiet in that respect. One thing not mentioned in previous reviews however is the noisy floorboards of the upstairs neighbours. Being wooden and bare (the floorboards) we were hearing (and feeling the vibrations of) the neighbours very clearly and they stayed up till around 2am every night we were there.

name: Central apartment in Almada street
summary: Cozy, restored very central apartment in Porto's heart. .free wi-fi.  .Very central: walking distance from main touristic points .2min walk from "Aliados "metro station .Big public parking just across the road with special price agreement

reviews.txt:
Rosa/Ana foram extremamente receptivas.
O apartamento é excepcionalmente bem localizado e confortável em um primeiro andar bem sobre um restaurante com ótimos sucos naturais, onde tomávamos nosso café da manhã.
Fica a um minuto da Avenida dos Aliados, numa esquina com uma visão privilegiada. As noites são silenciosas.
Mais que recomendado.

Rosa's friend Phillip met me at the apartment and was super friendly and went out of his way to tell me where I should eat,sites to visit and even a little history on Porto. Very nice guy.  
The apartment was in a prime location and was very clean with all amenities. The apartment was so lovely as it had the classic windows with the large wooden doors that you can close to eliminate street noise. The old classic tram goes by the apartment. I loved seeing it.  Basically everything is within walking distance and the apartment is located in an ideal location
I loved staying here and would gladly come back

Mimo późnej rezerwacji (na dzień przed przyjazdem), apartament był w pełni przygotowany i Rosie udało się załatwić łóżeczko turystyczne dla naszego dziecka. Kontakt z Aną, która przekazała nam klucze, był sprawny. Opis apartamentu w pełni zgadzał się z rzeczywistością. Położenie w samym centrum, wszędzie mogliśmy dotrzeć piechotą. Jedynym minusem jest to, że bardzo słychać kroki osób mieszkających na górze, ale jest to zrozumiałe biorąc pod uwagę stare budownictwo, w jakim znajduje się apartament. Bardzo dziękujemy za gościnę!

Rosa's apartment is super-centrally located, and in close proximity to everything you could want from Porto, both eating, drinking, public transport (both buses and Metro), sights, tours etc.

I have only good things to say about Rosa and the way she handled my stay, and her friend provided me with some good pointers when I arrived (quite late) on the first night.

One thing -- if you like to keep some windows open at night and you are super-sensitive to noise, there is some traffic in the streets outside, but for me it was not a problem.

El piso está estupendamente situado, en puro centro de Oporto, a 5 minutos andando de la catedral, a 5 minutos andando de la Torre dos Clérigos, a 15 minutos andando de la ribera del Duero, con locales para desayunar y comer justo abajo. Nos pilló en etapa de mucho calor y quizá le falte algo para luchar contra el calor dentro de la casa. También está tan céntrico que hay algo de ruido ambiental por la noche (sobre todo si hace calor y quieres abrir las ventanas). Pero en general muy bien todo

Estuvimos alojados en el apartamento de Rosa en Agosto y la experiencia fue muy positiva. El apartamento se encuentra muy bien situado para disfrutar de Oporto, ya que todos los puntos de interés turístico están a 5-15 minutos a pie. Además, el apartamento está bien equipado. Philippe, la persona que nos recibió en nombre de Rosa, nos dio una agradable bienvenida, proporcionándonos diversas recomendaciones que hicieron nuestra estancia aún más interesante. 
Gracias por todo, Rosa y Philippe.

Première fois à Porto et première expérience Airbnb. Bilan plus que positif! L'appartement est conforme aux photos, l'emplacement est parfait : tout est à proximité. L'accueil était sympathique, de bons conseils ont été donné pour profiter au maximum de Porto. Expérience à refaire

We had such a great stay at Rosa's place! Her friend was very welcoming and gave us nice tips for exploring beautiful Porto. 
The location was more than perfect- main attractions, bars, restaurants and supermarkets are just a few steps away. The apartment itself is situated in an old lovely building and nothing was missing inside. Street noise can be easily reduced with closing the wooden shutters :) 
We were very happy choosing this flat and we can truly recommend it!
Very pleasant stay, I would happily come back!

Rosa's apartment is lovely - really well located, well equipped and very comfortable. Easy to find and Flavia welcomed us well and showed us all the great places to visit. It's a bit noisy as on a main road but nothing some earplugs won't fix. Well recommended!
Rosa's apartment is in a perfect location! Also, we traveled wirh our infant son, and she provided a crib. We did not meet Rosa, but her friend Silvia warmly greeted us and gave us some great tips!

The apartment itself is small but perfect for 2. It gets a little noisy because the road in front of the building is constantly busy. But we enjoyed staying here because it's so accessible to everywhere! Fairly easy to locate too. Warning though, the water of the toilet isn't strong so.... It's not easy trying to flush some things :/

De verhuurder was flexibel met het inchecken. Doordat mijn verwachte aankomst tijd onzeker was, was dit al een fijn welkom. Het welkom was zeer hartelijk en voelde als thuis komen bij familie. Op de plattegrond van Porto had de verhuurder aangegeven wat de plekken zijn die het bezoeken waard zijn (ook de niet toeristische plekken). Hiermee heeft de verhuurder mij in korte tijd mij wegwijs gemaakt in Porto. 

Naast een geweldig gezellig appartement in het hart van Porto was de service helemaal super.

La experiencia fue muy buena. El chico encargado de recibirnos nos espero incluso al retrasarnos. Nos doy unas ideas muy útiles para pasar allí unos días. El apartamento es exactamente igual que en las fotos y está localizado en un lugar privilegiado para el acceso a todos los puntos turísticos de la ciudad.

Un joli appartement, bien situé, proche de la gare San Bento. Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Silvia qui a pris le temps de nous expliquer ce qu'il y a à voir à Porto. Rosa a été très flexible pour que nous ayons accès à l'apartement dès 13h, très pratique! La rue peut être un peu bruyante, en tout cas les soirs de weekend.

Nous avions 1/4 d heure de retard notre hôte nous a patiemment attendus  et à pris le temps de nous indiquer les lieux à voir à Porto ,plan à l'appui c' était sup bien.
L appartement est très central nous avons pu faire toutes les visites à pied. Appartement très propre bien équipé
Et nous avons eu un temps magnifique

Super accueil ; des explications pour découvrir Porto.
Très bien situé.
Très joli appartement.

Very good location for this appartment, right in the center of Porto. Many cafés/restaurants few meters away. All mains attractions at walking distance.
Appartment is spacious, confy and well decorated. A bit noisy at night because of the area, however.
Good check-in and great advices from Flavia, thanks.
I would recommend this place for a short stay in Porto

Lugar maravilhoso, ficamos na casa da Rosa do dia 14 a 17 de outubro, o apartamento é  excelente... cama muito Boa, chuveiro e banheiro ótimos, sala bem aconchegante... recomendo este lugar para todos, fica numa região  bem central e próximo  de tudo. Fizemos todos os pontos turísticos caminhando pela proximidade da casa. Se voltarmos a PORTO com certeza ficarei no apartamento da Rosa, super atenciosa e mostrou muitas dicas interessante!!!! Muito obrigado Rosa!!!!!!!

Excellent acceuil, chaleureux et avec de nombreux conseils fiables et utiles. Logement conforme à l'annonce, sans surprises, lumineux et agréablement aménagé. Très bonne situation, à proximité des transports et centres d'intérêt. Un peut bruyant bien sûr, mais rien de méchant. D'ailleurs être proche de tout et n'entendre que le chant des oiseaux est chose rare et chère. Si nous devions retourner à Porto c'est sans hésiter que nous prendrions à nouveau ce logement.

name: Fabulous occasion orange
summary: You are in the epicenter of Porto's life! Monuments as Clerigos Tower, Eifell bridge "D. Luis" and Ribeira, the riverside, S. Bento train station, Restaurants, shops,cafés...everything is just around the corner.

reviews.txt: Passamos uma agradável noite no studio de Dulce, equipado com o indispensável para curtas estadias. A cama, cujo acesso se dá por meio de uma escada, é bastante confortável. A localização é excelente e central. Dulce foi muito simpática e nos acolheu muito bem. Recomendamos!

Dulce was picking us up at the corner of the street. The apartment is in a very central area close to the city center and close to the river. Everything was clean and nice. It is a charming place to stay.
Great place, right in the centre. Had a great time

It is what it is!! A FABULOUS occasion! The situation is ideal. . Dulce is very nice and always answers promptly to questions and/or other needs.. The place is sooo charming!  You cannot have a better location: everything is around you! And the appartement so clean, intimate and simple.. and the price! Just too right.. thank you SO much to offer this nice appartement to people who travels this must see area!  

We wish to come back another time! 

Marie & Billy

Dulce est vraiment une hôte géniale. Malgré un retard d'avion de plus de 9h, elle nous a attendus. Très gentille, arrangeante et disponible, tout s'est très bien passé ! L'appartement est propre et fonctionnel pour passer un long week-end. Également très bien situé, nous avons pu tout faire à pieds, notamment le soir où les bars sont proches. Je recommande vivement Duce et son joli appartement ! En espérant revenir avec le soleil !

Dulce est une hôte au TOP. L'appartement est très propre et fonctionnel, très bien situé, nous avons tout visité a pieds il est vraiment au centre de tout, notamment pour les sorties le soir. Je recommande à 1 000% l’appartement en espérant  y retourner prochainement.

Nous avons passés 4 jours magnifiques à Porto dans un logement très agréable : propre et bien équipé .
L'accueil à été parfait , Dulce est sympathique et avenante, elle nous a bien guidé. 
Elle parle bien le français et nous a renseigné sur les adresses utiles : alimentation, métro. ...
첫 에어비앤비 이용 숙소였는데 정말 좋았어요! 집은 한국의 복층원룸식이고 침대가 복층에 있어서 예상과 조금 다르긴했지만, 깔끔했고 두명이 쓰는데는 부족함이 없었습니다. 가장 좋았던건 위치! 상벤토역 바로 앞이라고 해도 될 정도에요. 그리고 호스트도 정말 친절하고 좋았습니다. 포르투에 다시 방문한다면 같은 곳으로 가고 싶어요!

Beautiful studio! Everything was perfect I felt like I didn't want to leave the house lol. Thank you Dulce for being so helpful with all the useful information you have given. Will surely come back to stay there again if I'm back to Porto. Love from Malaysia, June.

Das Apartment liegt mitten in Portos Altstadt und ist somit der perfekte Ausgangspunkt um Porto zu erkunden! Es war super sauber und alles entspricht den Bildern. Ein Parkhaus befindet sich nur 20m entfernt und kostet 15€/ 24h. Dulce ist sehr freundlich und wir waren sehr zufrieden mit unserem Aufenthalt!

LOOK NO where else!
Dulce place is superb, actual look BETTER then pictures and very clean and well equip.  Location is superb, just 300 meters from San Bentos station, and I literally walk everywhere and did not use any public transport at all and all attraction is less then 700meters from her place, shoping, restaurants and bars below her place but yet NOT noisy at night.  Can't find better place to stay in Porto.   

Dulce is swift in respond and met me in arrival despite delay of 2 hours and gave orientation of her place.  She also as assisted to book me a taxi at 4:30am to airport for my early flight.

Highly recommend for you to stay at Dulce place! You will not regret :) enjoy beautiful PORTO!
Dulce was an excellent and accommodating host. The apartment is in the best, most central location and is very sweet. Thanks for a great few days in Porto!

Reçus par Dulce avec un large sourire et un français parfait. ..disponible et présente pour nous conseiller sur les visites .l'appartement est très agréable et très bien placé, les photos
et description sont à l'identique. Je recommanderais cette adresse à tous mes amis...
시내 한 가운데에 위치한 집이라 어디로든 접근성이 참 좋았습니다. 걸어서 강까지도 금방이구요. 호스트인 Dulce도 친절하고 도움이 많이 되었습니다. 깔끔한 복층 구조라서 숙박하는 내내 즐거웠습니다. 다음에 포르투에 온다면 또다시 이 곳에 묵고 싶어요.
Hermosisimo apartamento no hay mejor ubicación, Dulce muy amable y cordial.

Logement parfait, très beau et propre. Localisation parfaite, proche de tout les lieux à visiter. Dulce à été très disponible répondant à tous messages et nous a même conseillée quelques coins sympa en français parfait. 
Une bonne adresse où nous retournerons sans hésitation.
The apartment is in the very center of the city. Very comfortable and cosy, there's everything you could need, close to the subway. But it's very noisy there. That's the only disadvantage
The apartment was perfect for our needs. Brilliant central location, very clean, well equipped. Dulce was very welcoming and gave us some good tips on places to eat locally.

Dulce nous a accueillis d'une manière parfaite.
L'appartement est magnifique. Exactement comme sur les photos. Très propre. Petit mais cosy et rien ne manque. Avec (Website hidden by Airbnb) situation parfaite ! plein de petits restos, bistrots, pâtisseries, boutiques. La gare à 2 pas...
Seul bémol : le bruit. 
 Nous devions repartir très tôt le matin. Dulce s'est occupée de réserver notre taxi.

Nous avons séjourné une nuit dans ce magnigique petit appartement sur un coin de rue très touristique. C'était très propre et très lumineux. Le lit en mezzanine était confortable. Dulce a été facile à rejoindre et était au rendez-vous pour nous remettre la clé. C'est très bien situé pour visiter Porto à pied. Attention au stationnement qui peut revenir cher si vous ne chercher pas bien. Lors de notre séjour, il y a eu beaucoup de bruit dans la rue la nuit et tôt le matin mais étant une personne qui a le sommeil facile, cela ne m'a pas trop gêné. Je recommande ce petit appartement

name: City Center Rooftop
summary: New apartment located 5/10 minutes walking from main attractions, transports, local restaurants, night life, etc. Totally renovated, situated on the 6th floor with access by elevator, it counts with Kitchen and living room, 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom and terrace. The apartment as Wi-Fi, and cable TV. If you want to be in the center, in a calm neighborhood to relax, drink a Port wine while enjoying the sun in our terrace, this is the right spot.

reviews.txt:
L'appartement est formidable,idéalement situé à 5mn à pied de toutes les animations, une grande terrasse sur laquelle c'est un plaisir de prendre son café le matin. L'appartement est entièrement rénové, c'est agréable d'être dans du neuf. Il est au calme tout en étant dans une zone animée.
David nous a accueilli avec une carafe de Porto et beaucoup de gentillesse et de disponibilité. Il nous a indiqué toutes les bonnes adresses, plan à l'appui, on a tout fait et il a été de très bon conseil. Il est resté disponible par mail tout le temps si nous avions des besoins.
Nous recommandons vivement cette adresse et merci encore à David et Catia.

Foi o melhor apartamento onde já ficámos através da Airbnb! A Cátia e o David receberam-nos muito bem e foi fácil encontrar o local. À nossa espera tínhamos alguma comida e vinho do porto, bem como muitos guias e mapas para nos orientar pela cidade. Apesar da hora tardia, não hesitaram em dar-nos bastantes dicas para a nossa visita. 
A localização é mesmo muito central e a zona é sossegada. O apartamento é novo, bastante bem equipado e confortável. Acordar de manhã e aproveitar o sol na varanda foi especial. Estava tudo bastante limpo e arrumado. 
No dia da saída, como não entrava ninguém, deixaram-nos ficar à vontade até à hora de apanhar o comboio. Foi mesmo uma experiência cinco estrelas. 
Quando voltarmos, não hesitamos no local de estadia: este rooftop! 
Obrigada Cátia e David pela excelente recepção!
Very friendly. Catia took her time to tell us all the important spots. Apartment was also awesome!

Cátia and David have put a lot of thought into ensuring the flat is nicely furnished and well equipped, plus adding homely touches. They are caring and thoughtful hosts, contacting us before and during our time to check everything was fine. Thank you for remembering my birthday; a very special memory. Cátia provided a comprehensive overview of Porto when we met her at the flat and all her recommendations of what to see, where to go and restaurants to eat at were excellent. We didn't have time for your francesinha challenge Cátia but we'll take it up next time! The flat is in an excellent location; easy walking distance from attractions, but also in an area of great local bars and shops. Many happy times watching the world go by, and the football, at Cafe Java. And of course the roof top terrace is an excellent place to relax and enjoy wine, or beer, after a day of exploring the steep streets and many steps of Porto. We will most definitely be returning. Thank you Cátia and David.

El apartamento era igual que en las fotos. Muy bonito, muy céntrico y con todo lo necesario para la estancia. David y Catia tienen experiencia en tours y te explican perfectamente cualquier cosa que necesites.

Die Kommunikation mit Cátia und David verlief reibungslos. Check-in und check-out waren völlig unkompliziert. Cátia hat uns freundlich in Empfang genommen und uns bei einem Erfrischungsgetränk tolle Insider-Tipps für unseren Aufenthalt gegeben. Da wir eine knappe Woche in Porto waren, war es prima, dass Cátia uns auch Tipps für Portos Umland (tolle Strände etc.) geben konnte.

Die Wohnung ist grundsätzlich sauber, modern eingerichtet und liebevoll dekoriert. Die Dachterrasse ein Traum. 
Alles in allem hatten wir einen schönen Aufenthalt. Jedoch wurden während unseres Aufenhalts unter der Woche Bauarbeiten/Renovierungsarbeiten im Haus durchgeführt, weshalb wir durch eine teilweise starke Lärmkulisse gestört wurden. Am Wochenende haben wir davon nichts mitbekommen. Wenn die Renovierungsarbeiten abgeschlossen sind, steht aber auch einem längeren Aufenthalt in dieser Wohnung nichts im Wege.
Appartement très agréable , parfait pour passer un séjour à Porto

Tout était parfait. L'appartement est propre et la terrasse très agréable ! Bien situé, à proximité de tout. Surtout un grand merci à Catia pour l'accueil malgré le checkin tardif qui a pris le temps de nous donner plein de conseils autour d'un verre de Porto bien sur !

Staying at Catia's place was a dream. 
The apartment is clean, has everything you need and the rooftop is amazing. 
It's really close to the center. 
Catia took time to give us recommendations about Porto. And her addresses were good. 
I loved it !!! 
Thank you !

Catia et David ont facilité notre arrivée et surtout Catia à pris le temps de nous recommander les meilleures adresses de shoping, restaurants et visites. Le verre de bienvenue sur la terrasse est un moment privilégié. L'appartement est très bien situé et calme.

Herzlichen Dank an Catia! 
Die Unterkunft und die Tipps und Ratschläge von Catia waren TOP!
Wir haben die Dachterrasse jeden Tag und Abend genossen.
Es war klasse!
Dankeschön nochmals an Catia!
Perfect place in porto! Nearby city center with great rooftop.

Our stay at City Centre  Roof was top in every respect.  The modern apartment with   its amazing rooftop is located in the historic part of Porto.  It is spacious, very clean and lovingly decorated. Catia gave us a very warm welcome and provided us with ample information about the city, places to visit or restaurants to go to (we loved the Francesinha!!!).
We can definitely recommend this place to everyone travelling to Porto. Thank you very much,  Catia and David.
The apartment is great and better that photos. In the middle of Porto downtown so perfect position. I recommend it.

Catia was a lovely host and very welcoming when we arrived. Despite a small mix up she was easy to get hold of and resolved the problem immediately.

The apartment was perfect, great location and lovely outdoor area. Catia also helped with many recommendations at the beginning of our stay, all of which proved to be fantastic.

Would definitely recommend to anyone coming to visit Porto. 

Thank you!

Great apartment, and great communication from Catia. The rooftop deck was perfect. 

Recommendations for around town were spot on, and the apartment was in walking distance to all the main sights.
La casa es estupenda. Bien localizada y con una terraza estupenda. Es más grande de lo que parece en las fotos. Katia nos dio un montón de consejos súper útiles. Muchas gracias por todo

Catia was the best host imaginable! She gave us all insights to Porto & made us feel so welcome. The apartment was amazing with a perfect roof top terrace where we enjoyed a port wine while watching the sun go down - heaven! We will never forgot our time in Porto thanks to Catia!!

It was a really pleasant stay. Perfect location and a clean apartment. Really made our stay great! Also the communication with Cátia and David was very good and a quick response was certified. Would love to stay there the next time I am in Porto

Our stay at Catia and Davi's place was great. The apartment was super clean, spacious, and comfortable. And Catia & David were always responsive and friendly. We particularly appreciated all of their recommendations! I would absolutely recommend staying here.

name: Artist Home by the Sea - a 4 minute walk to Beach!
summary: Our spacious comfortable 1 bedroom condo with original artwork is filled with peaceful and healing vibrations and surrounded by tropical gardens. It comfortably fits two and is in a small quiet complex of 18 units. Just a 4 minute walk across from the Ocean of Keawakapu Beach, listed as one of 5 best beaches in the world!  (Website hidden by Airbnb)

reviews.txt:
Marilyn's condo is wonderful - best located, very, very clean and lovely! The beach across the street is beautiful and perfekt for snorkeling and watching big turtles! The kihei village is very nice!!!! We had a perfekt, unforgetable time in kihei and in marilyn's condo! 
Unfortunately we didnt meet Marilyn.... But the communication was great! Thank you, Marilyn, we hope to see you soon in Maui!

Our stay in Kihei was great. The apartment is perfectly located.  Marylin was really helpful. She's also a very talented artist and you can see some of her work around the apartment. You can walk to the beach from there if you want or go check out some other amazing beaches. I'd stay there again.

Our stay at Marilyn and David's place was great.  The location in Kihei was excellent and easily accessible to everything.  The condo itself was clean and comfortable.  Beach chairs, towels, umbrella and a cooler was very convenient as well.  We'd stay here again as well as recommend others to stay here.

Marilyn's condo was everything we could wish for for a perfect stay in Maui - just few minutes across the street from a wonderful beach, tastefully decorated with an amazing personal touch, super-clean, calm, but close to all Kihei shops and all island destinations! Besides that, Marilyn is a great host and was always available by mail for any questions we had! Many thanks, Marilyn - we had a wonderful time and hope to have the chance to come back! We can highly recommend staying at Marilyn's place!!
Place was as advertised.  Across the street from what became our favorite beach in Maui.  Comfortable stay.
Marilyn was very nice and the listing was accurate.  Her home was clean and had all of the ammenities my wife and I needed to have an enjoyable stay in Maui.
Great spot, comfortable, very nice stay in Kihei.  Safe environment...feels like home. Marilyn keeps it very clean and organized.  Would def stay again!

Marilyn made us feel welcomed at her condo. She provided us with all the information we needed about her place and quickly responded to of all our questions. 

The listing description is accurate. Her place is clean and nicely decorated. The condo is located in a quiet residential community. The location is very convenient, and I would definitely recommend her place!

Check in and check out was very smooth and easy. I much prefer the location of Marilyn's Condo in Kihei versus the more toursity Lahaina resort section, which is why we selected this location. It is less than 15 minutes to the best beach in the world, Big Beach! A short 25 minute drive to the airport.  the location was also great for our snorkling tour which docked across the street. We only went up the north west side of maui for our luau and parasailing, which the drive is kinda far for that, but not too bad to do twice. Loved the we were able to use the beach chairs and umbrella, THEY ARE A MUST on a sunny day at the beach!!! Only draw back, which is common, was no air conditioning, but we knew that going into it!
The Apartment is very comfortable and clean. Check-in without any problems. Everything was fine. The beach is very near and perfect for swimming. Thank you very much, Mailyn!

The Kihei condo was wonderful. The location is stellar-central to all the great "to-do's" in Maui but tucked back enough from major streets to be quiet and peaceful. We loved listening to bugs at night and birds in the morning. The interior of the condo was clean and well-appointed and the grounds were lush. Marilyn's artwork throughout the home and skillful rendering of feng shui decor made the place a comforting and calming retreat. On a scale of 10, I'd rate our overall experience at a 9.5.
This is a nice condo on in South Kihei near Wailea. Across the street from a nice beach, and a good value. As with many places in Hawaii, there is no AC so it can be a little warm.

Excellent place to stay while in Maui. Great location in Kihei right across the street from an amazing beach with shops and restaurants walking distance away. The apartment itself was great with all the amenities available and fully stocked for use. I 100% recommend staying here!

Marilyn was an excellent host.  She was warm and welcoming in all communication, even texting us during our stay to see if we needed anything.
   I gave her 3 stars for a couple reasons, some out of her control.  Her place is charming, but lacks air conditioning.  I'm from the Central Valley of CA & know heat, but the place is too hot to be in from 12-5pm, even with the drapes closed & the fans on high.  This meant we often could not eat lunch at the apartment & had to eat in town or take something in the morning when we left.
  The upstairs neighbor also has a loud, aggressive, barking dog that we could hear most evenings.  The neighbor also chooses to brush her dog on the balcony, letting the dog hair fall onto Marilyn's patio below, even when we are sitting outside.
  The final reason, most evenings we would return to the smell of pot from neighbors.  Some may not mind this, but it bothers me.  
  I know most of these are not within Marilyn's control, but they did make our stay less than desirable. As mentioned, she was a pleasant host & quickly responded to any questions we had & made us feel welcome in her home.

We absolutely loved Marilyn's home! It was perfect and exactly what we were hoping for. The condo is super clean and Marilyn is wonderful at answering any questions or giving advice! She always got back to me very quickly. 
The location was great. Everything that we wanted to do and had planned was super close to the condo. The beach across the street is great. Just steps from the condo and never over crowded. The little town just down the road has great restaurants and shops to grab some Souvenirs. We would definitely suggest checking out the Paia fish market for lunch/dinner. You can't go wrong grabbing breakfast at the Kihei Cafe. Make sure to get there early and bring cash!! That's all they accept. 
If you head in the other direction towards Waliea-Makena you can go to Makena park. Big beach is located here. It's a beautiful beach. The waves get a little big though, so keep that in mind. 
Marilyn's condo had everything we needed. The view is beautiful. The complex is clean and very quiet. We never saw or heard another person the whole week we were there. It felt like we were the only couple in the complex. Our only concern at first was that there is no AC, but after one night, we quickly realized that it was not needed. Marilyn provides multiple fans and Maui gets very cool at night. With the fan and cool breeze, we slept great!! 
We managed to get around most of the Island while we were in Maui. And honestly, we always found ourselves wanting to go right back to Kiehi! It's a
Very relaxed and laid back community with not an overwhelming amount of touristy activity, which is exactly what we wanted. 
We definitely will be back to Maui and would LOVE to stay at Marilyn's condo again!!!!

Marilyn was an excellent host and we especially appreciated that she responded immediately with any of our questions.  Our stay in her home was wonderful! She provided all the things we needed including beach towels, beach chairs and an umbrella that came in handy.  The location was perfect. Very close the the beach and restaurant options. I would definitely recommend staying at Marilyn's!

Marilyn was an amazing host and answered all our questions (including a few last minute ones) quickly and helpfully. The house itself is amazing, super comfortable and Marilyn has put a lot of thought into little touches which just made our holiday perfect such as the use of her cooler for picnics! The garden is gorgeous and the perfect place for a morning cup of tea. We also loved the location right near some amazing local snorkelling beaches as well as big beach also close to the local health food store Hawaiian Moons which we kept returning to! Her paintings are also beautiful and add to the peaceful charm of the house. Definitely recommend staying here.

The location was good very close to Waimea which is a beautiful negihborhood with exclusive resorts. We love snorkeling so this aloud us to be closer to La Peruse bay which was exceptional.  In the other hand being close to the main road it had a bit of noise. The kitchen was well equipped and the space was big and comfy. Having air conditioning will be a plus because the building gets lots of afternoon sun which make it a little hot.

We absolutely loved Kihei and kept coming back despite traveling out to other parts of Maui.This place is charming and cozy, with a central location to medical clinics, markets, especially beaches.  It is the perfect spot if you want a home-feel/based location.

We didn't get to meet the host, Marilyn, but she was in constant communication - and followed up quickly on questions.

The only downsides were:
1. There is no AC. Coming from San Francisco and being used to the cold, the afternoons in the condo despite multiple fans were almost unbearable indoors. 
2. She had some last minute instructions that we were unprepared for (unlisted on her website) regarding guests/visitors.  She did, however, accommodate our request.
4. If you love nuts, and nut products, this is not the place for you. We felt a little restricted in the food we could eat/cook at the condo. I myself have multiple food allergies, and most of my food substitutions come in the form of nuts - which I could not eat while there!

Otherwise, you will have a lot of fun, with pretty much everything you need close by, good internet speed, quiet neighborhood, and clean home.

Prior to arrival Marilyn sent a text message out to me getting me and reminding me of the house rules. Her hospitality was very much appreciated and got us started on the right foot. 

The place was exactly as described and perfect. It's not steps from the beach but it's about a 6-10 min walk from the beach. 

It's very close to food and shopping in kihei. I would definitely recommend and stay at Marilyns condo when given the opportunity

name: Ribeira Smart Flat
summary: Cosy flat in the Historic Center of Porto, very close to the Douro river and 5 minutes walking from Sao Bento station.

reviews.txt:
4 amis et moi avons loué l'appartement de Mathieu et y avons passé de très bons moments. Les chambres étaient propres et agréables. J'avais des doutes sur le bruit, mais la chambre dans laquelle j'étais étais super calme donc j'ai pu bien dormir. Quant à Mathieu, un hôte super sympa avec d'excellentes adresses (Adega Viuva pour un dîner et la capela incomun pour le reste de la soirée, notamment). 
Un grand merci et je n'hésiterai pas à revenir chez toi!
Mathieu has been very welcoming and adviced us about some restaurants around. The flat was perfectly clean and well located. I do recommend Mathieu and his flat.

Conversation with Mathieu was always quick and helpful. We didn't meet him during our stay but his friend Ana more than made up for that. Friendly welcome, lots of useful tips and she even brought us the world's most delicious lemon tart for Easter.
The rooms are small, but cosy and clean. Kitchen supplies are basic, but who wants to cook when there are authentic restaurants just around the corner. Biggest bonus of the flat is its location in the historic center. So close to everything you want to do and see in Porto. With a bit of luck and Ana's guidance we found free parking close by and then just walked every day.
Rainy days in March can be quite cold, so the electric heater in the flat was appreciated.

Nous avons passer un superbe séjour à Porto dans cet appartement très bien situé, parfait pour découvrir la ville à pied sans avoir besoin d'utiliser les transports en commun.
Mathieu nous a très bien accueilli. Il a été très arrangeant et nous a donné de nombreux conseils sur les visites et les restaurants.
A recommander!

L'appartement est bien situé, on peut tout visiter à pied, La rue est calme, les chambres sont claires et propres, la salle de bain est par contre assez petite. merci Mathieu pour les conseils et les adresses!

L'hôte a été très accueillant et très arrangeant.
L'appartement est très bien situé.
Je recommande.

En un mot PARFAIT ! Le logement correspondait aux photos, et à nos attentes : à savoir idéalement situé dans le centre de Porto, avec la possibilité de tout faire à pieds. Et en bonus, les conseils avisés de Mathieu qui ont tous fait mouche ! Merci encore !

Communication with Mathieu was super easy. We met Pierre who gave us the keys and he was incredibly helpful and friendly - he gave us lots of tips! He mentioned that the apartment had a few minor watch-outs: like unlocking the apartment door (however we had no issues at all) and you need to nudge the toilet bowl as it can get stuck (this was not a big deal). The beds were comfortable and the place was clean. The location of the apartment is perfect. The only downside is that there is construction work in front of the house and you can hear the neighbors - however this is not something that the host can fix :-) Thank you for letting us stay!
Very well located apartment in the centre of Porto, with welcoming hosts.

Mathieu's place was in a great location;  quiet street yet near the action.  The beds are very big and comfortable. Lots of rooms, big spaces (unlike the pictures), and still cheap. Great washing machine with balcony clothesline.  The  bathroom has a bathtub and a very nice sink. When we got there a friend of Mathieu's greeted us so don't worry if the profile pic doesn't match. He set us up with a map and local recommendations based on our needs and interests.

Mathieu ist ein sehr herzlicher und netter Gastgeber, auf jede Nachricht wurde sofort reagiert und die Schlüsselübergabe verlief reibungslos. Die Wohnung ist sehr schön und geschmackvoll eingerichtet und liegt direkt im Zentrum der Altstadt, so dass man sich gleich wie zu Hause fühlte. Super gerne wieder! Mathieu is a very nice and friendly host, in case of questions he response very quick and was very flexible and welcoming. His apartment is very nice and cozy and in the centre of the oldtown - it made me feel like home. Thank you again for making the short stay so great! :)

L'appartement est vraiment très bien situé au coeur du centre historique de Porto ce qui permet de presque tout visiter à pied. L'appartement est très joli, bien décoré, dans une rue très typique et charmante. Par contre, il est totalement insonorisé. Durant toute notre semaine de vacances, l'immeuble en face était en travaux. Tous les jours dès 8h du matin, nous avons eu le plaisir de partager le bruit des marteaux piqueurs et des marteaux. Ce fut très ennuyant et surtout très fatiguant. Autre petit bémol, si l'appartement est fait pour recevoir 6 personnes (3 lits 2 places), il est impossible de se réunir à 6 pour manger puisqu'il n'y a pas de table (à part une petite table en plastique pour 2 personnes). L'appartement est sinon bien exposé puisque le soleil donne sur le balcon une bonne partie de la journée.

This was a great place to stay. It's very roomie and comfortable. The apparent in general is great with modern rooms and a very modern kitchen, and the location is optimal for exploring the city with many restaurants and attractions within walking distance. Mathieu is great and was very quick to respond to any messages.
Great stay!

Appartement très bien situé au coeur de Ribeira, proche des principaux centres d'intérêt, des rues piétonnes, des restaurants etc. Il est situé dans une rue calme (malgré quelques travaux en face en ce moment).
L'appartement est conforme aux photos et propre. Nous y avons séjourné à 6 : les chambres et la pièce principale sont bien, cuisine et salle de bains sont un peu justes pour 6 personnes. Notamment, impossible de prendre un repas à 6 sur cette petite table et difficile de cuisiner (équipement minimal). Ceci dit, il est plus sympa de profiter des restaurants du quartier.
Mathieu nous a bien accueillis et nous a aidé à réserver un taxi pour notre départ.
Au final, bon séjour à Porto et bon souvenir de l'appartement.

We really enjoyed our stay in Porto. The apartment is within walking distance of the river , port caves, many restaurants, shops and Sao Bento train station. It is in a narrow cobbled street in the old part of the city where everything is either up or down hill so be prepared to walk everywhere which is the best way to discover all the hide local places. It is a short walk to get the bus # 500 to Matosinhos and the beaches on the Atlantic Ocean and the fresh fish restaurants where it is all cooked outside on the street.
The apartment was clean and comfortable and certainly adequate for our needs.
Nous avons passé un beau séjour à Porto dans l'appartement de Mathieu. Tout s'est déroulé comme prévu

Apartment is very well located in the heart of Porto and was comfortable. Construction outside is annoying, not an issue if you are out sightseeing all day but bring earplugs if you want to sleep in. Mathieu was easy to contact and resolved problems quickly.

Lovely apartment and the bedrooms are spread along a corridor which is nice for a feeling of privacy and space. Mathieu was very efficient and agreed to a late check-in at short notice which was much appreciated.

Logement très agréable, propre et très bien situé.
Matthieu est très sympathique et nous a bien renseignés.
Nous recommandons !

name: Westin Kaanapali KORVN Studio  v3
summary: Westin Kaanapali Ocean Resort Villas North timeshare - Pay resort: $8-12/day, stays under 7 night $38/res - Inquire about availability, I review then offer/approve if available :) - READ "The Space" for cleaning/etc AND brief explanation about timeshare reservations - Want guaranteed view for additional cost? Must be weekly rental, other restrictions - Wheelchair accessible / ADA, call resort directly to ensure U receive. If U need ADA U MUST inform us BEFORE booking.

reviews.txt: Amazing room with ocean view!!! We were very impressed with the Westin and the 5 Star service!!! Complete with a full kitchen and washer and dryer!!! Home away from home. Mahalo :)

name: Cozy and modern Lapa-studio
summary: Studio in modernized building with games room, gym, computer room, ballroom and rooftop pool. The studio with modern, cheerful decor, with light vintage feel is divided into bedroom and living room with kitchen.

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: What a great appartement in the most vivid neighbourhood of Rio de Janeiro. The appartment was clean and had everything I needed and more! Rio Scenarium just around the corner, so If you like samba and dancing, this is the pace to be. And Dejanira was a great host.

O estúdio é muito bem localizado, com mercado, padaria, bares e restaurantes próximos. O estúdio é exatamente como nas fotos e é bem equipado, com louças, cafeteira, torradeira, etc. O prédio é muito seguro e possui uma infra muito boa. Não cheguei a conhecer Dejanira pessoalmente, mas ela foi muito atenciosa conosco. Recomendo!
Apartamento muito confortável e bem localizado! Foi perfeito para a nossa estadia! A Dejanira nos deixou super a vontade e não deixou nada a desejar! Voltaremos mais vezes com certeza!

Tudo conforme descrito, apto bem localizado, Dejanira sempre pronta para nos atender, uma Brahma na geladeira de boas vindas, enfim foi uma experiência excelente em minha primeira viagem via Airbnb. Abraço e muito obrigado Dejanira.

When i came at the adres the doorman gave me the keys. The appartment is in the middle of Lapa on a perfect location!! Bars and restaurants are just around the corner. The appartment was so nice with everything you need. A small kitchen, fridge, nice hot shower, good bed, television. And the gym and sauna down and pool on the rooftop made it all perfect. Come back for sure!! Love this city and place to stay:) thanks!!

El departamento está muy bueno, corresponde exactamente a las fotografías.
Está ubicado exactamente en la movida de Río. Esta inmerso en pleno centro de Río. Al lado de Lapa, muy cerca de barrio Santa Teresa. La calle del edificio es dónde pasan ómnibus y taxis. 
Esta a un par de cuadras de estación del tren subterráneo.
La comunicación con la conserjería del edificio es muy buena y tratan de ayudar ante cualquier problema.
Very nice apartment, with a pool and steam rroom available, dejinara was very helpful. Lapa is the place to be if you like to party. Highly recommended

I really had great time in Dejanira's place. The location is perfect, close to everything I needed to do and lovely atmosphere during the June's Lapa parties. The place corresponds to the pictures and Dejanira is always ready to reply to any questions. I would love to stay there again!

I highly appreciated safety of the place: secure entry and someone at the reception 24 hours. 
The place was extremely clean and had most of the necessary appliances with exception of an iron. Yet the apartment complex has laundry services.
There were some issues with internet (36 hours or so) but that was not Dejanira's fault, rather local provider's.

Dejanira was very responsive.
TLDR: if you want to stay in that part of the city, I strongly recommend considering that apartment.

Our time in Rio staying at Dejanira's apartment was fantastic, I personally don't think that the photos do the property justice and feel that in person the property is actually bigger! The facilities were fantastic and we enjoyed using the pool (which is also a lot bigger in person) which has stunning views over Rio, including Christ the Redeemer on Corcovado mountain. The staff were extremely friendly and helpful and learnt our faces immediately so we had no problem at all gaining access to the very secure apartment (the staff buzz you in the gates via CCTV). The neighbourhood is more downtown Rio and if you like a good night out it will be perfect for you. We didn't feel that the neighbourhood was the safest of areas in Rio, but then again anywhere in Rio during the night isn't the safest place to be. The noise from the street at night was sometimes a little loud especially on Fridays and Saturdays which are extremely busy times in Lapa however we understand that this noise is unavoidable and inevitable. It must also be taken into consideration that we were in Rio for the busiest two weeks of the year, during the 2016 Olympics, a time when at night there were hundreds of thousands of tourists on the streets as well as the locals! Despite this as soon as we entered the double electronic gated apartment block we felt completely at ease and safe and during or time in Rio we spent one of the day's exploring Lapa, admiring its arches and the colourful artwork and graffiti that the locality had to offer. The apartment was perfect for us, size, location, accessibility were all excellent. Our neighbours were very friendly and helpful and would always say "good morning" and "good evening" in the elevator throughout the day. There was a very convenient supermarket just 1 minutes  walk from the apartment and the kitchen had everything you could possible need. If however you prefer to eat out, Lapa has many excellent bars and restaurants and so does Copacabana and Ipanena if you want to travel a little further away. The shower was particularly excellent-hot water was always in abundance. This apartment had everything we wanted and we couldn't have asked for a better place to stay during our time spent in Rio De Janeiro for the Olympics. If and when we ever return to Rio Dejanira's apartment is the only option for us and we would love to stay there again.
Excelente! Tudo conforme o combinado! Retorno garantido!

Gostamos muito do apartamento, as fotos são exatamente como ele é. A Dejanira foi muito atenciosa, simpática, antes, durante e após a nossa viagem. O apt é excelente tem tudo que se precisa, me senti em casa. É bem localizado, fácil acesso a tudo. Recomendo sem dúvidas. Obrigada até a próxima.
the place is really amazing, everything in the building, services and the apto are great.

My experience at Dejanira's flat was very good. The apartment itself is spacious, clean, with all the facilities that you might need, like AC, WiFi, Fan etc. The Building is very good located, close to Lapa, with a lot of restaurants, bars, pubs. Metro Station is about 15 mins walk (Cinelandia). Dejanira was attentive and made sure that everything was ok. I can just recommend her and her apartment.
Dejanira fue una excelente host, siempre muy atenta

El departamento es excelente, muy confortable, tal cual se muestra en las fotos. El barrio es muy típico de Río, muy bohemio, mucho movimiento nocturno. Bien conectado con el resto de la ciudad y cómodo en cuanto a servicios y abastecimiento diarios. 
La pileta es muy cómoda, la gente del edificio muy cordial y amable. Dejanira sumamente atenta, contesta en seguida los mensajes y es muy clara y cálida.
Un gusto alojarse acá, lo recomendaría siempre. Imperdible.

O apartamento é fiel as fotos. Muito confortável, bonito e tudo funciona. Tivemos acesso a piscina, o que foi muito bom para os momentos em que não queríamos andar pela cidade. Bem localizado, não tivemos dificuldade para ir a lugar algum. Os funcionários do prédio são muito educados e solicitos e aproveitamos muito a Lapa a pé, sempre nos sentindo seguros. Obrigada Dejanira!
Great place to stay!! Has everything you need and it's close to everything. It's thee perfect place to stay in Rio

Adoramos o apartamento da Dejanira. Eu e minha namorada ficamos lá por 6 dias, e saímos encantados. O apartamento é bem localizado, fica próximo a pontos turísticos da cidade, no centro da Lapa, próximo a bares e ao mesmo tempo um prédio seguro. E a anfitriã é bastante solícita, acessível. O apartamento estava limpo e organizado. Só elogios ao apartamento da Dejanira. Não vemos a hora de voltar.

Stay at Dejanira's place was the best stay in Airbnb for me. With a decent price you'll get everything. A modern and clean apartment with a very good air-conditioning, sauna, 24h gym and the most welcoming host.

If one thing should be said about the apartment it is that in the weekends it can get a bit noisy, but that is what you should expect when staying in Lapa.

Highly recommend this stay!

name: Double room with private bathroom
summary: Double room on the second floor of a new constructed duplex of modern design. There are a wardrobe, a small table and its own air conditioner that could be used  for winter as well as for summer. Large family size bed of 135 x 190 cm. Inside the apartment you could freely use large kitchen with dining table and a lot of modern kitchen devices. Itºs located in a quiet neighborhood just in  15 min by train or metro (the train or metro station are just in 5 min by foot from apartment).

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation 44 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

La pasamos muy bien en bcn y en lo de sonia, tiene todo muy limpio y equipado, el departamento es hermoso, cerca del metro asiq podes ir  a todos lados, nosotros hicimos todo caminando y sin problema. Sin duda lo recomiendo. Gracias Sonia x tu amabilidad sobre todo con emilia.bso
Todo muy bien, la habitación y la casa limpia y en zona tranquila. Baño privado y Sonia es una muy buena host.

El dúplex de Sonia es muy nuevo. La habitación y el baño, que ha sido solo para nosotros, estaban limpios y eran confortables. Sonia es una anfitriona muy agradable, silenciosa y respetuosa, hemos estado muy cómodos, nos ha hecho sentir como en casa. Muy próximo a la Meridiana, con la parada de metro de Fabra i Puig a 3 minutos andando, donde coges la línea roja y vas directo al centro sin transbordos. Muy recomendable.

Sonia es agradable y nos ayudó en todo para movernos en Barcelona, la atención fue increíble.

El barrio está muy cerca del Metro y del centro, además el apartamento es limpio, agradable y súper equipado.
el barrio era muy tranquilo solo que a cierta hora de la noche y del día pasan los camiones de basura y hacen mucho ruido.
Sonia is a great host, open-minded, helpful and nice. The apartment is clean, close to the metro and shops. Certainly one of the best place to be in Barcelona. Thank you for everything Sonia!

Sonia was a very nice guest. Very kind and very helpful for us. I really enjoyed stay at her home.  it was very comfortable also. The bedroom had air conditioners and it was very clean. The Bathroom was only for us. It was not so far from metro and there is very good restaurants near there. Thanks you very much Sonia!

The trip did not start in a very comforting way as our previous host cancelled our months old booking 2 weeks before our holidays. This solution really saved our trip to Barcellona. Sonia’s place was walking distance from the metro, very easy to get to and just few km away from the very center if the city. The room was nice and clean just like the private bathroom. The first time for us in a room rather than full apartment and were nicely surprised about Sonia’s kindness and confidence. Really recommend this room.

Sonia was very kind. I approciated the bottle of water on arrival and cup of coffee for a breakfast. This small things make the life better :) as well as willingness to accommodate us sooner and let us leave later. Her appartment is clean and very quite. I fully recommend it.

Sonia is very nice host.  I really enjoyed stay at her home. The apartment was clean, near to shops and metro. Bathroom was only for us. When we arrived we got a bottle of water. It was very nice gesture!
Excelente anfitriona, muy buena ubicación, colonia tranquila y con muchos lugares para comer, cerca del metro. Muy recomendable.

name: Quarto Taquara - Jacarepaguá
summary: Quarto exclusivo com armário e sofá cama de casal, possui ainda um colchão de casal. Apartamento localizado próximo a estação do BRT - Aracy Cabral - Bairro da Taquara - Jacarepaguá de fácil acesso aos bairros da Barra da Tijuca, Recreio, etc.

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt:
Luana é ótima anfitriã, me senti em casa. Compartilhamento de áreas em comum, cozinha, sala sem problemas. Quarto limpo com armário grande e espaço suficiente. E o melhor de tudo, pertinho de onde eu precisava ir, fui e voltei caminhando, o bairro estava tranquilo.
Antes de ir ao Rio, nos comunicamos por celular, e ela pode me dar as direções de como chegar ao apartamento. No final, gentilmente se ofereceu para me apanhar no Terminal Rodoviário, a caminho de volta do trabalho. Achei ótimo, por não conhecer a malha viária urbana por lá. 
Conversamos muito, achei muito interessante.

name: Ipanema: moderno apê 2BR + garagem
summary: Moderno apartamento de 2 quartos com garagem em bucólica rua de Ipanema, a poucos metros da Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas.

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt:
O apartamento é perfeito! Tudo novinho, bonito. O local do apartamento também é excelente, vários restaurantes, barzinhos, farmácia, tudo o que precisamos, e também fica a uns 500 m da praia, super tranquilo! 
TV, geladeira, fogão, microondas e ar condicionado no  apartamento todo, inclusive, no banheiro rs.
Se o apartamento já é tudo de bom, a anfitriã o torna ainda melhor. Ela responde tudo mega rápido, nos esperou com uma cesta recheada de coisas deliciosas, é uma simpatia e, por fim, nos deu até uma carona até o (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza, voltaremos e nos hospedaremos no mesmo local. Só temos a agradecer. A nossa primeira experiência com o Airnbn foi surpreendente!

THE APARTMENT WAS GREAT EXCEPT FOR THE AIR CONDITIONING LEAK FROM THE ABOVE APT. AND I BELIEVE THAT THE HOST SHOULD NOT DEMONSTRATE HIS OR HER POLITICAL OPINION BECAUSE SOME PEOPLE MIGHT NOT AGREE WITH IT AND NEVER COME BACK BECAUSE OF IT. APART FROM THIS EVERYTHING WAS GREAT.

Eu já uso o Airbnb há algum tempo, mas essa é a primeira vez que vou deixar um comentário porque vale o tempo. 

Fui muito bem atendido, o apartamento é muito confortável e eu recomendo. :)

Un grand Merci a Barbara pour son acceuil et sa gentillesse.
Nous avons eu plusieurs conseils sur les visites a faire a Rio mais aussi sur les restaurants à proximité. 
L'appartement etait spacieux, moderne, charmant et tres coquet.
super bien situé a quelques rues de la plage, restaurants, cafés, supermarché et les boutiques.
Nous aurions aimé un meilleur équipement cuisine mais c'est réellement le seul petit hic tout le reste etait fantastique!
Merci aussi au portier Joao qui etait tres gentil et serviable.
Nous avons adore notre experience et louerons encore cet appartement a notres prochaine visite à Rio.
Merci encore mille et une fois.
katia
Apto incrível! Localização próximo a bares e restaurantes. A Bárbara é uma graça,  muito atenciosa.  Voltarei sempre.

Nice, modern flat. Situated in a brilliant location, perfect for the whole of Rio, close to the Metro, not far from lots of bars and restaurants in Ipanema / Leblon etc. Flat is spacious and modern and Barbara was helpful. Would stay again.

The apartment was amazing and Barbara was a great host!  It is perfectly located in Ipanema, a short walk to the beach with streets lined with restaurants, shops, and bars.  The apartment had a doorman 24/7 and the neighborhood felt quite safe.  Barbara was extremely responsive and provided many recommendations.  Overall this apartment and Barbara positively contributed to our wonderful stay in Rio, would definitely recommend!!
