Barbara foi excelente anfitriã, muito atenciosa e prestativa. O apartamento é ótimo, novinho e excelente localização. Recomendo a estadia.

Der Empfang war gut organisiert. Ich konnte die Wohnung zur vereinbarten Zeit haben. Anderson, ein Mitarbeiter von Barbara, zeigte mir alles in der Wohnung und wie es funktioniert (Klimaanlage, Fernseher, Dusche, etc.) und er gab mir sehr gute Tips, wie ich am besten zu den Sehenswuerdigkeiten in Rio komme.
Das Appartement befindet sich in einer sicheren Gegend und man hat ca 400 - 500 m zum Strand Ipanema. Es gibt einige Gaststaetten und kleine Supermärkte in der Nähe.
Die Ausstattung des Appartements ist sehr gut - 1 Hauptbad und 1 kleines separates, komplette Küche, TV in Wohnzimmer und Schlafzimmer, etc. Es ist wie auf den Fotos bei Airbnb dargestellt. Die Fotos haben dabei infolge der Beleuchtung einen leichten Gelbton. Im Original ist alles etwas heller.
Mir hat es gefallen hier zu uebernachten, da ich im Urlaub keine Hotels möchte

Fomos muito bem recebidos e tivemos uma ótima estadia. Apartamento em perfeitas condições e em ótima localização. A Barbara, hostess, nos recebeu com dicas sobre as facilidades por perto do apartamento. Recomendamos fortemente.

Everything was fine. Nice position and beautiful flat.
Thanks Barbara!

Apartamento bem localizado e confortável! Ficamos surpresos apenas com o Futon do segundo quarto, uma cama seria um pouco mais confortável. A Barbara foi bem atenciosa em todos os momentos! Muito bom! Voltaria com certeza!
Very nice apartment! Perfectly situated between both the beach and the laguna. Communication with Barbara was easy.

We had a wonderful time in Ipanema, Barbara was very informative upon arrival. She gave us great tips on where to go, good places to eat. The neighborhood felt safe.  The apartment is exactly as described. It was an overall pleasent experience for us. Thank you Barbara.
Apartamento aconchegante e localização excelente.
Thank you Barbara we enjoyed our 2nd stay with you.  The apartment was great and the location perfect. Thanks for everything, we will let you know when we return to Rio.

Apartamento incrível e muito bem localizado no RJ (fica ao lado da Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas e muito próximo do metrô). Fomos muito bem recebidos pela Barbara e recomendamos o apartamento para todos que visitem a cidade. Esperamos voltar em breve!!!

Barbara was great and helpful with our staying.
The apartment was great and close to the beach and the Rodrigo de Freitas lagoon.
Great place to stay in Rio.
Excelente departamento , muy moderno y cómodo sin duda volvería , la atención de bárbara  fue excelente .recomendable 100% .
O apartamento é lindo, moderno, super bem localizado! Você está próximo a bares, restaurantes, e ao lado de ruas de comércio com excelentes lojas.

name: 2017 , férias no Rio
summary: Casa com excelente espaço, localizada no meio da natureza, próximo ao um dos acessos do Parque Estadual da Pedra Branca, que conta com cachoeiras e trilhas na Mata Atlântica e a 10 minutos de carro ou 35 minutos a pé do Parque Olímpico (4.5km) e 3 minutos de carro ou 12 minutos a pé da Vila Olímpica. A casa pricipal conta com 2 quartos com suíte, 2 salas, cozinha, 1 banheiro social e área de serviço.Também contamos com um anexo com 1 quarto com suíte. Os quartos poderão ser compartilhados!

reviews.txt: Ótimo para relaxar! O espaço de Alice é confortável e tranquilo, onde podemos caminhar com segurança desfrutando de uma linda paisagem com serras.Uma vegetação exuberante. Além da possibilidade de fazer uma trilha para cachoeiras.  Alice e sua família foram bastante prestativas e nos ajudaram no que precisamos. Grata por tudo!

name: Belle chambre à côté Metro Papineau
summary: Chambre dans un bel appartement moderne avec balcon, ascenseur et terrasse. Private room in a beautiful modern apartment  with balcony, elevator and patio. La chambre est fermée avec une lit double. Vous aurez accès à une salle de bain avec une douche, terrasse. L'appartement est climatisé.  Votre chambre est équipé d'une connexion Wi-Fi illimité. Vous serez proche du centre ville, au pied du pont Jacques Cartier et à distance de marche de toutes les commodités (métro, supermarché, pharmacie

reviews.txt: The place was great, as was the host! I would recommend staying here.
J'ai adoré rester là. Très acceuillant.
Angel est un hôte très sympa et arrangeant ! L'appartement est agréable à vivre et propre. Proche du métro et du centre ville. Nous avons passé un très bon séjour !
Angel was warm and welcoming and has a beautiful apartment. I'd recommend his place to anyone visiting downtown Montreal!

name: Nice room with queen sized bed
summary: A lovely room with a queen sized bed, chair, dresser, lamp and closet. This room has AC for the hotter months. Guests are welcome to use the kitchen, living room and study.

reviews.txt: Jen was very accomodating.  The room was fine, though being an old building you hear any conversations/people there.  Great location though, near the metro, plateau, mile end.  Lots of great restaurants nearby.

Plateau Montreal Artisinal is value for money.  The location is ideal and there is an excellent range of cafes, restaurants and bars handy.  The Metro is close by.  The accommodation was adequate and the breakfast was great.  This accommodation is more in the range of a guest house than a BnB.  
Peter and Jenny
We really enjoyed our stay.  Great location – close to BIXI stand, metro, shops, restaurants and cafes.  Jen is super easy to get along with.

We had a great stay at Jen's place, It was  an old buliding but full of  characteristics, close to METRO, and shops.  The rooms are colorful with comfortable beds. Breakfast was excellent. Jen is very accomodating. i highly recommend Jen's place.

I do not recommend this place. I arrived on a hot day, there was no air condotion, bed much to small for a couple, room is dark and not appealing at all
The room description is definitely deciving
Not worth even to stay even for free!

Check out other places
Best of luck - H.
I stayed in Montreal for one night so my friends and I enjoyed Jen's hospitality!! The breakfast was really good, thanks for everything

This was a cute apartment in a very great location in Montreal.  Jen was a very helpful and generous host.  Breakfast was simple, but very delicious.  My only complaint was that the room is on a fairly busy street and when you have the window open in the morning (which is needed in the summer), it can be very load very early (~6am).  Other than that, it was a great place.

Jen's b&b is a great place to stay, she is very sweet, prepares breakfast with lots of love, the rooms and bathroom are super clean, great location and very independent, it is easy to feel at home.
Also, you should try Jen's massage, she is awesome!
Great location. Nice breakfast. Jen was a pleasant and informative host. I'm very glad I did this for my first trip to Montreal and I would definitely do this again.

Jen is a great host--very accommodating, makes a lovely breakfast with endless cups of coffee and her rooms are all neat and clean. The location is perfect and within walking distance of lots of great food and Montreal sights. Our room had a fan but others might find the lack of air conditioning challenging in the summer. We had a really nice stay.

It was perfect! the house is charming and you feel like in your own home. Jen is very welcoming and her breakfast is delicious. A very great host!
I've already decided to come back.. Thanks Jen!

We booked with Jen pretty last minute and found her to be very cooperative and accommodating. The location is centrally located, right next to a subway stop and near everything Montreal has to offer. Jen made us a delicious bagel breakfast in the morning, and was very flexible with our check-in/check-out time.
The place was great. Jen was very hospitable and we had a really comfortable and fun visit to Montreal

Great place in a really handy location very easy to see the city, on a lovely street full of restaurants and shops. Very nice building with old school charm, very arty feel. Beds where comfortable room was large and airy with huge window. no air con but the fan in the room worked grand. Wifi and free parking was an extra bonus. Breakfast every morning was lovely. If I get back to Montreal I will stay there again.
We were in town just for one night, and Jen's place worked great!  Very easy to arrive, and everyone was very friendly.

Jen was very welcoming and responsive.  She and her friend provided a delicious and substantive breakfast in the morning.  Nice neighborhood right on St. Denis.  Large sunny room with comfy queen mattress. Fun and funky decor, nice little terrace and ktichen.  Couple of things: 1)  there are two bathrooms- one with toilet, the other with sink and bathtub.  The sink drained realy slowly so was a little discouraging.  Shower was fine, water pressure a little low.  2) our room, the Green Room, is right on St. Denis - trucks ROARing woke us early a.m.  3) be sure to take your room key with you when you go to the bathroom, etc, otherwise your door will lock!  Maybe I'm fussier than my younger reviewers, but these are important to note.  Otherwise, a very nice stay with friendly and knowledgable hosts.
Jen was a gracious host and very friendly. The accomodations were more than adequate and breakfasts were yummy.  We even got a free concert in the bargain.

We strongly recommend this location. We would surely stay here again in the future.
NOTE: There are 3 rooms at this location. 2 of them face St Denis, and this is a busy street with traffic noise. The 1 room in the back, away from St Denis, is much quieter. This is our favorite room.
The location, one block from Metro/Laurier is excellent. The building is from 1890, and has a lot of character. There are 2 flights of stairs to get up to the rooms.
Jen is a very welcoming and conscientious host. She went beyond our expectations and helped us with some issues with our room and the AirBNB website. We are most appreciative.
Breakfast was very good.
We stayed here for one week. in 2 of the 3 rooms. (BTW: The beds in these 2 rooms are folders, and are a bit harder than we like.)
This is a fine place to stay. Jen is calm, welcoming, and has a nice sense of humor.

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Jen's B&B.  Rooms were airy and clean with a kind of artistic feel that I fell immediately in love with.  B&B is in a great central location, surrounded by many great shops, restaurants, and bars, and near Metro station.  Jen is welcoming, enthusiastic, and warm.  Yummy, filling breakfast was a great start to each morning!

name: Elegance and Peace in Potts Point
summary: My beautifully renovated Art Deco studio apartment is in the heart of Kings Cross, yet so peaceful and quiet. New bathroom and modern kitchen, in the Art Deco tradition, are stunning to be in. A Sleeping Duck queen bed which is absolutely fabulous, 4G unlimited wifi, high quality washer/dryer and dishwasher. Fully self contained!

reviews.txt:
Mariana was a great host.She was kind,warm, and always helpful.
I had a great 3 month stay at Mariana's (Website hidden by Airbnb) location,it was clean,well equipped,everything was well prepared.And clean big bathtub,I was enjoyed every bath time.
The studio apartment was exactly what I needed. It was quiet, and had a very comfy new bed. Thank you Mariana for your assistance and the flowers throughout the apartment made it so homely.

Mariana's place is great!  It's in a fantastic location off Macleay Street with lots of cafes and restaurants on the doorstep as well as easy access to the City via train at KingsX and buses.  It also is an easy walk down to Rushcutters Bay park and the water if you're looking for a bit of peace and tranquility. The apartment itself is very quiet  at the back of the buildings and well away from the buzz of Macleay St.  It has also been brilliantly and neatly designed by Mariana with a great bathroom and kitchen with high quality appliances and a really comfortable bed as well as lots of nice  Art Deco touches.  Mariana is a fantastic host - really open and friendly,  and generously invited us to use anything in the kitchen and bathroom cupboards.  We would highly recommend Mariana's apartment and Mariana as a host - and would definitely stay here again.
Great central location of the apartment. It's perfect for two people for a few nights. It's truly a studio but Mariana has done a great job putting all the basics in.

Well decorated studio apartment great for couples or single travelers. The apartment is newer and has a great efficiency kitchen with all appliances you need in addition to a nice bathroom.

The view looks into an inner space in between apartments and you can see into the neighbors kitchen, but nothing new if you have stayed in big city airbnbs.

The apartment did not have A/C at the time of stay, I would recommend this place as long as it's cooler outside or more fans were brought in.

The location is phenomenal. Lots of restaurants and a few coffee shops nearby with easy access to Kings Cross Station for your metro needs.

Great stay overall!
Great find in a charming building. The apartment is well appointed and the communication and service was fantastic. Will definitely stay again!

Beautiful apartment, very central location (I walked to the city one day) in fabulous Potts Point. The apartment had everything I needed (including a bathtub!) and the host was delightful. Highly recommended and I would definitely come back here.

the apartment is perfectly located. It is located within walking distance of the city center. public transport is also very close to the apartment. everything that was needed was a in the equipment flat. everything was very well organized. I would heartily recommend!
Beautiful place close to everything, quiet and clean with very nice touches and a super comfortable bed. Really enjoyed our stay!

Mariana is a fantastic host. She is very friendly and it was very easy to communicate with her.  We love her (Website hidden by Airbnb) is  well equipped and very clean.  There were many cafes nearby and King Cross Stn was a short walk away. We highly recommend this apartment.

What a terrific little place to stay. Its freshly renovated and homely. The location is excellent with some of Sydney's best restaurants literally around the corner. Also easy access for Uber pick ups etc. Thanks so much for hosting us Mariana, it was lovely to meet you.

The boutique apartment is nice, got everything in it, like cooking stuff and washing machine.  Maybe a bit stuffed during summer cos not quite convenient to open windows in the living room, but it’s around 20+ degrees during our stay, so it’s ok for us. The apt is on 1/F, so need to walk few steps with your luggage. Mariana is very nice and helpful as well.
Although it was only for two nights, I had a wonderful time at Mariana's apartment. It is a beautifully renovated room, very clean and the location is great. Definitely recommend it!

This is a great place to stay for a couple visiting Sydney. It is not large but very well equipped with high quality fittings and furnished to a high standard. Kings Cross station is within easy walking distance as are plenty of good eateries and a supermarket.
Mariana was a fabulous host, very easy to contact. Brilliant location beautifully laid out apartment!

Mariana is such a great host..welcomes and bids goodbye to her guest personally. She responds quickly and has created a comfortable & beautiful abode for guest. Her flat is close to Kings cross station, bus stops and hop on/off stop. Close to grocery, market, restaurants and bars...including ice cream shops :). Her apartment is very reflective of Sydney...its a combination of a sense of culture & vintage with the comforts of whats new & functional. I LOVE the fact that we come home to a very comfy bed and bath tub + epsom salt after a very tiring touristy walking day. :)
Lovely location, very well appointed homely feel and great value.

We loved our stay here in Pott's Point! It is walking distance to King's Cross station and very accessible to the city center. Mariana's apartment is clean, well-equipped, and elegant. Best for couples as it might be a little tight for a family!
Great little completely self-contained studio.

Mariana's apartment is centrally located, done up to a high standard (she installed a Miele dishwasher and induction hob) and is exactly as described in the description. The kitchen is also well equipped should you need to cook. It's clean, convenient and comfortable. Public transport is all within a few minutes walk which is always great. Check-in went smoothly too and we would like to thank Mariana for the wonderful stay. We wouldn't hesitate to recommend her apartment to other guests and would return to stay there during our next visit to Sydney.

name: ROOM + ENSUITE INNER CITY MOD HOUSE
summary: Large room with en-suite full personal bathroom plus own TV  in modern house with all mod cons less than 10 minutes to the city by bus and a short walk to cafes, restaurants and pubs plus shopping. Set in a quiet friendly back street with parking.

reviews.txt: I didn't meet Alison as she was away, but Adam let me in and explained everything to me. The house is beautifully (and very newly) renovated, the bed was wonderfully comfortable, and I had my own huge bathroom which was very luxurious. The street is quiet but very convenient to everything. All in all, a great bargain and a lovely place to stay - I'll be back!

Although I did not meet Alison, Adam showed me around.
He is very relaxed and this place was realy nice to stay.
Great bathroom and friendly quiet neighbourhood.  Easy to go to from this place to go to the centre as well.
Great stay in Rozelle in Alison's house. I needed a quiet and peaceful place to put my head each night while visiting friends in Sydney and it lived up to expectations!

Staying with Allison and Adam was wonderful. The place is centrally located and easy to walk to downtown Sydney or even take a bus. I was able to get in a game of cricket with Adam I had a blast coming from America this was my first experience in Australia. The place is very clean and modern love the bathroom and the kitchen is great too. The bedroom was at the top of flat very quiet, clean the bed was very comfortable slept well. I would highly recommend this place for anyone in the future it was wonderful place to stay Adam and Allison are great!
Easy stay with excellent bus connection to the city. Shower was my favourite at this place, besides of that I had a good sleep in the comfy bed.
Adam has been very helpful. House is modern and very quiet. My first time using AIRbnb and am impressed
The house was in an ideal spot for the party I was attending.  Warm comfy bed and lovely hot shower.

Alison and Adam were my saviours in Sydney. our logistics officer booked us an hotel in the middle of nowhere in Ryde, claiming that it was the nearest point to Sydney Olympic Park as i had to attend the WPC14 with my colleagues. When i check the location, had to cancel and rushed to my ultimate accommodation portal, broadcasting generic message to nearby hosts to secure an accommodation the soonest.

Alison was among the first to reply, and to pre-confirm...
By the time i got there, Adam was already waiting for me and even kind enough to give me all the directions at 8am and off course waited for me outside to make sure that i'm paying the right cab fee. 

What can i say Adam, made feel at home from very first moment, kind, genuine and warm welcoming host. The house is is really nice fully refurbished, in a quite and well connected neighbourhood. My room was upstairs, a nice sunny room with  a queen bed and a bathroom attached. After i dropped in my luggage, Adam gave me guided orientation tour to the house, with access to all amenities. 

Felt like a VIP 5 star treatment as Adam even gave me a pre-paid bus ticket, which made my first(s) bus rides easier as some stations are pre-paid only.  So now that you that i have been at a great apartment, with great hosts, that's all, Rozelle is a really nice neighbourhood. walking distance from my hosts' place, you can make it to the main street packed, with cafe, bars and restaurant, a vibrant market and lot of attractions. if you happen to stay over a weekend don't miss Rozelle Market (Sat & Sun). 

Now the funny part, Adam was so happy to receive me as he's a all star backgammon player and he knows that Lebanese people are really good at that and he was so eager for round. One night we decided to play a round and Adam's expectations went all down the drain, i think i was the first Lebanese ever to be clumsy backgammon player. We agree that we will play another time via (Hidden by Airbnb) and i will have support from fellow Lebanese players :)

All in all, i great time, the house is warm, clean, and comfortable and the hosts are simply AWESOME

Alison immediately replied to my booking request and organised for her hubby to meet me as I was checking in late.

They were very helpful and gave me a bus card to use. The room was very spacious and the house was close to transport and restaurants.

Excellent hosts in an excellent location.

I had a great stay! Alison was very efficient with my booking and advised me Adam would look after me on arrival. Adam was a great host, carried my case upstairs and even invited me to the pub. The room comfortable and had a great view. The bus around the corner was very convenient for me to get into the city. Thanks for having me!

It is lovely neighborhood, very easy access to all the buses to the city center. The host adam has been helpful and was generous to let me use his living room for my work. The first night the room floor was dusty but was happy it was thoroughly cleaned on the second day. The only concern I had was the room has no lock, given I was the only female guest in the house and did not know any of other (male) guests on the first day of arrival, I was slightly nervous in the first night until I met other guests who were very kind and friendly.

Thanks for a great stay, I have stayed here on three occasions, and have been welcomed by a very considerate host each time. The property is located close to shops restaurants and the gym. I would highly recommend this property and am looking forward to my next visit
Cheers
Elise

name: Sunny Room (for One) Minutes from Coogee Beach!
summary: Close to Coogee Beach, Ritz Cinema, University of New South Wales (UNSW), Prince of Wales Hospital, Randwick Racecourse, bars, restaurants, shops, public transport... Yet, in a very quite suburb.

reviews.txt: This is a great place to stay! Very clean and fresh apartment, close to beautiful coogee beach and easy to travel around in Sydney. The hosts are great, made you feel welcome and had good communication. I strongly recommend this place!

Cindy is lovely, easy going and very pleasant to talk to. The house was very cozy and clean. Slightly away from the city but has bus right outside that goes directly to the city which is very good. There are many buses slightly longer opposite which takes about 5-10min walk. In the same area, it has restaurants and other shops so it pretty good and near all you need. Close to beautiful Coogee beach as well. Nice to stay at Cindy place.

The location of Cindy's house is great, quite accessible from the city. You can walk to the Coogee beach easily. The neighbourhood looked safe and is very quiet. Due to my busy schedule I couldn't spend much time at Cindy's house and chat with her. But the evening we met and sat down for a chat was great. She's kind, funny and very helpful. I wish her all the best and hope her place will be available when I visit Sydney next time.

Cindy is kind, lovely and easy going. Her house is nice,clean and also  quite at night. There are many buses  around there and restaurants just in walkable distance.  I stayed there during my final exam period, and I felt like at home. Nice to stay at Cindy's place !

Ich habe der Aufenthalt bei Cindy und Miki total genossen. Obwohl wir uns in den 3 Tagen kaum gesehen und gesprochen haben, hatte ich immer das Gefühl willkommen zu sein und habe mich total wohlgefühlt. Ein schöner Aufenthalt. Die Stadt ist schnell mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln zu erreichen und trotzdem liegt die Unterkunft ruhig. Alles in allem ein sehr schönes wenn auch einfach eingerichtetes Zimmer. Alles sauber und gemütlich. Vielen Dank nochmals.
This was a lovely home for a short stay. Cindy and Miki were welcoming, nice and informative. Cindy is punctual with her responses to messages.
I loved that the place was in a quiet area and close to Coogee Beach. From there you can do the Coast Walk to Bondi Beach which is amazing.
A nice place to stay. well equipped:)

This place is great!
Cindy & Miki are lovely hosts and make their guests welcome.
The room is very nice & the location of the apartment is good because Coogee beach is approx 20 mins walk away & bus stops outside lead to the City & Coogee beach.
I recommend this place for your stay in Randwick :-)

The room was exactly as described, small but cozy and comfortable. Ideal for a short stay! It was very clean, and Cindy and Miki absolutely lovely hosts.
Located close to shops, restaurants and the beach it was only a short bus ride into central Sydney.
Highly recommend it!
Ambiente agradável, limpo e bem localizado. Recomendo!

Lovely stay at Cindy and Micky's place, the location is quite convenient, although space of the room is a bit small. But it is so nice that Cindy provide me with fans in this hot weather! Rooms are also clean and elegant.
Great place to stay! Cindy was a great host. Check in and out was easy. Good advice on where to eat out.
The room is really cosy and the bathroom is nice and clean. It was a good place to stay in Sydney eventhough it's not in the inner city, because the bus stop is right in front of the door. :)
Fantastic! Very comfortable, clean and neat. Road noise started early but wasn't too bad.

I didn't really want to leave! This is a great place. The location is fantastic, 10 mins to beach, 5 mins to shops and bus stops directly outside the building. Couldn't ask for better. There is only one negative I can think of and even this is minor, no offer of teas or coffees for the morning. But that really doesn't take away from how much I enjoyed my stay! The bedroom was pretty much perfect, very comfortable. Bed was amazing! The apartment itself is very clean and tidy. And Cindy the host was great too! So friendly and welcoming. There is no doubt that I would definitely go back to this AirBnB room. Big thanks to Cindy for having me.
Cindy is a wonderful host, I had an awesome time during my stay in Sydney! The place is close to Randwick and public transport and not far from the city by bus.

No need to transfer to the city. This place is a good location and nice host:)
Just wifi connection is not so good. 
I had a good sleep at there.
I didn't see too much of Cindy or Miki, but they were both lovely! Great apartment, super comfy bed and spotlessly clean. Thanks guys!

I havent met Cindy but her communication prior the checkin was perfect. I met Miki and her bf and they were really friendly and welcoming. I really enjoyed my chats with them and my stay was perfect. Highly recommend! I had a great time, 20 min walking distance only from Coogee beach and the start of the coastal walk.

name: Park Guell apartment with terrace
summary: Apartment with terrace in a quiet street of Barcelona, 5 minutes walk from Park Güell and 20 minutes by public transport to the city center. Renovated and fully equipped. HUTB-000929

reviews.txt:
The apartment is in a nice spot high up in the town with a great view (from til street). 
It is a 15-20 minutte uphill walk from the nearests Metro - but the area is quiet.
The outside terasse is wounderful - we enjoyed to have breakfast here. There is a nice little shop just next door.
The apartment and the bed clothes+towels was clean - so even it is a full time/only guest apartment we can recommend it.

La casa esta muy bien equipada y es realmente muy linda (solo funciona muy mal la conectividad de wife) y queda un poco alejada de los centros turísticos.  El único inconveniente fue que nuestro vuelo se demoro dos horas y al llegar 2 horas mas tarde del horario acordado, pasada las 20.00 se nos cobro 30 euro en el chec kin

Our host's friend was outside the property when we arrived, which was a bonus as travelled with our two children. We were shown around the apartment, and shown all guides personally put together by Regina. The apartment was as pictured and the children loved the apartment, we were within 5 mins walk from a local supermarket be warned parents there are a few steep hills slightly difficult with the stroller buggy but a good workout all the same. We were 10-12 mins walk from the subway Alfonso X only 4 stops from the Ramblas which was "thumbs up".

We loved our stay our two children were very comfortable in the apartment and loved the patio, there were ample playgrounds in close proximity. The neighbourhood was quiet and locals were very helpful.

SUCIO Y MUY POCO RECOMENDABLE.
Bajo con difícil accesibilidad, absoluta falta de limpieza y con fuerte olor a humedad provocada por guardar las sábanas mojadas dentro del único armario de la casa, recubierto de moho por dentro. Falta de limpieza absoluta en toda la casa que hacía muy incómoda su estancia y más con niños pequeños. El sofá donde supuestamente se podía dormir, tenía una gran mancha que ni se habían molestado en intentar limpiarla. Solo había un único armario recubierto de moho para guardar la ropa, que evidentemente no pudimos utilizar. La ducha estaba negra, picada y oxidada, lo que nos tocó limpiar a nosotros y desinfectarla un poco para poderla utilizar. La cocina llena cubierta por una capa de grasa que la hacía inútil para cocinar cualquier cosa. Escaleras hacia abajo completamente empinadas y estrechas.  Nada más llegar ni rastro de Regina o Juan, nos atendió una persona que ni siquiera sabía hablar bien castellano, por lo que dudo mucho de la existencia de Juan y Regina. Es absolutamente indignante que cuando pagas el apartamento te cobran unos gastos de limpieza que no han efectuado. Para colmo nos cobraron 30 € en concepto de checking. La zona es tranquila aunque bastante alejada del metro, dado que tienes unas cuestas muy empinadas desde la parada más cernada de metro y luego toca subir cuesta arriba unos 15 minutos. De cara a los esfuerzos por parte del anfitrión, absolutamente ninguno. La persona que nos recibió ni siquiera sabía indicarnos donde estaba la tienda más cercana, un parking donde poder dejar el coche e incluso la parada de metro más cernada. Soy usuario de esta web desde hace tiempo, he visitado otros países de Europa usándola y ha sido con creces la peor experiencia que he tenido. Me siento completamente estafado.
Authentic experience of Barcelona neighbourhood life. Friendly locals, a number of convenience and fruit/veg stores, and an incredible city view from atop the hill.
The neighbourhood was very timid and relaxing, a good contrast with the city centre and the beaches, so it provided a great haven for relaxation.

L'appartement est sympa et bien équipé, dans un quartier charmant. Il correspond assez bien à l'annonce Airbnb. Il a malheureusement une odeur d'humidité constante et il est tout de même un peu loin du métro ainsi que du parking public. L'hôte nous a donné beaucoup d'informations avant notre arrivée mais nous l'avons pas vu du tout pendant le séjour. J'ai également fait une demande de modification pour la quelle je n'ai jamais reçu un retour. Dans l'ensemble c'était une bonne expérience.

This apartment is perfect for a large family. The rooms are large, clean and cool. The kitchen is basic but serviceable and the outside space is lovely. Maks let us in and showed us around and he was quick to respond to questions throughout the stay.

L'appartement est conforme aux descriptions. C'est sympa on s'y sent presque chez soi. Une légère odeur d'humidité qui est un peu désagréable. Cependant avec les fenêtres grandes ouvertes l'odeur s'en va rapidement.

Au départ le concierge était sensé nous recevoir. Une fois arrivées, ni l'hôte, ni le concierge n'ont répondu à nos appels. Heureusement une jeune fille attendait devant le logement qui nous a expliqué que c'était elle qui était sensée nous recevoir mais nous n'étions pas au courant.
Heureusement elle était très gentille, nous a très bien reçu et nous a expliqué le déroulement du séjour.
Une fois dans le logement nous nous sommes aperçus que celui-ci était très poussiéreux et nous avons donc dû faire le ménage car une des personnes était allergique aux acariens. Nous avons également dû acheter des produits pour faire le ménage, car les produits ménagers sur place étaient très limités.
Au niveau des équipements, beaucoup de choses étaient fournies (lave-vaisselle, lave-linge, fer à repasser, sèche cheveux, etc) mais la vaisselle était très limitée pour 3 personnes (manque de verres et de couverts).
Attention il n'y a pas de volets ni de rideaux opaques sur 2 chambres sur 4. Cependant draps de lit et serviettes de toilette sont fournies. Il manque cependant un tapis de douche pour la baignoire.
Les matelas étaient confortables et le quartier très calme mis à part un voisin qui mettait parfois de la musique à fond.
Au niveau de l'emplacement, le logement est très bien situé car à 10 minutes à pied d'une ligne de métro qui dessert tous les endroits importants de la ville (plage, centre ville, quartier gothique, etc).
Par contre, attention pour les personnes qui ont des difficultés à se déplacer car le logement est tout en haut d'une côte très raide.
Malgré tout, nous avons passé un agréable séjour dans ce logement et avons apprécié la terrasse ombragée.
Muy chulo el apartamento y muy limpio todo bien
Een heel mooi en groot appartement: ideaal om met kinderen naar toe te komen! Alles heel proper en verzorgd.

Das informations Material könnte mal wieder sortiert werden ,da alles mehrfach vorhanden ist und man somit nicht mehr weis was aktuell ist .Im hinteren Schlafzimmer neben dem Bad sollte ein blickdichter Vorhang angebracht werden ,da man vom Treppenhausflur Direkt reinschauen kann ,es ist nur ein dünner durchsichtiger Vorhang dran. Leider keine Kaffeemaschine in einer Größe für 6 Personen vorhanden und die andere hat keine Kanne, Auch fehlen Weingläser für mehr als eine Person. aber am schlimmsten war der Gestank ,Moderich ,muffelig kaum zum aushalten ,wir hatten schon überlegt abzubrechen fanden aber in der Größe keine für uns bezahlbare Unterkunft .zudem konnte eine Person von uns nicht mit da sie einen Unfall hatte und Frankreich nicht verlassen durfte aber es gab keine Reduktion ,sehr schade aber was will man erwarten wenn es kommerziell ist .

5 girls living in the apartment. It is a big place and the distance between the apartment and the city center is ok (you can walk, use metro and bus). When we arrived, all of us noticed a smell all over the apartment - like kind of moldy. This sadly affected our stay in the apartment. The bedding had the smell to, and this was bad! The sink was broken among other thinks. 
Otherwise a big apartment with a little outside teresse. 
- Camilla, Andrea, Cecilie, Kia and Heidi

Une expérience mitigée.
 il est vrai que la rue est calme et que l'on peut profiter de la jolie vue sur Barcelone mais il faudra pour cela monter des pentes raides pour atteindre l'appartement. De plus, dans l'immeuble l'escalier est très étroit et il n'y pas pas d'ascenseur. L'accès peut donc être difficile pour les familles avec enfants en bas age, les personnes agées et les personnes a mobilité reduites surtout qu' il est situé dans l'étages du bas de l'immeuble, sous le rez de chaussé. 
Les photos ne sont pas très fidèle a la réalité car l'apparetement manque de luminosité, effet, a part la terrasse, il y a un manque de fenêtres et aucunes de donne sur l’extérieur. La seule autre fenêtre présente dans une des chambres donne sur l'escalier de l'immeuble.  
Du fait de ce manque de fenêtre, l'appartement n'est pas très lumineux et sens le renfermé.
Il y a de plus une mauvaise insonorisation de l'appartement mais cela n'a pas été très gênant car l'immeuble était dans l'ensemble plutôt calme. 
Point positif : hôte sympathique et disponible, proximité du parc Guell et des transports en commun 
Etant donné le rapport qualité prix, je pense qu'il convient surtout a un groupe d'amis

Regina was communicative before we stayed in the apartment and although she couldn't meet us during our stay, had arranged for someone to do so with keys and information. It's a really nice apartment in a quiet neighbourhood.
The place is spacious located in a nice area of the city

My group of four friends and I had a great stay in Regina's Airbnb. The apartment looked just as it did in the listing and was very clean. Regina was easy to communicate with before our stay and she coordinated for her friend Maks to meet us when we arrived. There was plenty of room for the group of five one the apartment. We thoroughly enjoyed the outdoor terrace and spent our mornings out there to eat the breakfast we had prepared in the well equipped kitchen. We did, however, wish there had been some basic kitchen ingredients like salt, spices, or oil there for us to use. The location was a quick walk to Park Güell and it was nice being in a non touristy area. That did however, mean that it was not as easy to reach the city center.

Regina é stata sempre molto disponibile a soddisfare le nostre richieste e qualunque problema ci fosse é stata pronta a consigliarci nel migliore dei modi.
La descrizione dell'annuncio rispecchia verosimilmente l'appartamento che è in sé molto accogliente è provvisto di tutto cioè che serve.
Il quartiere é un po' lontano dal centro, ma percorrendo un tratto a piedi e poi con la metro basta poco per raggiungere il centro città; il servizio taxi é abbastanza economico e comodo da utilizzare dopo l'orario di chiusura della metro.
Detto ciò risulta ovvio che é stata una bellissima esperienza!

The communication with Regina was perfect. The flat is not really close to the city center, but with metro was it without problem and we had great opportunity to see the sun rise in park guel. I am sure, we would not have this experience without staying here. Thanks.

name: Stylish, spacious, central, shared rooftop terrace
summary: Stylish, spacious two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment, located in the central Eixample neighbourhood, just a short walk from the Old City and from the gorgeous Art Nouveau district. Elegant contemporary design, high ceilings and parquet flooring are combined with modern comforts: Wi-Fi, satellite TV, and a fully-equipped kitchen. The apartment is decorated with bright colours and is full of natural light. A shared rooftop terrace is open to all guests and offers great views over Barcelona.

reviews.txt: 喜欢来巴塞罗那的朋友可以考虑去他们家哦,干净､ 设施物品齐全､可以自己做简餐特别方便,附近有地铁站,或者步行到市区都很方便

시설도 위치도 모두 만족스러웠어요 
다음에 가면 또 갈꺼같아요
Great cozy apartment in a great location.  Easy access to Metro, restaurants, supermarkets and parking lot.

Great centrally located two bedroom apartment with lots of light. The second bedroom is quite tight, but for a weekend is no problem. The little enclosed balcony space is also very nice to sit in. We were also able to store our bags on site after checkout which was very useful. I'd stay again without hesitation.
Es un sitio perfecto para alojarse en Barcelona. Limpio, espacioso y bien conectado. El trato fantástico. Recomendable 100%
Great location. Modern interior, comfortable beds. This seems to be a property owned by a management company and not an individual. I could be mistaken, but I don't think so.
Convenient and centrally located appartment! can certainly recommended.
카탈루냐 광장에서 걸어서 10분 걸립니다 위치가 매우 좋았습니다 깨끗하고 안전합니다
Mas alla del alijamiento impecable y de la zona del departamento, queremos destacar la ayuda 24hs del anfitrion y su buena atencion en todo momento. Muy contentos de la eleccion
We loved this place. Great location, updated appliances, very clean. It's a beautiful apartment, but we hardly spent any time in it. Would stay here again in a heartbeat.

A beautiful, clean, well equipped apartment in a fantastic location.  Exactly as described in the listing.  Check in was swift and efficient.  We were given plenty of tips and information by our host. Within 5-10 minutes walk of Plaza Catalunya. Plenty of shops and restaurants within a minutes walk of the apartment.  You must try the restaurant below the apartment if you stay - we had two excellent meals there.  Bring ear plugs if you are a light sleeper as there is a fair bit of road noise, as is typical for well appointed apartments in Barcelona centre.

Excellent location, very clean, modern amenities, and plenty of space. This is a perfect apartment for four people. We loved staying here. The apartment management was very helpful and allowed us to check in early. We loved exploring Barcelona from here. Almost everything is just a short walk away. It's also very close to a Metro station. We could not have been happier with this apartment

This beautiful apartment was the perfect home base for our family of four. In a very quiet neighborhood situated near wonderful restaurants and shops. Grocery store was also nearby. We had a perfect visit. Other reviews have mentioned corporate apartment. This may be the case but it did not take away from our experience. They responded quickly to all of our requests and arrange a taxi to the airport.

Location is perfect, you can reach a lot of sightseeings, shops, restaurants within 10 minutes. Host was very friendly, ready to help 24 hours a day. Apartments itself really clean and cozy, you can find everything you need. Hardly recommend!

This apartment is beautiful, with old-world detailing and modern amenities. The Metro is literally a block away and there are supermarkets, restaurants and bakeries on the same block. We were glad to have a dishwasher and washing machine as well! Highly recommend this convenient and beautiful location. As others have said, it is corporate-owned so does not have the personal feel at checkin-in but the people that helped us were are very friendly and helpful.

We were only able to stay in Barcelona for a quick 2 night, one day stay, and this Airbnb worked out perfect. It was in great location to get to where we needed to go, and most of it we could do by walking. They were very professional at check in and communication and the place was clean and had everything we needed for our quick stay.  Thanks again for everything!!
A great place to stay. Highly recommended.
Great flat, good communication. Helpful for parking too. I recommend this place.
Yaiza's place was beautiful and great for our group of girls. Towels and amenities were provided and the house was very comfortable. I'd love to stay here again!
Прекрасные апартаменты. Отличное место положение. Рекомендую для краткого пребывания в Барселоне.

name: Triple room Barcelona Guell park
summary: Private room in damily home

reviews.txt: Nice and cozy place to stay. We couldn't enjoy the terrace much as it was raining but house was warm and Nurnia was lovely. X

Nuria was a nice host, she is very easygoing and kind.  The apartment is very close to the metro and center. The area is quite lively and there are many restaurants and services (via Verdi), at the same time very quiet and we slept really well. One thing which could be improved is the cleaning, as I found the room quite dusty. I had a baby with me and so it was a bit inconvenient. The toilet on the contrary was very clean, but to my perception, the whole apartment needs better maintenance.

We had a great time in Barcelona. Nuria was very friendly. The room and bathroom was clean and also very quiet. The room was near Metro Lesseps (L3) and near Sagrada Familia, Parc Guell and Passeig de Gracia (big shopping street). Thank you!
We had a lovely stay at Nuria's, the location and accessibility was amazing.

Nuria was very kind and accommodating. The room was comfortable for the three of us, and it was very good to be able to enjoy the terrace. The house is a bit cluttered, though. And we could not shower after 10 pm, which was an inconvenience on the day of our arrival.
Apart from that, the place is very well located, on a lively neighbourhood, with plenty of access to buses and subway.

We enjoyed a two-night stay with Nuria in Barcelona.  Her listing is very accurate and we found everything as advertised.  Her apartment is in a good location, only a 10-minute walk from Lesseps Metro Station.  The Gaudi Guell Park is an uphill walk of about 900 meters.  Our room and bathroom were clean and the beds comfortable for our family of three.  The internet worked well and her rooftop terrace was pleasant for afternoon tea and breakfast.  In fact, Nuria offered us tea on the roof upon our arrival.  We enjoyed having use of the kitchen during our stay.  The elevator in her building was nice for carrying luggage up and down.  Our Spanish and Nuria’s English were minimal, but we were able to communicate.  This is certainly not a luxurious place, but good for those traveling within a budget.
Aunque fue una visita relámpago a Barcelona, cumplió todas las expectativas. El piso es bonito y cómodo, ubicación en una zona tranquila y con el metro cerca para todo lo demás.

We was live in Nuria's place for 9 days ! 
The location and room was good for short days to stay .
But! !if you want live more longer like us , you should think about this , because when we live there , the first day , she can speak a little bit English to us . But the rest 8 days , she only spoke Spanish to us .When we couldn't understand what she talk about, and she will spoke more louder voice in Spanish , look like she's angry , let us feel uncomfortable  . 
And the wash machine not for free , need pay 4euro for once !

Nuria was great! The space she had was spacious (even though 3 people were staying in it) and she was kind enough to help us with anything we needed! I loved staying with her and would stay if I ever come back to visit :) The location is great too!

La casa estaba genial,  tiene una terraza increíble y está muy bien situada. 
 Nuria fue muy amable tanto durante nuestra estancia como con pequeños problemillas antes del viaje. Repetiría sin dudarlo!

Well organised and nice place with lovely terrace. Area is also great. 

Host is friendly and helpful.

Nuria collected my parents and I from Barcelona airport for 25€. Our flight was delayed and we didn't arrive until 10pm, but I was able to notify her through (Hidden by Airbnb) just before we took off and she was fine about it. She  has a small VW Pollo which we just managed to fit all 3 of our big bags in to, plus us 3 and Nuria! She pointed out the closest metro station (Lesseps) on the way to her house and made us tea on the Terrace upon arrival to her home. She doesn't speak English so we communicated in Spanish. The room was fine for us, a very narrow apartment, as are most apartments in Barcelona. A small lift was good to take our luggage up as the apartment is the top of 6 or so levels. We had a fan in our room and a big open window which was great as it was hot! Shower is either hot or cold and bathroom shared with another guest room. Towels provided. Showers between 7:00 and 22:00 as bathroom is inbetween the 2 guest rooms and that rule is to help keep noise levels to a minimum for any guests who might prefer to sleep from 10pm. Approx 15 mins walk to Park Guell which was great! And about 25 mins walk to La Sagrada Familia. A really great fruit/vegetable/organic produce with the best of everything just a few streets away. Access to fridge available on request. Access to cutlery, crockery and microwave (not oven or stove). Great strong wifi connection. A few barking dogs in the neighborhood, but otherwise quiet. Nuria kindly offered for us to leave our luggage for the day as we were checking out, but we didn't need to. Nuria seemed to do a bit of work from home, she kept out of our way, but was around if we had needed to ask her anything. Over all our stay was good. Muchas Gracias Nuria!
Everything was so good!) We are very happy that chose Nuria's apartment. Thanks a lot!

Nice room, and she was able to provide an extra mattress to us when we requested. It is situated in a calm area, but close to the metro station Lesseps.
Núria provided towels and sheets and keys to the house.
tot molt bé
agréable séjour chez Nuria qui a été très accueillante

Gracias Nuria para la semana en tu casa.
The room were really  clean and the terrace is very pleasant.
The only thing is the neighborhood's dogs during the night.
So a beautifull travel for us.

la ubicación era inmejorable para el proposito de nuestro viaje, los barrios de alrededor eran una pasada para salir a cenar. La habitacion era comoda y Nuria nos lo puso todo bastante fácil.
Me hubiese gustado saber con antelación que tendría que pagar un extra "turistico" y creo que eso deberia ir incluido en el precio total... pero bueno. fue un placer hospedarnos en su casa.

Todo fue muy bien. Llegamos tarde asi que espero para poder entregarnos la llave. Habitacion comoda, tranquila, todo muy limpio. Cerca a la estacion de metro y un buen barrio. No tuve mucha interaccion con Nuria dado que saliamos temprano y llegabamos tarde. Solo me queda la duda del impuesto de 1€por pax por dia de estadia, no tenia ningun inconveniente en pagarlo pero no aun sigo sin entender el porque.

La habitacion era comoda, tranquila y todo muy limpio. La ubicación del apartamento es super bien, cerca de la estatión del metro y se puede obtener todo muy bien. Nuriá era muy amable, solícita y en total una anfitriona recomendable =)
